story:
Delivery Timeline

October through November - We'll be working hard on this INDIEGOGO. Help us promote and share this campaign with the world!
November through December - We'll have our engineering hats on in this phase, tinkering at warp speed to finish developing the back-end software and analytics features to make Programmable LED T-Shirt as awesome as it can be.

December through February - Manufacturing
February- The delivery trucks will begin lining up at our plant as we start rolling out the rewards. Rewards will be fulfilled on a first-come, first-served basis: Those who back the project first will receive their reward first. From that point we'll have our fabrication at max production to keep a steady stream of Programmable LED T-Shirt sets coming until all the pledges are fulfilled. If you want an estimate of when your set will be delivered based on where you are in the order of backers, please send us an email and we'll be glad to give you an update.


LED Shirt with Time and Programmable Message Display giving you the ultimate way to express yourself through words on your T-Shirt: Don't be afraid to show off your inner geek.

With this unique LED Shirt, you can display and edit 6 different sentences, logos, mottos or just names of up to 255 characters each! The brightness is adjustable, and the speed and way of displaying words can be chosen among a large choice of pre-registered modes.


The use and fun of this awesome LED Shirt is infinite. If you have your own business it is an ingenious opportunity to advertise your company website, special promotions or any other great marketing ideas to attract more customers. Imagine the effect you will generate by sending staff wearing shirts with lively LED messages in crowded areas! 

At a Glance...

  • Super cool and stylish LED T shirt
  • Displays time and 6 programmable messages
  • Up to 255 characters for each message
  • A lot of modes are pre-registered so select the one(s) suitable for your business or amusement!
  • Removable LED board for convenient typing and washing the shirt
  • Power source: 2 CR2030 batteries (included)
  • Battery time: Around 20 hours of constant use
  • Board dimensions: 115 x 35 (mm)


    To type a message, first you have to choose a number between 1 and 6 in switch mode, then go to input mode and select a character. To proceed to the next character, simply press enter to validate the previous one. When it is done, wait for a while and the message saves automatically. To type another message, choose another number in switch mode (if you choose the same, you overwrite the previous one) and then follow the same steps.

    The time displays when no message is selected.


    Package Contents

    • T-shirt
    • LED board
    • 2 CR2030 batteries
    • English user manual


    WHY WE ARE ON INDIEGOGO?


    Our desire to be a part of INDIEGOGO is to be able to have the Programmable LED T-Shirt be in your hands!

    We are hoping you give us this opportunity and support to be able to enter a market that is ran by the big brands that have been selling us marketing campaigns forgetting the relationship between quality and price.



    Warranty Service:  

    1. After sales services: 1 years warranty is offered.Within the period, if failures occur due to quality problem of the screen body, send the defective parts to us and we will repair them for free. However,freight should be borne by our customers. Once the warranty period expires, only material cost will be charged if defective parts are sent back to us.



    Risks and challenges:

    At our current stage, we have completed the pre-production prototypes, however the fact of producing them in larger, scale-able volumes requires certain molds for our technology, which must meet very particular specifications to be just right. We have taken great care in every detail of the production to ensure that our system will not fail you and be completely machine-washable.

    We have to pass many meticulous quality control tests, verifying each piece one by one to ensure that we are only passing the highest quality products along to our customers. In this revision process, delays to fulfillment can happen but of course we will always work our hardest to keep all on track.

    We have been working with companies that have years of experience working in technology development and manufacturing, and that have all the necessary capacities for producing on a large-scale. We also are prepared to quickly respond to any obstacle that comes our way.

    Our vision is to not end with this project either, with your help we are going to continue looking to create products that make your every day happier.


    Thank you!
    We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project thgrough Facebook and Twitter, we will be happy for any help!
    If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at  a.aksenovpost@gmail.com

story:
We can all recall a time when we had used duct tape one time or another.  Whether we used it for a simple, or quick fix such as a hanging side mirror on your car, or a shoe flopping away from its sole, or a lint retriever from your clothes etc..  

Now how many times can you recall needing just a small amount of duct tape just to get you out of your little predicament?  For instance a temporary fix for your sunglasses or eyeglasses? Or a temporary fix for your failed sandals? A temporary bandaid, or belt, to seal an envelope, or to stop a leaking hose or bottle? If you just had the micro keychain ducked tape then those little predicaments would have been no predicament at all.. 

We figure its about time to add to the keychain family of bottle openers, screwdrivers, knives, flashlights, and wrenches.  The Micro Ducked Tape Key Ring Accessory is long awaited and long overdue. Now comes in assorted colors of blue, yellow, hot pink, red, black, and of course gray. So now you can temporarily quick fix with class and style. You will almost forget its temporary.

 Throughout the years duct tape has made its way up the ranks to be an American household name. Now we can secure its name on keychains all over america providing endless, quick fix remedies for generations to come. Now there is no excuse for not having the solution on hand..





































































Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
FreakishWATCH.

FreakishWATCH, a watch for everyone and every situation. 24 hours lined up onto an aluminium disc, encased into a thin, 36 mm stainless steel case and supported by a genuine leather watchband. The careful choice of materials and the meticulous attention to design, make FreakishWATCH a unique accessory: light and thin, elegant and comfortable to wear, but also solid and water-resistant. Elegant in black, casual in yellow. FreakishWATCH is available in just two versions, reflecting its essence of simplicity and charm.

Flat glass steel case 
Hour disc in aluminum 
Genuine leather strap 
Water-resistant till 3 meters 
Case diameter: 36.00 mm 
Case thickness: 4.35 mm 
Designed in Florence (Italy) by Sabrina Fossi Design 

 

Elegant in black, casual in yellow. 

 

 

WATCH OPERATION. 

 *For a better visualization, please put the video in HD resolution.

 

For everyone and every situation.


HOW THE IDEA WAS BORN.

Sometimes, it is only a short step from product to accessory… a shorter and easier step than you can imagine! The real challenge consists rather in determining a starting point, something that makes taking “that step” worthwhile! A stimulus, an idea, a thought which is too insistent to be ignored! A thought like FreakishCLOCK: a carefree, “fresh” and immediate wall clock. 

The original idea was based on a simple principle: making an analogue clock which was as easy to read as a digital clock. Just one simple advantage: to be easy to read, for everyone – young and old alike! Designed to focus on the current time and little else: just on simplicity, neatness and immediacy; a little ‘window’ on the current time: the FreakishSegment, the section that “reads the time”! Basically, a “digital hand”.

... Stretching a line, finding the right measurements, drawing and erasing, in the attempt to reach the goal that only a few have ever reached: to get from product to accessory! The move had been made, the aim was very clear: FreakishCLOCK had to be made into an accessory! A small and elegant window on time, following you throughout the day, at all times.

A watch for everyone - an everyday object, and not just a home decor item! At work or at leisure - just by casting a fleeting glance at it - the watch will set the pace of your day with immediacy and charm.

 

 

 *For a better visualization, please put the video in HD resolution.

 

HOW TO GET IT.

Help us to bring FreakishWATCH to life! We've been developing the product design and production processes for over one year, we've tested samples rigorously... and now we are seeking Indiegogo funding to offset the costs of pre-production units. 

Indiegogo is a global crowd-funding platform focused on creativity, it allows project creators to post their ideas. Becoming a backer of FreakishWATCH and picking a reward, you will essentially pre-ordering it. On Indiegogo you'll get a special backer discount, and you'll receive your watch before it is available in stores. 

Your support in sharing this project will be essential, so please spread FreakishWATCH on your Social Networks, 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the FreakishWATCH community, thank you!

STEPS.

1. Choose a reward level based on your FreakishWATCH preference. ​ 

2. Add shipping cost (where it is applicable): choose your country destination and please double-check the total amount, then continue with the payment.

3. Complete the payment, and that's it! 

Note: We do not handle import duties for shipments, and we do not charge for this upfront. Backers may face additional customs costs upon delivery of their FreakishWATCH. To avoid regulatory problems, we will put the reward level value (sans shipping) on the declaration. We cannot promise to do otherwise. Thank you!

DELIVER.

We will ship through UPS or Postal Service (EMS), it depends on Country destination.

 

ADVANTAGES in supporting our project and in buying it early: ​ 

  • you will benefit a special discount 
  • you will get your wrist watch before it's available in stores 
  • you will take a more direct role in making

 

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, you can always reach us at order@sabrinafossidesign.com

 

Please feel free to share this project with your friends and let us know if you have any questions.

 

Follow us on:

Sabrina Fossi Design website - sabrinafossi.com

Facebook Page

Twitter Page

Instagram Page

YouTube Channel

Pinterest Page

 

Useful Tags:

#sabrinafossidesign #freakishwatch

 

CLICK HERE FOR THE PRESS MATERIALS

 

REWARDS.

For believing in our vision, we want to thank you! Check out our rewards below:      

 

 

Risks and challenges

Our team has a long experience in both design and relationship with manufacturers (product & packaging). As FreakishWATCH is a new product, timeline is always the biggest risk. We will make every effort to deliver on time, and could even deliver the product before expected. However, there is always a chance that the manufacturing/ fulfillment processes could be delayed. In the off chance that we do find ourselves delayed, we ask for your patience, and promise to fulfill you product as soon as possible, without sacrificing quality.

Communication is key for us. Thank you in advance for your support!

Sabrina Fossi Design Team.

story:
The new klokers’ Swiss Made watch KLOK-08 is available through Indiegogo. KLOK-08 pays tribute to the Sixties, from where it inherited the spirit and neo-retro design. 

KLOK-08 introduces a new way of telling time:  two concentric disks (one for hours and minutes, and one for seconds) rotate counter-clockwise to display the time on a vertical line  at the top of the dial. 3 colors of dials are available.

 

Black and absinthe yellow dial with 316L stainless steel case

 

 

White dial with rose gold plated 316L stainless steel case ​

 

Warm gray and orange dial with 316L stainless steel case

 

KLOK-08 IN THE MEDIA!

 

KLOK-08 pays tribute to its inspiration, the creative and audacious Sixties. The Sixties broke the rules; they represented counter-culture and shook conventions. The Sixties were cool; the Sixties promised freedom! 

 

klokers offers the freedom of interchangeability and personal customization

klokers celebrates that Sixties spirit of freedom by offering freedom of choice, freedom of style, freedom of color, and even freedom of watch. The secret to klokers' system is a watch-head that securely clips on and off on straps and accessories through a patented click-in, click-out system we call the klokers’ key.

 

This unique system makes all of klokers’ products compatible and fully interchangeable.

Wear KLOK-08 on your wrist with a textile strap for a casual look, change to a brightly colored strap for a happy occasion and then a leather strap for a more classical look at work. You can also customize your bag (or bags) with a KWEL jewel strap. For a unique accessory, attach KLOK- 08 to your notebooks with the KLIP, or place it on a desk with the Desk&Pocket stand. 

Protect and carry the klokers’ watch-heads with elegance and style with the unique Il Bussetto x klokers leather Bell. The Bangle can be worn as a standalone jewel, or with KLOK-08 or all other klokers’ watch-heads.

You can create your combinations of colors and materials, as well as your own ways of using KLOK-08. 

 

Nonconformist time display

KLOK-08 introduces a new way of telling time: its dial is composed of two disks, one displaying hours and minutes, the other the seconds. The disks display time on a vertical line at the top of the dial.

KLOK-08 flies in the face of the traditional watchmaking in that the disks rotate counterclockwise!

 

klokers used innovative state-of-the-art technologies and conducted extensive research and development in developing KLOK-08 and perfecting the concept of simple but secure interchangeability.

The fixing system and time display are both patented.
Reference for the fixing system patent: WO 2016/001598
Reference for the time display patent: WO 2017/042456

 The patented fixing system - the klokers' key:

An integrated lens in the triple injected glass ensures high legibility when reading the time:

Patented 316L stainless steel fixing system with red push-button at 8 o’clock to unlock KLOK-08 from its support (strap or accessory):

Exploded view of KLOK-08  (non-contractual picture as KLOK-08 is still under development, the construction presented below is a provisional version):

KLOK-08 is a certified Swiss Made watch at an affordable price.
The non-conventional and proprietary assembly process required an overall investment of €1M.

 

____

____

____

____

____

You will receive your KLOK-08(s) and accessory(ies) in an elegant protective travel case. 
This case has foam drawers to protect your KLOK-08 from shocks and ensure a safe journey.
You can adjust compartments in the travel case according to your choice of products.

Colors: cream, black and red 
Dimensions: 169 mm (long) x 169 mm (wide) x 25 mm (high)
Materials: cardboard and foam

 

You can help us to successfully launch KLOK-08 by joining our Time Travelers Guild!  

And sharing the campaign throughout your social media channels! Thank you for this valuable help, and welcome into the Time Travelers Guild!

 

Risks and challenges

In September 2015, klokers was born on Kickstarter and, after successful crowdfunding and the wild experience of startup life, has grown up. However, even with our now years of experience with klokers, given the degree of innovation that KLOK-08 represents, the risks of this campaign are:

- technical risk of KLOK-08 dial colors: the watches presented on these pages are prototypes. Considering the state-of-the-art technologies used, the industrial phase may make changes to the KLOK-08 dial colors. This will not however affect the aesthetical quality of KLOK-08.

Besides, klokers reserves the right to change one color or even not provide some color references at all if these ones have not been enough requested. In such a case, klokers may provide another model.

- industrial risk: in the watchmaking industry, the extremely high precision of components is essential. The technical team will be paying very close attention to respect of tolerances, precision, and quality of components. It is possible that the manufacturing tolerances could change depending on the challenges and difficulties encountered to comply the components’ specifications. The necessary mastery of the production ramp-up phase may also cause changes to the delivery schedule.

- financial and economic risk: klokers is a successful but a young company which constantly adapts to the evolutions of its exploitation and environment (market, legislation, norms, etc.). This environment may affect the development of the company and postpone some elements of the production planning.

- Indiegogo risk: for campaigns in InDemand, backers can request a refund from Indiegogo within 10 days of the transaction provided the InDemand page is live, the perk has not been fulfilled, and the funds have not been disbursed to the campaigner.

All contributions will be engaged for the manufacturing and the industrialization of KLOK-08. These funds will be committed for this purpose. As backers on Indiegogo, reimbursement for the pledge is only possible as mentionned above. Delays in deliveries cannot be a reimbursement reason. In the Indiegogo context, the backers do accept these risks as they support a project under development.

Deliveries should start from December 2018 and can last, according to total quantities backed on Indiegogo, until the end of Q1 2019.

If any of the information provided in this document changes then we will notify all of our backers in a transparent and timely manner.
story_txt: The new klokers’ Swiss Made watch KLOK-08 is available through Indiegogo. KLOK-08 pays tribute to the Sixties, from where it inherited the spirit and neo-retro design. KLOK-08 introduces a new way of telling time:  two concentric disks (one for hours and minutes, and one for seconds) rotate counter-clockwise to display the time on a vertical line  at the top of the dial. 3 colors of dials are available. Black and absinthe yellow dial with 316L stainless steel case  White dial with rose gold plated 316L stainless steel case ​ Warm gray and orange dial with 316L stainless steel case KLOK-08 IN THE MEDIA! KLOK-08 pays tribute to its inspiration, the creative and audacious Sixties. The Sixties broke the rules; they represented counter-culture and shook conventions. The Sixties were cool; the Sixties promised freedom!  klokers offers the freedom of interchangeability and personal customizationklokers celebrates that Sixties spirit of freedom by offering freedom of choice, freedom of style, freedom of color, and even freedom of watch. The secret to klokers' system is a watch-head that securely clips on and off on straps and accessories through a patented click-in, click-out system we call the klokers’ key. This unique system makes all of klokers’ products compatible and fully interchangeable.Wear KLOK-08 on your wrist with a textile strap for a casual look, change to a brightly colored strap for a happy occasion and then a leather strap for a more classical look at work. You can also customize your bag (or bags) with a KWEL jewel strap. For a unique accessory, attach KLOK- 08 to your notebooks with the KLIP, or place it on a desk with the Desk&Pocket stand. Protect and carry the klokers’ watch-heads with elegance and style with the unique Il Bussetto x klokers leather Bell. The Bangle can be worn as a standalone jewel, or with KLOK-08 or all other klokers’ watch-heads.You can create your combinations of colors and materials, as well as your own ways of using KLOK-08.  Nonconformist time displayKLOK-08 introduces a new way of telling time: its dial is composed of two disks, one displaying hours and minutes, the other the seconds. The disks display time on a vertical line at the top of the dial.KLOK-08 flies in the face of the traditional watchmaking in that the disks rotate counterclockwise! klokers used innovative state-of-the-art technologies and conducted extensive research and development in developing KLOK-08 and perfecting the concept of simple but secure interchangeability.The fixing system and time display are both patented.Reference for the fixing system patent: WO 2016/001598Reference for the time display patent: WO 2017/042456 The patented fixing system - the klokers' key:An integrated lens in the triple injected glass ensures high legibility when reading the time:Patented 316L stainless steel fixing system with red push-button at 8 o’clock to unlock KLOK-08 from its support (strap or accessory):Exploded view of KLOK-08  (non-contractual picture as KLOK-08 is still under development, the construction presented below is a provisional version):KLOK-08 is a certified Swiss Made watch at an affordable price.The non-conventional and proprietary assembly process required an overall investment of €1M. ____________________You will receive your KLOK-08(s) and accessory(ies) in an elegant protective travel case. This case has foam drawers to protect your KLOK-08 from shocks and ensure a safe journey.You can adjust compartments in the travel case according to your choice of products.Colors: cream, black and red Dimensions: 169 mm (long) x 169 mm (wide) x 25 mm (high)Materials: cardboard and foam You can help us to successfully launch KLOK-08 by joining our Time Travelers Guild!  And sharing the campaign throughout your social media channels! Thank you for this valuable help, and welcome into the Time Travelers Guild! Risks and challengesIn September 2015, klokers was born on Kickstarter and, after successful crowdfunding and the wild experience of startup life, has grown up. However, even with our now years of experience with klokers, given the degree of innovation that KLOK-08 represents, the risks of this campaign are:- technical risk of KLOK-08 dial colors: the watches presented on these pages are prototypes. Considering the state-of-the-art technologies used, the industrial phase may make changes to the KLOK-08 dial colors. This will not however affect the aesthetical quality of KLOK-08.Besides, klokers reserves the right to change one color or even not provide some color references at all if these ones have not been enough requested. In such a case, klokers may provide another model.- industrial risk: in the watchmaking industry, the extremely high precision of components is essential. The technical team will be paying very close attention to respect of tolerances, precision, and quality of components. It is possible that the manufacturing tolerances could change depending on the challenges and difficulties encountered to comply the components’ specifications. The necessary mastery of the production ramp-up phase may also cause changes to the delivery schedule.- financial and economic risk: klokers is a successful but a young company which constantly adapts to the evolutions of its exploitation and environment (market, legislation, norms, etc.). This environment may affect the development of the company and postpone some elements of the production planning.- Indiegogo risk: for campaigns in InDemand, backers can request a refund from Indiegogo within 10 days of the transaction provided the InDemand page is live, the perk has not been fulfilled, and the funds have not been disbursed to the campaigner.All contributions will be engaged for the manufacturing and the industrialization of KLOK-08. These funds will be committed for this purpose. As backers on Indiegogo, reimbursement for the pledge is only possible as mentionned above. Delays in deliveries cannot be a reimbursement reason. In the Indiegogo context, the backers do accept these risks as they support a project under development.Deliveries should start from December 2018 and can last, according to total quantities backed on Indiegogo, until the end of Q1 2019.If any of the information provided in this document changes then we will notify all of our backers in a transparent and timely manner.

story:
INTRODUCING HERA

HERA is a mobile watch phone created with children’s safety in mind. With GPS capabilities and only four programmable buttons on the keypad, it is both easy for children to use and convenient for parents to monitor.

Created for Safety

As a parent, I have always been deeply affected by stories of missing children; so much so, that whenever the TV news would feature kidnapped or lost children, I would have to change the channel. I didn't want to imagine the panic and desperation that a family would face being separated from their child. For years, I have worked as a developer, and I knew that I had an opportunity to create something meaningful; something that could change the world for the better. I began working on a project to improve the lines of communication between children and parents. Out of this, HERA was developed.

Designed with children in mind.

Through testing many prototypes, we have discovered essential components of a phone designed for children:

Easy to use. With only four preprogrammed buttons, a child as young as one year old can make a call. Unlike a mobile phone placed in a pocket or backpack, the watch is constantly visible to children, and easily accessed when they need it.

Compatible with an active lifestyle. Children are constantly active; running, jumping, falling, and moving around. While other prototypes such as a mobile phone necklace were affected by the constant motion, the HERA watch phone is durable and uninhibited by children’s activities.

Adaptable for all ages. Children at different stages have different needs and abilities. A very young child has little independence, and no need to use a phone on a regular basis. An older child might need to contact a parent with questions or information.

With its GPS technology, HERA works well for young children to wear on outings, such as trips to the mall or park. For older children who walk to and from school and activities, it can be worn daily. HERA is especially useful for children of any age to wear on international trips.

Designed for your peace of mind

HERA is designed to ﬁt your lifestyle as a parent, and to allow you to easily contact and locate your child. As the project grows, we will be able to offer an increasing amount of features to make the phone even more efﬁcient and effective.


We got funded, Hera will be delivered with at least  this features;



CALL FIREWALL

The phone will be programmed to only receive calls from pre-authorized numbers.




SECRET CALL

High quality speakers and microphones will allow parents to hear what is happening around their child.





GPS SYSTEM


GPS location technology will alert parents either by SMS or online when the child arrives at or leaves a preprogrammed place. Location can be tracked online at all times.





LBS SYSTEM


LBS location system compliments GPS by using cell phone tower antennas to verify position. Unlike GPS alone, LBS allows location to be tracked indoors, and in heavy cloud cover.



                                                               



LOW RADIATION

HERA will have a very efﬁcient system for reducing radiation. The emission of radiation will be reduced to 0.28mW/g; one seventh of the European standard



$100,000;



                                                              



IOS SOFTWARE

HERA will include a software allowing it to be controlled using iPhones and iPads



                                                              



CHOOSE THE SECOND COLOR

HERA will be available in a second color, chosen by the backers



$200,000;



                                                               



ANDROIDS TOO

HERA will include a software allowing it to be controlled by Android phones



                                                                



ONE MORE COLOR

HERA will be available in a third color




$350,000;



                                                                



REMOVAL ALERTS

HERA will alert parents of the child’s position when the watch is removed



                                                              



4 COLORS TO CHOOSE FROM

HERA will be available in a fourth color



$500,000;



                                                             



WIRELESS RECHARGEABLE


The phone will be chargeable at a wireless charge table (sold separately)

*We are seeking backers at another website as well. If we reach $300,000 from this campaign and $200,000 from our other one, we will be able to deliver HERA with the features listed at the $500,000 mark. 


Patent Pending

We have filed requests with the International Patent System, the International Trademark System, and the International Design System. 


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS


1)  Can HERA be used exclusively as either a GPS tracker or a phone rather than both?

HERA has both GPS and cellular phone capabilities, but you can choose to use it exclusively as a GPS tracking device.

2) How long is battery life?

Our goal is to make the battery life as long as possible; at least two full days with frequent use, and one week in standby.

3) Will I be notified if my battery is running low?

You will be able to program the phone to send an SMS alert when the battery is running low.

4) Will HERA be waterproof or water resistant?

At the very least, HERA will be water resistant. We will work towards making HERA as waterproof as possible.

5) How can I ensure that I have exclusive access to my child’s GPS location, and no one else can track my child?

The phone can be tracked by SMS, or through the included software. Using SMS, HERA will only answer to the managing phone. The software will require login information in order to track the phone.

6) How big is HERA? Is it available in different sizes?

Currently, HERA is 4 cm (1.5 inches). We are working to make it smaller, or at least wider than it is tall. It will be available in one size that will fit a wide variety of people.

7) Will my child be able to turn HERA on or off? Will I receive a notification if HERA is turned off?

The child can turn off the phone, but it will only affect the phone’s ability to make outgoing calls. Through the managing phone or software, the parent will still be able to use GPS tracking, hear what is going on around the child, and make calls to the child.

8) When will I get to choose the color of my HERA?

At the end of the project, backers will be contacted to confirm color choices. In addition to child-friendly colors, we hope to create a black or white option that will appeal to senior citizens, or adults with special needs.

9) Do I need to add shipping costs manually?

Yes, shipping costs must be added to your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add US$10 to receive your perk in the US, or US$30 to receive it in another country.

10) I forgot to manually add shipping. How can I correct this?

No problem. Click on “Contribute Now” at the top of the page. Manually enter US$10 to receive your perk in the USA, or US$30.00 to receive it elsewhere. Enter the same personal information as you did in your initial order, and it will be added to your pledge amount. We will match the pledges and shipping costs manually at the end of our campaign.

11) When are you going to be shipping my HERA?

The estimated shipping date for both national and international orders is December 2014.

12) I asked for my perk to be sent to my address, but I want to send it as a gift to another address. What do I do?

At the end of the campaign, we will contact each of our contributors to confirm their product choice. At this time, you can respond with the correct shipping address.

13) How can I be sure that you will deliver?

We have already produced HERA. Currently, it works as a GPS and phone, but does not include all of the features that we will be able to provide through this campaign. Although we can deliver now, the funds raised through this campaign will allow us to improve our product. We will be able to afford high quality engineers, and implement advanced research and development. Additionally, we will be able to use higher quality materials, and introduce exciting new features. We are fully committed to making HERA the superior product we know it can be.

I am originally from Brazil, but I have been traveling the world to develop this product. My company is located in Wilmington, Delaware USA; this will be the development and delivery center for HERA. 

The phone has evolved into what it is today with help from many skilled workers located in the USA, Canada, India, and China.

story:
1/ OUR PROJECT

www.myfabulousoutlet.com - fashion deal next door 

 My Fabulous Outlet is the best way to buy and resale second-hand luxury goods around you. It is a « click and collect » website based on geolocalised fashion. Your search near you !

2/ PUBLICATIONS

3/ HOW DOES IT WORK? 

It is very simple. If you look for a second-hand luxury item, open the App and search near you what you are looking for. 

Once you have found it, contact the reseller and take appointment with him. Once at his place, check the item, try it on, and pay the reseller. 

From your side, you can resale as well your goods to make some extra money. 

4/ CUSTOMER TARGET

 - People who wants to resale their luxury garments and accessories and make a profit on it.

- People who wants to buy second-hand items in good condition with big discount.

 5/ AMBASSADORS: we are 6 partners involved in the business

6/ SHAPE FOR THE APP

7/ WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP? 

Now we need more money to go at next step : have our own application for iPhone and Android. Thus we will be able to offer our services anywhere in the world. People will be able to connect anywhere they are. It will be fantastic for the clients to buy and resale from anywhere in the world.

8/ GOAL  

$15000 : we develop iPhone application

$50000 : we develop both iPhone and Android

$1000000 : we go worldwide through local advertising in all continents

9/ PROJECT TIMELINE

Sept 2014 : Crowdfunding

Oct- Jan 2015 : set up of the application for iphone

Jan 2015-June 2015 : running the business with specific target on advertising and social networks

story:
We need your Support 

(forgive the pun)

The saksok is an idea that spawned over 20 years ago as a dream in a college dorm. For years, the idea remained a figment of our imagination until six months ago, when a group of (drunk) friends at a local restaurant invested enough money to produce the first prototype. The dream was now becoming a reality.

We need your help with the final piece of the puzzle - manufacturing the first line of saksoks. 

We have designed prototypes and we are confident that we have an exceptional design that can bring comfort, confidence and machismo to millions of men across the world.

WHAT IS THE SAKSOK?

To some people the saksok is simply mens underwear.... for others it is a revolutionary product that will change men's fashion forever. It will be for men, what the brazier was for women.  #testiclewear #ballzier

WHAT DO WE NEED MONEY FOR?

We have the prototypes and the plans for production. We need some capital to produce the first line of saksoks. There is no risk in product development. All the money would be used to manufacture saksoks and package them for sale online.

HERE IS THE PROTOTPYE

We made a few prototypes and put them thru a series of tests. Let's just say it was "life changing". Our goal is to improve the design, upgrade the material and truly deliver the best product possible.

story:
If You don't have a paypal account and want to contribute via credit card see how you can do that by clicking the link contribute with credit card

Get all those tools in one single credit card shaped multi-tool



       

     

             

All in one credit card shaped and sized multi tool! Cardie.




Different everyday uses if Cardie:

Bottle opener

Pill devider

Pill splitter

Saw                                                                     Screwdriver

Rope cutter

Letter opener

Coupon cutter

Box opener

Staple remover                                               Fire starter

Wire stripper and wire cutter


And all other uses you can imagine! 


By backing me up and purchasing a perk you're helping me - a 13 year old boy get a new laptop so I can finish school and realize my dreams!

(Thanks to my big brother for helping me create this campaign and videos/pictures)

And here's why you should contribute to this campaign - I actually made another campaign that I need to raise money for a new laptop(add link here) and this is the reason I started this cappy campaign. If you want to visit my other campaign you can click here or read the quote from my other campaign:

Who am I?
My name it Tedddy. I'm 13 years old and live in Bulgaria. I study at foreign language high school - I study English and German right now.
Basically what I need is a new laptop cause my current one is 5-6 years old and has fallen apart. It's hinges are rusted and broke the top. 
The problem is that I need my laptop in order to study at school and do my homework at home. But at it's current state I can't do either of them and It hinders my grades as a result. 
My parents don't have money for a laptop and neither do I.
The thing is in my country Bulgaria the average salary per month is 500$. So you can imagine it's not easy to buy a laptop.
I also like creating Android app games. And I've created a bunch(12 right now) but I can't upload them to the play store cause it costs some money. And I can't upload them to the app store case I don't have a macbook.
What I'll actually use that laptop for is :- to study for school and do my homework
- launch the Android and Iphone app-games
- create my blog where I'll write about everything in a teenager's life
- write and ebook about parents - how to understand your teen
- I also have designs for a few cool inventions that I'll need some funding to realize
- I have and idea for a new social media website that can become super cool so it's be great if I had a better laptop so I can start working on it
- I actually want to start a charity campaign for children
BUT I can't do anything on my current laptop. It needs a water bottle just to keep the screen up.I'll need 2000$ to buy a macbook pro so I can do all the things above and create app games for Iphone and Ipad.
And this will benefit you all:- If you like free apps and cool games to play - I'm going to create and release free ones. And lots of them.
- if you are a teen or a parent of a teen you'll read my free articles and ebooks on how to understand you parents/kid so you have a better relationship
- some of the cool inventions I design and want to create will change your lives
- and you'll always know that you were personally responsible for making this happen!
Here is a list of the perks you're gonna get if you decide to contribute:
I really hope you can help me raise the money. Cause I don't know what else to do. Maybe sell a kidney if I have to..How you can help me?
You can help a few different ways. - Contribute any amount you can and get some of the awesome perks.
 - this is the most important one: Help get more people to join the cause.
 -You can do that by tweeting about this campaign and insert a link to the campaign in your tweets(especially if you have lots of followers).
 -You can share this campaign on your facebook or a facebook fanpage. 
 - You can talk about this campaign on youtube or vimeo (if you have a channel) and put a link to them. 
 - You can tell your friends/coworkers to come check out this campaign .
 - You can write about this campaign on your blog/website in a post and leave a link to it. 
 - You can write about this campaign on forums and leave a link to it.
 - You can talk about this campaign  on all social media websites, you use and leave a link to it. 
-You can even create a Vine about it.
Basically helping me spread the word so I can fulfill my goal.
Thank you very much!

Check out my other campaign for Cappy - The Can Cap . Never spilling your soda/beer or losing your "fizz"!

Cardie.Different everyday uses if Cardie:Bottle openerPill deviderPill splitterSaw                                                                     ScrewdriverRope cutterLetter openerCoupon cutterBox openerStaple remover                                               Fire starterWire stripper and wire cutterAnd all other uses you can imagine! By backing me up and purchasing a perk you're helping me - a 13 year old boy get a new laptop so I can finish school and realize my dreams!(Thanks to my big brother for helping me create this campaign and videos/pictures)And here's why you should contribute to this campaign - I actually made another campaign that I need to raise money for a new laptop(add link here) and this is the reason I started this cappy campaign. I study at foreign language high school - I study English and German right now.Basically what I need is a new laptop cause my current one is 5-6 years old and has fallen apart. It's hinges are rusted and broke the top. The problem is that I need my laptop in order to study at school and do my homework at home. But at it's current state I can't do either of them and It hinders my grades as a result. My parents don't have money for a laptop and neither do I.The thing is in my country Bulgaria the average salary per month is 500$. So you can imagine it's not easy to buy a laptop.I also like creating Android app games. And I've created a bunch(12 right now) but I can't upload them to the play store cause it costs some money. And I can't upload them to the app store case I don't have a macbook.What I'll actually use that laptop for is :- to study for school and do my homework- launch the Android and Iphone app-games- create my blog where I'll write about everything in a teenager's life- write and ebook about parents - how to understand your teen- I also have designs for a few cool inventions that I'll need some funding to realize- I have and idea for a new social media website that can become super cool so it's be great if I had a better laptop so I can start working on it- I actually want to start a charity campaign for childrenBUT I can't do anything on my current laptop. It needs a water bottle just to keep the screen up.I'll need 2000$ to buy a macbook pro so I can do all the things above and create app games for Iphone and Ipad.And this will benefit you all:- If you like free apps and cool games to play - I'm going to create and release free ones. story:
Short Summary

Vivacious Vixen Apparel is looking to open a retail store in hrm!

Being a mom or two it's hard for me to save up to open a store. I have been designing clothing for years and would love to open a shop to cater to the pinup/ rockabilly crowd in Halifax!

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Start up costs such as cash register, cash desk, paint decorations.
  • Advertising/grand opening

Whatever money raised will go towards the opening of a retail location! If for some reason that is not able to happen the funds would be returned!

I'm going to be offering some sweet deals for those who choose to support :)

story:
Stainless steel + Titanium Modules featured + G2 "Parker" refill.

Invulnerable material, full functionality, the ability to create new forms of authentic modules and the enchanting grandeur of retro-style, that is before you.

Why did We do this? We are doing an Update in the Сulture.

 

Newest Pen Design specially for Office Hero!

The more standard things fill our lives, the more we want something new, unique, eternal, natural. This project is dedicated to the creation of such amazing products. Fantastic gadgets will always have a place in our world. Now we are present at the birth of such a device. In the metal gadget there is something inexplicably enticing, something real and eternal.

Limited Edition.

Beauty and uniqueness will come to your familiar working atmosphere. All your team will look at this gizmo and make legends that will go around in all departments of your company and even the main boss will know that you are an aesthetic lover.

With our modular system, you can create your own forms in your work space. Monotony in the past. Aesthetics and functionality are necessary conditions for modern design and we follow them, creating new aesthetic forms.

Pen Available in 3 Colors: Black, Orange, Titanium.

Super strong and super light, and super stylish, and generally this is the future.

One standard but complex pen's configuration and three color solutions are offered to you for choosing the ideal, precisely your style.

3 New Features Available: Mini-Knife, Screw-Driver, Mini-Awl.

Wearable Clip-Screwdriver.

We are going to add this option to stretchgoals and improve throughout the company - follow the updates. But even the classic screwdriver always fits wherever you are.

 

Built-in Mini-Awl!

There are situations when a thin long object can not be replaced by anything. Now it is a rarity - when something similar is built into the Pen. We face hundreds of different tasks throughout the day, and our team guarantee that you will use this module more often than you think. The steel, hardened element will not let you down at an unexpected moment.

 

Mini-Knife!

The holy of holies of all daily tasks is the stationery knife. We were bored to death with boring decisions and here we have a retro-office. And he is almost eternal.

The knife hides inside its module and can be worn completely safe and very interesting. The highlight of the product is hardened Aisi 320 steel and universal vintage blade shape. It can cut a box, scotch tape, any cliche and even pizza, but only thin Italian one.

Our knife is designed to help in elementary office situations when you need to open a box or sharpen a pencil. Most compact, fit even in a small pocket jeans. Can be worn with a Pen or separately.

With the Modular System, You Can Create New Devices by Simply Turning on the Imagination.

 

 

Organizer!

The organizer is designed to withstand the load when the phone is in a groove and does not roll over. Holes and slots are provided for all manager's office supplies.

 

Perks.

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is my second project. I realized the first without much difficulty, but now I need a CNC machine and I am ready to give everything to improve my workshop.

story:
Making Matriarch

HELLO and thank you for taking the time to have a browse at what I'm trying to achieve. I'm Helen, I work as an actress when the jobs come in and the rest of the time I go slightly mad! This project came into fruition from the need to be constantly creative and the love of making people feel wonderful.

To give you an idea where and why this project has come about and why it is so important to me- I need to take you back in time to November and a hop skip and jump over to Hong Kong. 'Secret Island Party' is the name of the music and arts festival my friend Rachel founded in Asia. I had the pleasure of attending the festival last year and the even bigger pleasure of creating a headdress fit enough for the hostess of the party!



Getting dressed up for festivals is one of my favourite pastimes. Dressing other people up for festivals I revel in even more. The open-minded crowds that attend festivals allow such freedom to play and express and it is this good feeling that I want to heighten through my fashion designs.

I made the headdress for Rachel in the chaotic communal corridor of an old house dedicated to the production team on the island. With a hot glue gun, a glass of wine and a couple of mosquitoes for company I got to work. Using artificial sparkly flowers, leaves, birds, butterflies, more flowers and a vine to wrap around the arm, I created a piece that was completely over the top and magical.


Rachel gave a screech of delight when she saw it, as did my insides! As the festival went on lots of people commented on how much they liked it. They were asking me if I made them professionally and if I happen to have any more they could buy or if I could make one up for them. Whilst throwing some probably very silly shapes on the dance floor I started thinking about the possibility of making that happen.

The thought of setting up a business where I could mix an unlimited imagination, crafty hands and a love of people and their self expression became suddenly extremely enticing.


After returning to the U.K, more and more visions came to me, making Kimonos, jewellery, turbans, leotards, having a shop at a festival, doing a charity catwalk, taking part in some jewellery courses, making beach wear, having an on-line shop. I started discussing these ideas with friends...

“I want to create pieces that are rich in the beauty of female strength. That are connected to and taking inspiration from dynamic women throughout the ages. That are bold, playful and empowering.”

"Matriarch" said my friend.

And that’s how the name came about.


Over the last few months I have been developing the idea, through sketches, mood boards, making headdresses out of whatever I can find in my craft box, attending business planning workshops and gathering information on-line.

As I’ve soon discovered, I need help! With the old acting work being so delightfully sporadic I am struggling to raise the funds needed to invest in materials and get properly stuck in. Funds gained through indiegogo would be such a welcome springboard into bringing the designs off  the paper and onto peoples bodies! Through funding I could actually have some pieces ready in time for festival season which is such an encouraging thought. This is a passion project, for that reason I am hugely grateful to anyone who would like to contribute towards helping me make a career out of something I love.

Please have a gander at my blog http://makingmatriarch.wordpress.com where you can keep updated with my progress and see what has been inspiring me.

In order to get started I'm going to need:

Materials. Lots of Materials!

Feathers, sequins, leather, fabric, jewels, thread, paint, tools for cutting, soldering, sealing, gluing, printing. Mannequins, painbrushes, workdesk, storage boxes, wire, ribbon, wood, beads. metallics, plastics, fabric paint, glues. (£500)

Professional camera (£350) Or an unwanted/donated camera would do just fine.

Sharpen my Skills

Professional Jewellery Making Course (£799)

Business Business

Register company. (£200)

Taking into consideration indiegogo fees (£200)

Should the project be so lucky, any funds over the target would go towards hiring a studio space.

Thank you for reading to the end! Just a last dollop of words to ponder and chew.

I am a very determined and passionate person, when I get something in my head I do it. This ranges from putting on a cabaret stage at a festival, going to building college, making my own graduation ball gown and dying my hair bright red(not one of my best choices).

I am going to make this happen and it would be fantastic to have the backing of people who will enjoy contributing to my vision.

                              LET’S MAKE MATRIARCH!

story:
COTH is an early stage apparel manufacturing company whose aesthetic, style, price point and market are in the sphere as contemporary fashion.

Simply the Commodity of Humility, Humility is the golden character, in which we esteem as modern luxury, that creates the lifestyle and culture in which we reside. The commodity is the reward, projecting the character in the quality of each garment, from its New York designing to the worldwide sourcing of fine material. We are the encouragement to enjoy life and Stay Humble.

This campaign is not for just it is for the basis of fundraising. It is also to set free the brand environment, giving you the opportunity to visualize and interact with the passion, the definition of its lifestyle.

Spring/Summer 2015 Collection  Autumn/Winter 2016 Collection

All contributions are going toward the operations and components of this focused mission.

Humility is Crown of the Humble’s honorable way of living. It is our identity, our religion. In light of this, every product, marketing tool, and business ethic both public and private is an expression of that value system. The brand is crafted to love and be loved. This counter culture welcomes you into our world and us into yours, that you may embrace the brand as your own proud identity. The garments are only the physical commodity (Crown) of the humble. The desire is consumers purchasing the culture more than the product itself.

story:
The Plan

Do you have a head? Does your head have ears? Yeah? Well it has the wrong kind! 

With this Indiegogo project, my goal is to get everybody the right pair of ears. Whether it be a hat, tail, or a hoodie, your wild side will show through! 

My name is Merm, and I'm an aspiring designer. I'm currently studying apparel design at the University of Minnesota's College of Design. I've always loved putting together costumes and reenactment attire, but it's usually so expensive and time consuming to make that it gets too costly for anyone to afford! That's why I developed patterns for three basic items-- a hat, a tail, and a hoodie. These are items that can be worn anywhere, be it a convention, the mall, or even out in the cold.

After finding the lowest possible price for my creations, I now offer them to you!


The Donations

Making the apparel always been a gamble. What if fabric prices rise?   What if I undercharge and end up paying out of pocket? I really wanted to find a way to be able to sell my products at an affordable price so that everybody could rep them, but how would I do that without losing money?

The answer, of course, is your support.

Now you may be wondering, what does one do with $6,000? Well, let's take a quick look at the costs to manufacture the items. The industrial sewing machine itself is upwards of $2,000. Hoodie fleece is $12.99/yard, while regular fleece is around $9.00/yard. Meanwhile, faux fur is closer to $24.99/yard. One yard of fabric doesn't do very much, so the fabrics need to be ordered in large quantities. The cost of stickers and buttons is close to $600 and that's not to mention the amount of thread, elastic, and other sewing necessities such as quality scissors. Don't forget shipping costs! Keep in mind that FREE SHIPPING is offered for orders within the United States!

In exchange for your generous donations, you will receive one (or two, or three, or four!) of these items: A hat, a tail, or a hoodie. Each comes in either black cat, wolf, fox, or white cat. These are my own original design and will be handmade with love for each and every one of my backers!
Each package above $5 will also include a 1" button and a sticker.

Not One For Ears?

That's okay! There are other ways to help! Spread the word to your friends! Make sure the world knows about this Indiegogo campaign to help a young apparel design student reach her dream!

Utilize Indiegogo's share tool to it's max potential!

The Rewards

And now, the moment you've all been waiting for! The rewards!

For $25, you get a spectacular eared hat!

Regular Price: $35

The hats are made out of fleece to keep your head nice and cozy! Each measures at 23" circumference (standard one-size-fits-all) with 1-2 inches of stretch room.

They are machine washable in cold water, and it is best to let them air dry.


For $30, you get your very own tail!

Regular Price: $50

The tails are made out of high quality long-pile fur for a realistic fluffy look! They are machine washable in cold water, and it is best to let them air dry.


For $75, you get a stylish eared hoodie!

Regular Price: $120
The hoodies are made out of cotton (hoodie fleece) and come in S, M, L, XL, XXL, and XXXL. Please specify size when you get the post-funded email! They are machine washable on a normal setting and can go into the dryer.

Please note, the White Cat Hat, Tail, and Hoodie are only available as "set" items! See the rewards sidebar to determine which tiers are eligible for the White cat sets.



The Stretch Goals

  • $10,000 -- Represent our brand with a gnarly t-shirt! Shirts will be given out as a $20 pledge.
  • $15,000 -- To Be Announced!

Regular Price: $35The hats are made out of fleece to keep your head nice and cozy! Each measures at 23" circumference (standard one-size-fits-all) with 1-2 inches of stretch room.
They are machine washable in cold water, and it is best to let them air dry.

For $30, you get your very own tail!





Regular Price: $50The tails are made out of high quality long-pile fur for a realistic fluffy look! They are machine washable in cold water, and it is best to let them air dry.







For $75, you get a stylish eared hoodie!



Regular Price: $120The hoodies are made out of cotton (hoodie fleece) and come in S, M, L, XL, XXL, and XXXL. Please specify size when you get the post-funded email! They are machine washable on a normal setting and can go into the dryer.

Please note, the White Cat Hat, Tail, and Hoodie are only available as "set" items! See the rewards sidebar to determine which tiers are eligible for the White cat sets.





The Stretch Goals


$10,000 -- Represent our brand with a gnarly t-shirt! Shirts will be given out as a $20 pledge.
$15,000 -- To Be Announced!

story:
Berdan New York 

Julius L. Martin has always been destined for fashion greatness.  Graduating from Howard University in Washington, DC with a  Bachelor's of Arts in Fashion Merchandising. Martin then moved to the fashion Capital New York, studying at the Fashion Institute of Technology and currently studying at Harrington College of Art and Design.  

Once in New York, Martin worked as a designer for the following brands, Sean John, Fashiman & Tobin, Liz Claigorne, IZOD, Calvin Klein, Tommy Hilfiger, Macy's, Lord & Taylor, and Company 81, Oved Apparel.

Through Martin's collective experience, he mastered boys' and men's wear, which ultimately inspired him to launch his own brand of men's intimate apparel line, Berdan New York.  Your contribution will help grow the brand.   

Berdan New York needs your help to give every man an opportunity to feel the best fit and comfort, while maintain a flair of style. 

Berdan New York needs to raise 2500.00 in 14 days.  I believe that this can happen with your support.  Please see the levels of contribution below. Be apart of the Berdan New York Campaign. #IAMBERDANNEWYORK

Contribution Levels

  • $10 or less you will receive a Berdan New York sticker.  
  • $20 you will get 1 pair of Berdan New York samples in black or white and a Berdan New York sticker. 
  • $40 you will get 2 pair of Berdan New York samples in black or white and a Berdan New York sticker. 
  • $100 and up you will get 7 pair of assorted colors and a Berdan New York sticker.
  • $250 and up you will receive a custom design underwear that will be made in the Spring 2015 collection with a name you choose for that design and 14 pairs of underwear with a Berdan New York sticker.

story:
Contact us at  metamorph@thieves.ca with any questions!

****Please remember to add shipping fees for your country to your perk amount when you check out.  See the shipping guide below. Thank you!*****


F.A.Q’s


When do I select the size and colour of my METAmorph dress?
At the end of the funding period (January 30, 2014), you will receive an email from us
with colour swatches and key measurements for each size available. You’ll have a week to send us your choices after the campaign ends. Please include your complete address so that we know where to send your new favorite dress! If you need help with sizing, just send us an email with your measurements and a recent photo to metamorph@thieves.ca.

Do you ship internationally and how much does it cost?
We do ship internationally! To cover our costs, we’ll apply a surcharge depending on the number of dresses shipped and the distance they need to travel. To inquire about specific cost, send us an email with your address and we can give you a price
beforehand.  When accepting goods that have been shipped internationally, we encourage you to consider the import fees or duties that vary by country, which you are responsible for paying. You can visit www.dutycalculator.com to see what your import duties for your country will be. 

How does shipping work?

Within Canada, we will ship your parcel with Canada Post. They expedite goods quickly and efficiently, for a fraction of their competitors’ prices. For international buyers, we use DHL to transport METAmorph. For a flat rate, they’ll ship the dresses and make sure they land right where you want them. We also ship everything is eco-friendly packaging. Please see our shipping chart and add the appropriate amount to your perk.


What size should I order?
We provided a size chart above for you. Using your waist and hip measurements, select the corresponding METAmorph size. Please note that the dresses are a generous fit, if you are between sizes it is better to size down.  You can always email metamorph@thieves.ca with your measurements and a photo of yourself if you’d like our size recommendation. The great thing about METAmorph’s fabric is that the fit doesn’t have to be textbook perfect—it will complement your curves regardless.

Will you accept exchanges for other sizes?
We’re going to go above and beyond to ensure you have all the  information necessary to select the right size before ordering. In the unlikely event that you wish to exchange your METAmorph for another size, however, you can return your unworn dress within 7 days of receiving it (return shipping costs not included) and we’ll send you another once all original orders have been filled.

What if I buy METAmorph as a gift and I can't take the recipient's
measurements?
No problem. Put a note in the comments section that you’re ordering this as a gift. We will send a gift card to the lucky recipient and ask for their measurements.

Are there any special care instructions for bamboo fabric?
We recommend you wash your METAmorph in cold water, gentle cycle with eco friendly detergent. Hang to dry, just as you would any garment you wish to preserve in its original condition.

What if I don’t know how to tie the Metamorph?
Don't fret! We have easy-to-replicate pictures and videos featuring all kinds of DIY METAmorph styles available online at www.thievesboutique.com. If you still need help let us know, we want you to feel confident about being creative!

When will I receive my METAmorph?
With the campaign ending on December 30th, 2013, we intend to be shipping dresses by May, 2014. Despite building in extra time for production, there could be unexpected bumps along the way. We will keep all funders in the loop, communicating any delays so you know when your METAmorph will arrive.

I'm having trouble with PayPal/ I am not sure that my payment went
through.  What can I do to complete my transaction?
Let’s get to the bottom of this!  If you're having any trouble contributing via PayPal, or if you want to confirm that your payment went through, please contact us at metamorph@thieves.ca We'll do everything we can to ensure the correct payment amount has been processed.

Can I contribute a larger amount?
Who are we to say “no” to generosity?! The beauty of Indiegogo is that there is no limit placed on levels of support. We are beyond grateful for anything extra that comes our way, and we may even send you something special for doing so to express our thanks (wink wink, nudge nudge)!

Where can I purchase METAmorph after the campaign ends?
You can visit www.thievesboutique.com to follow the evolution of METAmorph, and browse all of our women’s and men’s clothing.

How does METAmorph give back?
We believe that every business given the opportunity to generate profit should be giving back to those in less fortunate circumstances. We are also invested in making sure every step of our development and production processes respect the planet.  That is why a portion of proceeds from each METAmorph ordered is sent to a charity that aligns with our vision for a sustainable future.

What are you going to do with the money you raise?
Once we reach our goal, filling orders will be our first priority! We will also send funds to the charities your contribution has helped to support. Any additional funds will go towards continued production and further development of a new project we are working on (stay tuned!).

 If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?
Just email us – metamorph@thieves.ca
