story:
Thank you so much to everyone who has supported me and my Redemption collection to achieving our target goal. It has been a fantastic kick starter to the journey ahead and I couldn't have imagined it any better without all your supporting belief by my side.

We are now magically InDemand and still able to accept contributions from all and any who would love to get involved with helping create my unmissable collection - plus we've still got exclusive perks available too! 

_____________________________________________________________________________

Mystic Magic has awoken yet again to create a high fashion gothic collection filled with history, cultural couture, Angels, Demons, Mourning Brides and much more!...

With using materials sourced from across the globe, toe bones and sequined laces from America, Ruff cut crystals from Lithuania, 3D printing from Spain and luxury fabrics from my England home.

Designs inspired by the religiously undead and those who are trapped within the horrors of limbo itself. Forever forced to walk the earth between two colliding worlds of darkened unrest, frozen in a circled moment of time.

I bring to you an all exclusive collection, set to transform the face of Mystic Magic itself bring us out of the fairytale and into a new dimension. It's time to descend into my world of,

Short Summary

Hello my name is Ashley. I haven't long turned 21 and I'm a UK based self- taught male designer located in the green lands of Norfolk, Kings Lynn to be more exact. I specialise in hand crafting bespoke masks and headwear with an all unique couture fashion twist. Mostly I go by the label 'Mystic Magic' - maybe you might have already heard of me?

Feel free to check out my official website, www.mysticmagiconline.co.uk
 
Since last year I've slowly started to venture more into clothing design while dabbling in my artistry talents. At the moment I'm delved in the process of creating my biggest and excitedly awaited first full featured collection to be aimed at London Fashion Week, (once it's completed!), Code name 'REDEMPTION'.

For as long as I can remember I've been full of creative imagination and able to see past the obvious. Where most people would see a pile of junk I'd think of it as a playground full of treasures.

My parents never brought me up to be spoiled so I was always making my own toys and mostly playing in the mud (Fun Times). If ever they couldn't find me I'd no doubt be hiding in a cardboard box pretending that it was a Wendy house!

When I moved up to high school I had to deal with the traumatic loss of my grandfather plus all the stresses that come with adapting into a new crowd of unfamiliar territory. It was only a matter of time before the bullies descended like a ravenous horde of Vultures tearing in to my light.

I created Mystic Magic as a safe haven to escape to when everyone in the world seemed to have abandoned me. It was there where I sort comfort in creations from my own imagination to give purpose and make sense of the darkness that had unforgivably fallen upon my mental state of wellbeing. Eventually removed from schooling and plagued with numerous breakdowns, my confidence was stripped barer than the bones that lay beneath the ground. I was subjected to harsh cruelty that left me in a very dark place. It was only then at my lowest point I sort to a glimmer of light burning sharp like the delicate flames of a candle. I sacrificed the last remnants of my fractured heart in the hopes to feed the fire to burn bright as the night sky shining as one amongst the stars enveloping Mystic Magic into the business it is today, a beacon of hope to all those that stand wounded beneath the feet of others showing our life is in our own hands not theirs. They may name and shame us but in the end we get to choose which path to take. 

I've started up this campaign in the hopes to help achieve the completion of my first full collection. For me this is no ordinary project as it represents my journey through the gates of limbo. Like a gothic fairytale filled with darkened despair, every creation designed down to the tiniest detail represents an emotional part of me that has long since been caged within eating away at my glowing light as if it was a demonic disease destroying every part of what made me human. It's taken many years to get to the state of finally being ready to let go and leave all the shadows behind moving onto a new chapter of life full of happy and brighter things. "Like a phoenix I shall rise from the ashes" This collection will be the means to an end and the beginning to a life changing transition that needs your support in order to succeed.

By creating this collection and unleashing it upon the world, it will allow me to lay bare my scars and release all the hatred that has shrouded my life for so long, turning something truly ugly into a work of beautiful artistic expression. Words cannot even begin to describe how much this whole project means to me on a spiritual level and the self healing it will achieve whilst boosting my confidence and self belief.

All I can ask is for you to have faith and trust within me as I warningly hold open my hands to take anyone who is willing upon an unforgettable journey that's is sure to break boundaries in the world of fashion. My mind knows no limits to what can be achieved if given the right support and help from others that believe in me.


What We Need & What You Get

For this project to be successful in keeping up the quality of design work that I’m aiming to achieve, I’m looking to raise around £3080 or more if I should be seen lucky enough!

Some of the key components the funding will be put towards include,

  • cost of materials and embellishments
  • Support from dressmakers/pattern cutters. (I'll initially be doing all the dress making myself as this is my project but if I should come to an area out of my exsperties then I'll have a budget put by to help out)
  • the lovely crochet lady who lives down the road from me
  • a doll maker who has the most amazing uniqueness
  • and one of the most important key features for one of my designs is a beautiful faux fur coat inspired by Cerberus, a three headed dog that guards the gates to the underworld, (Trust me it’s going to be unforgettable!).

I’ll also be looking to hire a videographer to help create an artistic short fashion video to help bring my creations to life and have as an introduction to the collection before coming out on the catwalks. There will also be photography done too for promotional and advertisement purposes.

I’ve already planned and am looking ahead in researching costs for services and have been given quotes from various collaborators to help give me an idea on how to allocate funding.

One of the main features in this project as you may have already gathered is to collaborate with various artists and crafters to not only showcase my work at its best but also there’s too, creating a unique platform that will provide individual opportunities having possibly never been offered to them before. I love to help others and get talented people involved.

Some more unique features to my collection that is sure to make it stand out from anything seen before showcases use of a variety of unimaginable materials such as a Charleston dress made from ruff cut crystals and animal bones! A fly net covered in dazzling diamonds, ghostly honey bees, 3D printing, Doily dresses, candles and that’s just the normal stuff!

During the catwalk show itself the models will be in a state of dramatic role play creating a mesmerising atmosphere foretelling the stories behind their characters while putting on a breathtaking showcase of creative infused fashion. Mourning bride, fallen angels, a sinful nun, ballerina, urban Jesus, the duchess and plenty more... tallying up to a total of 15 looks eagerly awaiting to breathe life into the world.


Your Perks!

In donating towards our creative project I’ve created a quirky set of perks that is sure to brighten up even the darkest of days. Just a little way for me to personally say Thank You and to show that your support really means the world...


             






          • For those who wish to splash the cash gifting us with £99, you shall receive an all exclusive signature Dreamcatcher traditionally handmade with suede, feathers and colourful threads hanging a cleansing crystal in the webbed centre to capture any unwanted nightmares allowing only the positively happiest of dreams to come floating in.






          *Note to Contributors*

          All perks will be posted out within the first few weeks after contributing unless you've chosen one of my bespoke services which will require a little more time for me to handcraft your special design. Updates will be provided throughout this process.



          The Impact

          Reaching my goal and completing my first ever full collection will have a massive impact on my life as well as positively boosting my self-belief in all that I do helping to once again rebuild my confidence giving back a piece of me that was torn away long ago.

          Although having already achieved far beyond my wildest expectations at such a young age, each of my accomplishments has in turn given me something truly unique back that I shall always treasure until the end of time itself but even so amongst all my international collaborations, publications and spotlight features, still there is something missing that I know my Redemption collection holds the key to finding...

          When I was a child I was so full of carefree happiness even though under the surface my family unit was struggling with some pretty traumatic things, I never once showed the world my pain. Being bullied throughout high school eventually managed to crack away my mask taking the last fibbers of who I was as person and like an empty vessel the void was filled with something that really wasn’t me. My collection will help to rid myself from the last remains of this darkness allowing me to ascend to a higher state of mind starting a new journey where as individual I’ll be able to support and use my talents to help others in giving them hope and power to not allow the same events to control their lives. Showing them that you don’t have to settle with second best of what the others make you out to be and YES it is alright to dream big as you only get to live this unique life once. Not a single moment show be wasted nor stolen.


          A few recent achievements have seen my designs showcased on the catwalks of Clothes Show Live and personally commissioned by the BBC costume department to make a crown for TV’s Strictly Come Dancing.


          Please check out my press page to see more, http://www.mysticmagiconline.co.uk/#!press/c1lsd


          By now you should know just how much of an impact this project means to me and my followers and how closely guarded it is to my heart, but for you as the contributor and to the rest of the world, this collection without even being released yet has already started to grow in anticipation from my ever expanding fan base (all of who I am forever grateful and honoured in having).

          By contributing you will not only make me blush like a tomato but you’ll be investing a tiny piece into the success of Mystic Magic, and a collection that could very well set a whole new level of standards towards young fashion designers worldwide. Not to mention the support of helping young individuals to succeed in life where trying to build a career is like finding the end of a rainbow!

          To the world this collection could open up a whole new light on design and inspire generations yet to come in experimenting with their talents. On many ocassions I've been referred to as a young visionary with an eye for creativity much like the late Alex McQueen.

          I’d also be more than happy to keep everyone who funds me updated on all the latest progress as it happens, photos included. I want to make you just as involved in creating this collection as I am so that together we can go through the same changing steps of excitement when seeing everything completed for the very first time.


          Risks & Challenges

          With any big project there’s always going to be risks involved. One of the major issues I’m facing at the moment is time, being able to clear time to make the designs for this collection and giving time for collaborators to craft selected components that I may not otherwise be able to do myself. As I am only one self-employed person who runs my whole business 24/7 I have to stretch out to keep on top of everything else allocating segments of time towards each project - You cannot rush perfection.

          • Other obstacles that I may face along the way could be achieving my expectations as some of my designs even though I can clearly see them living in my head may actually not be as easy to pull out into the real world, but life was never meant to be easy! When fate gives you lemons, I bake a cake - I’ve come across many challenges in my career and thankfully have managed to overcome them fantastically learning a thing or two along the way.
          • When the collection is completed and we get round to doing the photography and video side of things I can imagine there may be a few hiccups pop up but yet again can easily be seen to as they arise. I have a vast experience in organising photo shoots for showcasing my design work.

          With all these risks and obstacles there will somewhere be a solution and with my near unbreakable determination I will most definitely overcome them one way or another!


          Other Ways You Can Help

          Even if you can’t afford to contribute don't worry it's all ok you can still play a big part in helping me to achieve my goal. Spread the word to your family and friends and then ask them to do the same. Maybe they or you might know of someone who'd be up for making a contribution? 

          Give me a Like on Facebook or a Follow on Twitter. The more people who get to hear about my Redemption collection and the word of Mystic Magic the better!

          Don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

          And you could even share my website too if you like, www.mysticmagiconline.co.uk


          Sending Lots of Happy Vibes and a BIG...

          Thank you!!

We are now magically InDemand and still able to accept contributions from all and any who would love to get involved with helping create my unmissable collection - plus we've still got exclusive perks available too!

the ashes" This collection will be the means to an end and the beginning
to a life changing transition that needs your support in order to succeed.
By creating this collection and unleashing it upon the world, it will
allow me to lay bare my scars and release all the hatred that has shrouded
my life for so long, turning something truly ugly into a work of beautiful
artistic expression. Words cannot even begin to describe how much this
whole project means to me on a spiritual level and the self healing
it will achieve whilst boosting my confidence and self belief.
All I can ask is for you to have faith and trust within me as I warningly
hold open my hands to take anyone who is willing upon an unforgettable journey
that's is sure to break boundaries in the world of fashion. My mind knows no
limits to what can be achieved if given the right support and help from others
that believe in me.




   What We Need & What You GetFor this project to be successful in keeping up the
quality of design work that I’m aiming to achieve, I’m looking to raise around £3080
or more if I should be seen lucky enough!Some of the key components the funding will be put
towards include, 
cost of materials and embellishments
Support from
dressmakers/pattern cutters. (I'll initially be doing all the dress making myself as this is my project but if I should come to an area out of my exsperties then I'll have a budget put by to help out)

the lovely crochet lady who lives down the road
from me
a doll maker who has the most amazing uniqueness
and one of the most important key features for one of my
designs is a beautiful faux fur coat inspired by Cerberus, a three headed dog
that guards the gates to the underworld, (Trust me it’s going to be unforgettable!).


I’ll also be looking to hire a videographer to help
create an artistic short fashion video to help bring my creations to life
and have as an introduction to the collection before coming out on the
catwalks. There will also be photography done too for promotional and
advertisement purposes. 
I’ve already planned and am looking ahead in researching
costs for services and have been given quotes from various collaborators to help
give me an idea on how to allocate funding. 
One of the main features in this project as you may have already gathered is
to collaborate with various artists and crafters to not only showcase my work
at its best but also there’s too, creating a unique platform that will provide
individual opportunities having possibly never been offered to them
before. I love to help others and get talented people involved.
Some more unique features to my collection that is sure to make it
stand out from anything seen before showcases use of a variety of unimaginable
materials such as a Charleston dress made from ruff cut crystals and animal
bones! A fly net covered in dazzling diamonds, ghostly honey bees, 3D printing,
Doily dresses, candles and that’s just the normal stuff! 
During the catwalk show itself the models will be in a state of dramatic
role play creating a mesmerising atmosphere foretelling the stories behind
their characters while putting on a breathtaking showcase of creative infused
fashion. Mourning bride, fallen angels, a sinful nun, ballerina, urban Jesus,
the duchess and plenty more... tallying up to a total of 15 looks eagerly awaiting
to breathe life into the world. 

Your Perks!
In
donating towards our creative project I’ve created a quirky set of
perks that is sure to brighten up even the darkest of days. Just a little
way for me to personally say Thank You and to show that your support really means the world...
 










For those who wish to splash
     the cash gifting us with £99, you shall receive an all exclusive
     signature Dreamcatcher traditionally handmade with suede, feathers
     and colourful threads hanging a cleansing crystal in the webbed centre to
     capture any unwanted nightmares allowing only the positively happiest
     of dreams to come floating in.














*Note to
Contributors*
All perks
will be posted out within the first few weeks after contributing unless you've chosen
one of my bespoke services which will require a little more time for me to
handcraft your special design. Updates will be provided throughout this
process.    The Impact
Reaching my goal and completing my first ever full
collection will have a massive impact on my life as well as positively boosting
my self-belief in all that I do helping to once again rebuild my confidence
giving back a piece of me that was torn away long ago.
 


Although having already achieved far beyond my wildest expectations at such
a young age, each of my accomplishments has in turn given me something truly
unique back that I shall always treasure until the end of time itself but even
so amongst all my international collaborations, publications and spotlight
features, still there is something missing that I know my Redemption collection
holds the key to finding... 
When I was a child I was so full of carefree happiness even though under the
surface my family unit was struggling with some pretty traumatic things, I
never once showed the world my pain. Being bullied throughout high school eventually
managed to crack away my mask taking the last fibbers of who I was as person
and like an empty vessel the void was filled with something that really wasn’t me.
My collection will help to rid myself from the last remains of this darkness allowing
me to ascend to a higher state of mind starting a new journey where as
individual I’ll be able to support and use my talents to help others in giving
them hope and power to not allow the same events to control their lives.
Showing them that you don’t have to settle with second best of what the others
make you out to be and YES it is alright to dream big as you only get to live
this unique life once. Not a single moment show be wasted nor stolen. 

A few recent achievements have seen my designs showcased on the catwalks of Clothes
Show Live and personally commissioned by the BBC costume
department to make a crown for TV’s Strictly Come Dancing.



Please
check out my press page to see more, http://www.mysticmagiconline.co.uk/#!press/c1lsd


By now
you should know just how much of an impact this project means to me and my followers and
how closely guarded it is to my heart, but for you as the contributor and to
the rest of the world, this collection without even being released yet has
already started to grow in anticipation from my ever expanding fan base (all
of who I am forever grateful and honoured in having). 
By
contributing you will not only make me blush like a tomato but you’ll be
investing a tiny piece into the success of Mystic Magic, and a collection that
could very well set a whole new level of standards towards young fashion designers
worldwide. Not to mention the support of helping
young individuals to succeed in life where trying to build a career is like
finding the end of a rainbow!
To the
world this collection could open up a whole new light on design and inspire
generations yet to come in experimenting with their talents. On many ocassions I've been referred to as a young visionary with an eye for creativity much like the late Alex McQueen.
I’d also
be more than happy to keep everyone who funds me updated on all the latest progress
as it happens, photos included. I want to make you just as involved in creating
this collection as I am so that together we can go through the same changing steps
of excitement when seeing everything completed for the very first time.


    Risks & Challenges  

With any
big project there’s always going to be risks involved. One of the major issues
I’m facing at the moment is time, being able to clear time to make the designs
for this collection and giving time for collaborators to craft
selected components that I may not otherwise be able to do myself. As I am
only one self-employed person who runs my whole business 24/7 I have to stretch
out to keep on top of everything else allocating segments of time towards
each project - You cannot rush perfection.

Other obstacles that I may
     face along the way could be achieving my expectations as some of my
     designs even though I can clearly see them living in my head may actually
     not be as easy to pull out into the real world, but life was never meant
     to be easy! When fate gives you lemons, I bake a cake - I’ve come
     across many challenges in my career and thankfully have managed to
     overcome them fantastically learning a thing or two along the way.


When the collection is
     completed and we get round to doing the photography and video side of things
     I can imagine there may be a few hiccups pop up but yet again can easily
     be seen to as they arise. I have a vast experience in organising photo
     shoots for showcasing my design work. 

With all
these risks and obstacles there will somewhere be a solution and with my near
unbreakable determination I will most definitely overcome them one way or
another!

    Other Ways You Can Help 

Even if you can’t afford to contribute don't worry it's all ok you can
still play a big part in helping me to achieve my goal. Spread the word to your
family and friends and then ask them to do the same. Maybe they or you might know of someone who'd be up for making a contribution? Give me a Like on Facebook or a Follow on Twitter. The more people who get to
hear about my Redemption collection and the word of Mystic Magic the better! 
Don’t forget
to use the Indiegogo share tools! 
And you could even share my website too if you like, www.mysticmagiconline.co.ukSending Lots of Happy Vibes and a BIG...
Thank you!!

story:
DIFFERENT WAY TO WEAR

Keeping with its versatile nature, the Mexxenger can be worn in differerent ways, depending on your needs and style preferences.

EASY TO TRANSFORM

Magnetic Strap Latch
A free-spinning fidlock magnetic latch allows quick, directionless, and strong locking action.

You can change the way you want to wear Mexxenger by unlocking the fidlock in a second. By removing the strap, Mexxenger becomes a briefcase.

 

Quick Adjustment Strap Design

A patented strap goes on either shoulder, offering quick and painless adjustment, and multiple ways to wear the Mexxenger.

 

Exchangeable Inner-Padding

Mexxenger is design for exchangeable Inner-Padding. Inner-Paddings are functional inner bag that can be put into Mexxenger, and turn Mexxenger into another bag.

The camera inner-padding is a padded camera insert protects equipment and lenses for photographers or camera lovers.

The waterproof padding is perfect for outdoor use or for separating sweaty gym clothes, swim wear, or damp clothes from the rest of your bag. The lining can also be filled with ice, making a perfect mobile cooler for drinks or food.

 

Standalone Inner-Padding

With Extra Strap (come along with Mexxenger), you can use both Camera and Waterproof Inner-Padding as stand alone Camera bag or Gym bag.

 

 

 

 

 

EASY TO ACCESS USB CHARGING POCKET

You can connect to your powerbank inside the Mexxenger and wire it easily to the upper pouch for quick access.

SUPPORT WIRELESS CHARGING

Mexxenger has a dedicated wireless charging pouch to give your phone juice on the go. The charging pad supports Qi enabled smartphones, and will support the latest iPhone. USB charging is also available.

 

 

GREEN AND DURABLE

Mexxenger is a green product, designed using recycled PET and repurposed rubber tube to create a durable product that keeps mother earth in mind.

 

 

Mexxenger is designed for IoT era. There are various pocket and pouch dedicated for your smart devices. It's the bag that aims to meet your mobile life style necessities.

Every Mexxenger is equipped with Smart Badge system. This unique system allow unlimited expansion of smart features.

Together with Mexxenger, we have 3 kinds of Smart Badges for you to choose: Smart Display, Life Camera, and Mood Torch.

 

You can flash your mood or create your own EMOJI and communicate with the world in a different, fun, and more interesting way.

Turning on Anti-Theft Alert, both your smartphone and the DISPLAY badge will alert you if the distance between two devices is greater than 3 meters.

Biker mode transforms Smart DISPLAY into a turn signal light.

The Mood Torch is a flashlight that can be used to display your mood via a colour display, using the PAIX app.

The Mood Torch can be mounted to a metal coil tube to create a personal desk lamp. It’s also a programmable light-based alarm clock, that wakes you up via light display.

Life Camera shoot both video and photograph.

story:
Hi Crowd Funders

Firstly let me thank you for spending your time checking out the VYZA grab strap. VYZA is the clever sun visor mounted vehicle storage solution for holding sunglasses, mobile phones almost anything, have a look at our video and I'm sure you will understand why our initial customers say that they firstly dont know why this hasn't been done before and secondly how they got by without it!

Thanks again!

Jim and the team at VYZA

If you have any questions or feedback please don't hesitate to e-mail us at info@vyza.com.au
www.vyza.com.au

www.facebook.com/vyza.grab.strap

www.instagram.com/vyza.grab.strap



WHY WE CREATED THE VYZA GRAB STRAP

After twenty years in the eye-wear industry people kept telling me how they always damaged their sunglasses in their car by sitting on them or leaving them in the glove box or console.


From this VYZA was designed, during the testing phase it soon became apparent that VYZA was not only great at safely securing sunglasses  but could also hold mobile phones, wallets, garage door openers, reading glasses almost anything which solved the same problem people all over the world experience of unsecured items being damaged or hard to locate in their vehicles. 


HOW IT WORKS

The VYZA grab strap is fully adjustable to fit all vehicle types, simply use the adjustment loops to set your size and slide your VYZA into position on your sun visor.

VYZA incorporates three innovative "GRIP STRIPS" on the inner surface to ensure whatever you need VYZA to hold stays in place.


The VYZA grab strap can hold just about anything in your car and keeps it in close proximity so those important objects are never out of reach.


WHO NEEDS A VYZA?

Our research shows that anyone who spends time in their vehicle would benefit from using a VYZA. It stands to reason though that those that spend an extended period in their vehicle would find VYZA most useful people like.

- Couriers

- Bus and Truck drivers

- Taxi & Uber drivers

- Emergency services workers

- Sales representatives

VYZA NOT JUST FOR CARS?

Not only have our initial customers told us how great the VYZA works in their cars they have also told us they have used their VYZA for things we never thought of.

How about holding your pad, phone  and reading glasses together when you get out of your car?

Travelling? Use your VYZA to keep your documents, wallet, tickets together.

How about holding your snow skis together when you're walking to the lifts?

Someone even used their VYZA as an emergency dog collar.

Whatever it is if you have a crazy new way to use your VYZA let us know.



WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

Now the design work is done and the initial manufacturing run complete our goal is to get this great product out to the market place not only in Australia but worldwide.

The problem we have is after spending more than twelve months on getting the VYZA project to this stage our cash reserves are exhausted.

In order for us to realise the next stage we need your support in helping fund a larger manufacturing run and the search for distributors around the world.

The great news is by helping us we can help you by offering you VYZA grab straps in return for your support, check out our perks for what's on offer, the stock is already in the warehouse so you will receive your reward in under a month from the completion date of the campaign.


TESTIMONIALS
Testimonials here including what they use the VYZA for.. (3 or 4 testimonials should do).

PRODUCT MATERIALS
VYZA is made from:
- Elastic material: stretches over the object so it doesn't get crushed
- Adjustment clips: makes the VYZA fully adjustable
- Silicone grip strips: keeps objects from sliding out
 


PERKS

1 x VYZA Grab Strap - Get one for yourself!


2 x VYZA Grab Straps - Get one for each sun-visor in your car!


6 x VYZA Grab Straps - Over 20% Discount - Get one for your family and friends!


12 x VYZA Grab Straps - Over 30% Discount - Get one for yourself, each sun-visor in your car and for family and friends (Christmas is coming).


30 x VYZA Grab Straps - For retailers! Includes FREE point of sale counter stand. HUGE 45% Discount - sell at the RRP and make a great profit!


FAQ's

Does the VYZA grab strap come in different colours?

At this stage we have only produced the VYZA in one colour however it is possible to supply VYZA in a range of strap colour and logos provided demand and quantities were sufficient.


Do you ship VYZA anywhere in the world. ( outside Australia)?

Yes, we can send your VYZA anywhere in the world, just remember to add $25 aud to cover registered shipping costs outside of Australia.


How will you be using the funds raised from the campaign?

As our initial manufacturing run was quite small we intend to use a percentage of the funds raised to finance a larger order of VYZA stock. In addition the remainder will be used to build the business by sourcing sales agents to represent VYZA in key global markets such as USA, Europe and Asia.


How long will it take to receive my VYZA grab strap?

As we already have stock in the warehouse you will receive your VYZA within 30 days of the completion of the campaign.


What happens if my order gets lost in transit?

No problem, all shipments are sent registered mail so we are able to trace the item at any stage of the delivery process.


How can I order another VYZA grab strap after the crowd funding campaign?

Easy, just get on our website VYZA.com.au to place your order.


I have some questions i would like to ask before I support this campaign who can I speak to?

Please feel free to contact us via email on info@vyza.com.au and we will get right back to you.


VYZA TEAM


If you have any questions or feedback please don't hesitate to e-mail us at info@vyza.com.au

www.vyza.com.au

www.facebook.com/vyza.grab.strap

www.instagram.com/vyza.grab.strap

story:
Introducing A.Lynn

The new apparel line that gives the masses a tailor-made experience for their core wardrobe:

  • The fabrics are made with the highest quality fibers available that are sustainable, washable, and extremely soft (feeling like silk without being dry-clean only and unaffordable).
  • There are 15 different sizes to customize the fit to your specific body type. We offer all of our styles in 5 sizes and 3 different lengths to create the perfect fit for you.
  • We have created the A.Lynn Starter Kit, which gives you the opportunity to feel all of the fabrics and find your perfect fit before you buy. Get your kit and eliminate the frustration of returns/exchanges/surprises when you open your A.Lynn garment!
  • Choose the fabric -- Choose the style -- Choose the size -- Choose the length -- Make it YOU

 

The Starter Kit

Choose the garment components before you, using your Starter Kit:

  • Fabric swatch-book of the 10 core fabric qualities A.Lynn offers
  • Logo measuring tape + "how-to-measure" card to find the perfect size for you
  • Receive a discount code to put toward your first apparel purchase, which is more than the total cost of the Starter Kit! ...And re-use the box to organize all sorts of things!

 

The Apparel

We offer both women's and men's apparel. Our garments are designed to be the base of your outfit and can be styled to take you through any day or evening. 

  • Simple silhouettes that focus on fit, fabric, and functionality
  • The base to your outfit and meant to be built upon with fun accessories and overlay pieces
  • We are starting with 12 styles (9 womens/ 3 mens)
  • The silhouettes range from tee shirts to dresses to sweatshirts and even a bralette

 

The Collaborators

We offer the base, but we are also here to help you style your A.Lynn if needed! We have hand-picked amazing accessory designers that will bring your A.Lynn to life in a vibrant way.  

  • We are starting with 3 main collaborators (1 fine jewelry, 1 industrial jewelry, 1 bags)
  • Our pieces are shown with suggested collaborator items, which are all chosen by our stylists
  • These collaborators help to make A.Lynn a one-stop shop for sustainable and unique outfits!

 

Getting A.Lynn Into Your Hands

We want to make sure we have all sizes and fabrics ready to ship to give everyone their perfect customized apparel! 

  • We are planning to go live with taking orders by May 28, 2018
  • We will be e-comm only to start...find us at www.alynndesigns.com
  • We are open to anyone that wants to make some wholesale deals after we launch 
  • We will ship domestic and some international countries (more details to come...)
  • We will have inventory for all styles, sizes and kits ready for you to purchase via the e-shop
  • We cannot meet our deadline and continue to develop new styles and ideas without your help!

We Need Your Support

A small investment from you can give us a bigger boost than you might imagine...

We need your help to get enough inventory to take this to the masses and spread the good word. 

See what your donations can do:

  • Back our 300 skus with inventory that will provide happy customers with goods within 2 days
    • Yes, we plan to offer fast shipping just like our friends at Amazon...
  • Keep us developing and fulfilling orders for the coming 2-3 seasons
  • Help pay our domestic factory workers and fabric mills (all based in L.A.) to produce the A.Lynn goods by May 2018
  • Also pay for online marketing and advertising to create growth and prosperity for the brand to continually expand and succeed
  • Your donation could help to make it possible for anyone world-wide to be able to purchase a core garment made for their specific needs!

 

Risks & Challenges

Creating a new product is never easy, and it comes with a lot of challenges. 

Aside from funding challenges (hence us being on Indiegogo), startups face risks such as their brand not growing at the projected pace, hitting production bumps along the way, not shipping on time, or having quality control issues. There are too many challenges to list here, but it is the strengths a company has to overcome those challenges that matters! We strongly believe in what we are doing and in the product that we will create. We have no doubt that people will share their love for A.Lynn as soon as they experience it for themselves.

 

Here's what we have to get us through the hurdles:

  • A founder that has been in the fashion industry for over 10 years, directing production departments for successful brands such as Zac Posen, Alice+Olivia and Rebecca Taylor.
  • Strong domestic and overseas connections with high-quality factories who have been in business for 20+ years, creating high-end fashion apparel
  • Connections with a multitude of fabric mills, many of which carry sustainable/made in America fibers and fabrics
  • Distribution channels that are setup for 2-day shipping and getting the product to the customer in the most beautiful and efficient way possible...used by other brands such as Bonobos, Glossier, Boll and Branch and Away.
  • The founder has been the head of fittings for the companies she directed, leading us to create the perfect patterns and provide our consumer's with the best fit possible!
  • A fit model that has 15 years of experience fitting for companies such as Theory, Rag and Bone, Alice + Olivia, Zac Posen, and Ralph Lauren.
  • Photographers/ Hair stylists/ Makeup artists who have worked for celebrities, Nike, Vogue, and more...
  • Most of all, passion...WE LOVE WHAT WE DO!!!

 

Like Us, Share Us, Spread the Word...

Some of you may not be able to contribute, but that is OKAY! We can still use your help to spread the word about A.Lynn...

  • Follow us and tag us on Instagram @a.lynndesigns
  • Like our page and share us on Facebook @A.LynnDesign
  • Visit our website www.alynndesigns.com and join our mailing list for special deals and info!
story_txt:
Introducing A.Lynn
The new apparel line that gives the masses a tailor-made experience for their core wardrobe:

The fabrics are made with the highest quality fibers available that are sustainable, washable, and extremely soft (feeling like silk without being dry-clean only and unaffordable).
There are 15 different sizes to customize the fit to your specific body type. We offer all of our styles in 5 sizes and 3 different lengths to create the perfect fit for you.
We have created the A.Lynn Starter Kit, which gives you the opportunity to feel all of the fabrics and find your perfect fit before you buy. Get your kit and eliminate the frustration of returns/exchanges/surprises when you open your A.Lynn garment!
Choose the fabric -- Choose the style -- Choose the size -- Choose the length -- Make it YOU

 
The Starter Kit
Choose the garment components before you, using your Starter Kit:

Fabric swatch-book of the 10 core fabric qualities A.Lynn offers

Logo measuring tape + "how-to-measure" card to find the perfect size for you

Receive a discount code to put toward your first apparel purchase, which is more than the total cost of the Starter Kit! ...And re-use the box to organize all sorts of things!



 
The Apparel
We offer both women's and men's apparel. Our garments are designed to be the base of your outfit and can be styled to take you through any day or evening. 

Simple silhouettes that focus on fit, fabric, and functionality
The base to your outfit and meant to be built upon with fun accessories and overlay pieces
We are starting with 12 styles (9 womens/ 3 mens)
The silhouettes range from tee shirts to dresses to sweatshirts and even a bralette



 
The Collaborators
We offer the base, but we are also here to help you style your A.Lynn if needed! We have hand-picked amazing accessory designers that will bring your A.Lynn to life in a vibrant way.  

We are starting with 3 main collaborators (1 fine jewelry, 1 industrial jewelry, 1 bags)
Our pieces are shown with suggested collaborator items, which are all chosen by our stylists
These collaborators help to make A.Lynn a one-stop shop for sustainable and unique outfits!


 
Getting A.Lynn Into Your Hands
We want to make sure we have all sizes and fabrics ready to ship to give everyone their perfect customized apparel! 

We are planning to go live with taking orders by May 28, 2018
We will be e-comm only to start...find us at www.alynndesigns.com

We are open to anyone that wants to make some wholesale deals after we launch 
We will ship domestic and some international countries (more details to come...)
We will have inventory for all styles, sizes and kits ready for you to purchase via the e-shop
We cannot meet our deadline and continue to develop new styles and ideas without your help!



We Need Your Support
A small investment from you can give us a bigger boost than you might imagine...
We need your help to get enough inventory to take this to the masses and spread the good word. 
See what your donations can do:

Back our 300 skus with inventory that will provide happy customers with goods within 2 daysYes, we plan to offer fast shipping just like our friends at Amazon...

Keep us developing and fulfilling orders for the coming 2-3 seasons
Help pay our domestic factory workers and fabric mills (all based in L.A.) to produce the A.Lynn goods by May 2018
Also pay for online marketing and advertising to create growth and prosperity for the brand to continually expand and succeed
Your donation could help to make it possible for anyone world-wide to be able to purchase a core garment made for their specific needs!



 
Risks & Challenges
Creating a new product is never easy, and it comes with a lot of challenges. 
Aside from funding challenges (hence us being on Indiegogo), startups face risks such as their brand not growing at the projected pace, hitting production bumps along the way, not shipping on time, or having quality control issues. There are too many challenges to list here, but it is the strengths a company has to overcome those challenges that matters! We strongly believe in what we are doing and in the product that we will create. We have no doubt that people will share their love for A.Lynn as soon as they experience it for themselves.
 
Here's what we have to get us through the hurdles:

A founder that has been in the fashion industry for over 10 years, directing production departments for successful brands such as Zac Posen, Alice+Olivia and Rebecca Taylor.
Strong domestic and overseas connections with high-quality factories who have been in business for 20+ years, creating high-end fashion apparel
Connections with a multitude of fabric mills, many of which carry sustainable/made in America fibers and fabrics
Distribution channels that are setup for 2-day shipping and getting the product to the customer in the most beautiful and efficient way possible...used by other brands such as Bonobos, Glossier, Boll and Branch and Away.
The founder has been the head of fittings for the companies she directed, leading us to create the perfect patterns and provide our consumer's with the best fit possible!
A fit model that has 15 years of experience fitting for companies such as Theory, Rag and Bone, Alice + Olivia, Zac Posen, and Ralph Lauren.
Photographers/ Hair stylists/ Makeup artists who have worked for celebrities, Nike, Vogue, and more...
Most of all, passion...WE LOVE WHAT WE DO!!!



 
Like Us, Share Us, Spread the Word...
Some of you may not be able to contribute, but that is OKAY! We can still use your help to spread the word about A.Lynn...

Follow us and tag us on Instagram @a.lynndesigns

Like our page and share us on Facebook @A.LynnDesign

Visit our website www.alynndesigns.com and join our mailing list for special deals and info!

story:
I’m a Hollywood hippie living life in an über positive manner while leading by example. In this lifetime I plan on inspiring people of all ethnicities and socioeconomic statuses to continuously transcend their current state of life. We don’t ride conveyor belts... escalate! Watch as I demonstrate...

Vinyl Bumper Sticker


  I’m using IndieGoGo to help me raise $5,500 which will provide me with the balance of funds needed to establish a legit fashion line (DEMONSTRATE) and supply a line sheet to major fashion retailers. Camera lenses, fabrics, notions, raw materials for jewelry and an eCommerce website will all be purchased / built with these funds. In the rare event that I don't reach my goal in its entirety, I'll disburse the funds in a manner which will help me get closest to my goal in the shortest amount of time. 

Since I'm counting on you to help me raise the funds needed to start my clothing line, I'd like to help others attain the simple things needed for comfortable survival by contributing 10% of my annual sales to The Water Project. Our donation will provide HydrAid filters and other necessities to Kenyan Communities which cut CO2 emissions AND provide save drinking water!  You can read more about The Water Project by visiting  The Water Project - Clean Water for Kenyans

Independence is awesome but interdependence is greater which is why I created this campaign. I will be using social media and the weekly radio show I host (Libations & Relations) as a platform to promote my cause; living happily regardless of the hurdles life throws at you. I can't do this without YOU! Every dollar contributed will provide me with the financial means to get my line operational and every little bit helps.


Reversible Drawstring Canvas Carry All [16" x 13"]. 

Reversible Drawstring Canvas Carry All [16" x 13"]. 


Pistols and Peace Crewneck T



OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN! Please share this campaign on facebook, twitter, and your favorite social network! My goal is to get 3,000 shares - will you help me get there?

Questions? Feel free to leave a comment or email me at MsHarrisDemonstrates@gmail.com

story:
THE STORY

We are 5 individuals from 5 different countries. Every one of us witnessed a war in his or her country and was lucky enough to have an opportunity to escape the war and find a new Life in Germany.

We all went to middle school together and became close friends through the years. The War took away our childhood… Witnessing a war where your family members or friends got killed in front of your eyes or losing your house with everything you love, is something that no child in the world should go through.

We do not want to draw the attention on us personally, we want to bring attention to the Project and the cause. We see this Indiegogo Project as a chance to let our pain go, by designing Fashion that moves the world in a positive way.

People, who grew up in peace, can’t imagine what it’s like for children to actually witness war and be confronted with death in this young age. Watching TV and hearing about decisions which country should be bombed next is something that we at QuitWar don’t understand…

We know that War is not the solution; it’s the cause of many problems for humanity and therefore we want to get our voice heard and fight in our own creative and personal way! WE COUNT ON YOUR HELP!

 

OUR VISION

QuitWar is the Voice for Millions of children that have been present at events far beyond the worst nightmares of most adults... With your help we want to Launch QuitWar and make T-Shirts, Longsleevs and Bags with the QuitWar Logo and spread them in the whole world!

 

THE PRODUCT

 

HOW WILL WE DO IT?

  • We work together with a manufacturer from Germany who is a strong supporter of our Project.
  • We have a young talented fashion designer in our Team, who is working on future Designs.
  • We will make an International Online-Shop with different Products (The variety depends on how much money we will receive)
  • We will update everyone on Facebook & Twitter on the Status of our Project and blog about charity projects that we are involved in.
  • We will collect pictures of people world wide who are wearing the T-Shirt and supporting QuitWar and make an photo album that we will send out to all institutions that are involved in a war today.
  • With the help from a good friend of us who is a known International Music Producer, we will push our T-Shirts into the Music Industry and have Artists wear the shirts in public to draw more attention in the media.

 

OUR INITIAL GOAL

 

 

 

Thank you in advance for your generosity! We appreciate your help & support!  Please remember to help us spread the word

Please do not hesitate to send us an e-mail at QuitWar@live.de or contact us via Facebook if you have any questions.

story:
Summary (for iPhone, Android, Windows)
It breaks my heart when I hear another story about a child being abducted or a woman who is raped.  One day I had the radio on and heard a news report about a young, 25 year old mother who had vanished from her convenience store job late at night.  This is when the idea came to me that these smart phones all have quality cameras, but no matter how fast a person can operate the camera, she (or he) needs to save the photo before going back into the phone to "Contacts" in order to send that photo.  This process would take at least a minute!  When you're in a dangerous situation, things need to happen INSTANTLY.  I have spent all that I have developing APP TRAP... a smart phone app that enables someone to snap a photo and send it to 8 family members and friends along with their exact GPS location, all in an instant.
I've had to finance this using my credit card and my wife suggested Indiegogo but so far I'm not having any success.  I know my "perks" aren't great, but it's all I can offer right now.

I will now explain where the funds will be used if I'm fortunate enough to get the help I need.  The main reason I need funding, is to buy print ads in magazines such as "Parenting" and "Parents Magazine".  I'd like to put ads in college newspapers introducing young college students to this powerful, safety tool.  I would also like to place ads in Jogger magazines, etc.
APP TRAP has a motto... "Capture the face they won't have to sketch!"
Please take a moment and visit  
http://www.apptrapguide.com
I really hate to ask anyone for money, but I'm told that there are folks who will lend a hand to a worthwhile cause.  The app will be offered for $3.99 and that is a one time price with no monthly fees or renewal fees.
If you'd like to know who I am please go to http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DV8q2GO5Hxg
If you have Facebook friends or you know how to use Twitter, please if you will... send the http://www.apptrapguide.com  link to them.  Together, we can help to keep our daughters, sons and loved ones safe!
Sincerely,
-Denny Johnston-

story:
My Story

My name is Heather and I've been an avid gamer girl since I was 19 years old. The world of Dungeons and Dragons (aka - D&D) was my first gaming experience and I was in love. Gaming (and now Cosplay) has been a part of my life ever since.

I was out of work when everyone else was too and finally found a job that I liked. Then in November of 2013, after only six months of employment, they closed their doors with no notice. Since then, although I've been actively looking for work, nothing has come through besides temp jobs. That's when I decided to go into business for myself instead.

For the past few years I had been saving our family's throw-away jeans. No Idea why I saved them - but I did. Then I had a dream one day of what my business could be. I would take jeans that were about to be tossed out and recycle them into something that had always been a part of my life; gaming/dice bags. I've already told a lot of my friends/family about this and they've all donated about two dozen pair of jeans that were going to go into the garbage because of the extreme wear in them. Thanks to all of those people that have donated these so far! And an even bigger thanks to my boyfriend, Patrick, for being so supportive with this dream!


What I Need for This Dream

We have a craft room in our home and we're re-configuring it as we speak for my work area. An excellent plan has been set in motion for this but I need a few more things, like really good lighting and organizing cubicles to make this idea complete. 

I already have most of the big sewing supplies I need (including the sewing machine and serger). I also plan on getting a rhinestone setter and in the future, an embroidery machine (if the funding allows). I also have to purchase brand tags, shipping materials, grommets/setter, marketing materials and more. The list seems to grow every day. In the very near future I'll also be getting a new desktop PC. The laptop I'm currently using has been dying for awhile and I don't know how long it will last at this point. I will also be getting the newest Quickbooks program for my bookkeeping needs. 

Once I have the bags made, I'll need vendor fees to sell them at our local conventions. Those can range anywhere from $50 (just for the table, not including the membership/hotel) to $75 and up. 

A website will be in the works as well as setting up for my Etsy shop. Licensing has been researched and will be yet another expense. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Please help to spread the word! I know that not everyone can donate monetarily but sharing is helping too! And if you have jeans for me (in any shape/color/style) please email me and I can come and pick them up or we can meet. ~Cheers!

story:
With each watch purchased, one of our partner charities are supported to fulfill their mission. 

The 1:Face #MillionLivesChanged  campaign is a celebration of the 1,000,000 lives that you've changed over the last three years, since our first Indiegogo campaign.  To celebrate this accomplishment, we are introducing 1:Face :M in an effort to change 1,000,000 lives by doubling the donations to our partner organizations.

Share, support, purchase the 1:Face :M and you will help change the world for 

MISSION

Change the world by blending the elegance of high fashion and the compassion of philanthropy. Our partnerships with notable worldwide charities give us the platform to impact the lives around the world. From providing AIDS treatments with Keep A Child Alive or helping building schools with Pencils of Promise we are thankful for these organizations believing in our mission to bring support to their projects.

NOW WE ARE DOUBLING THE DONATIONS, INCREASING THE IMPACT OF EACH PURCHASE!

FEATURED IN

QUOTES FROM THE PRESS

 


 

OUR GOALS AND PROGRESS

SEE YOUR IMPACT

Now you can track your donations from beginning to end. By using your unique impact code you will be able to see the progress of your funded project and exact longitude and latitude coordinates. 


PERKS

How we are getting to the next million lives changed.

Early Bird: 1:Face :M - $79

Be one of the first 1000 supporters of Million Lives Changed and Get 20% OFF  the indiegogo price! Will Ship November 9th, 2015

Pick One 1:Face :M - $99

Support your cause pick one 1:Face :M watch from any of the eight causes.

Pick Two 1:Face :M - $179

Support two causes! Pick two 1:Face :M watches from any of the eight causes.

Pick Three 1:Face :M - $239

Three 1:Face :M watches! Pick any combination of three watches.

1 Full-Set of 1:Face :M - $750

Support every cause! You'll recieve one watch of each color. (8 total watches)

Distribution Pack of 1:Face :M - $3.2K

40 Watches - Five of each color (8x 5) 1:Face :M Watches

Life Changer Trip to India - $5K

Full set of 1:Face :M and an all expense paid trip to india to get your hands dirty while helping build a well with 1:Face and Gram Vikas.



OUR CHARITIES


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Now you can track your donations from beginning to end.  By using your unique Impact code you will be able to see the progress of your funded project and the exact latitude and longitude coordinates. 


FAQ

When will my watch be delivered?

Ship Date: December 6th, 2015

We know you want to show off your watch, so we are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the highest quality product!

Will the screen crack?

The screen is made out of tempered glass and will not crack unless there is a VERY heavy impact. If it does crack, let us know and we will either fix it or replace it.

Is there a warranty for the 1:Face watch?

Yes. There is a 1-year warranty. If there are any defects, our repair center will fix it or replace it. However, we strive to provide the highest quality materials so this will not be an issue.

How long does the battery last?

The watch battery lasts up to two years.

Can the battery be changed?

You can definitely replace the battery. Take it to any watch repair shop in your city and they'll be able to do it for you easily.

Is the watch water resistant?

Yes, water resistant 3 ATM.

Are the watches available in retail stores?

Not yet, but soon! 1:Face :M will be available in retailers in 2016.

What percentage of donations go to the charities?

Each watch comes with a metric which is carried out with the purchase of the watch.  We want to make the business model as transparent as possible and never want you to have to ask the question "And then what?"  With that said we will not only tell you what, we will show you what!

For example, for every white watch purchased, Faces of Change will provide 20 children in Kenya with food.  The same holds true for each of the other metrics. The goal is to create an actual quantified change in people's lives around the world for each watch sold.

Where are the watches manufactured?

The watches are designed at the Mirza Minds headquarters in Chicago, IL & assembled in Shenzhen, China. The facility has passed the SA8000 (Social Accountability) and ISO14000 (Environmental) audits. Furthermore, our manufacturing facility is ROHS compliant.

Now you can track your donations from beginning to end.  By using your unique Impact code you will be able to see the progress of your funded project and the exact latitude and longitude coordinates. 


FAQ



When will my watch be delivered?
Ship Date: December 6th, 2015
We know you want to show off your watch, so we are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the highest quality product!
Will the screen crack?
The screen is made out of tempered glass and will not crack unless there is a VERY heavy impact. If it does crack, let us know and we will either fix it or replace it. 
Is there a warranty for the 1:Face watch?
Yes. There is a 1-year warranty. If there are any defects, our repair center will fix it or replace it. However, we strive to provide the highest quality materials so this will not be an issue.
How long does the battery last?
The watch battery lasts up to two years. 
Can the battery be changed?
You can definitely replace the battery. Take it to any watch repair shop in your city and they'll be able to do it for you easily.
Is the watch water resistant?
Yes, water resistant 3 ATM. 
Are the watches available in retail stores?
Not yet, but soon! 1:Face :M will be available in retailers in 2016. 
What percentage of donations go to the charities?
Each watch comes with a metric which is carried out with the purchase of the watch.  We want to make the business model as transparent as possible and never want you to have to ask the question "And then what?"  With that said we will not only tell you what, we will show you what!
For example, for every white watch purchased, Faces of Change will provide 20 children in Kenya with food.  The same holds true for each of the other metrics. The goal is to create an actual quantified change in people's lives around the world for each watch sold.
Where are the watches manufactured?
The watches are designed at the Mirza Minds headquarters in Chicago, IL & assembled in Shenzhen, China. The facility has passed the SA8000 (Social Accountability) and ISO14000 (Environmental) audits. Furthermore, our manufacturing facility is ROHS compliant.

story:
Who am I 

Hello, 
My name is Katie, and I am widely known for my Alternative Fashions and especially my Steampunk looks. I have organized many fashion shows and been a part of over 35 shows in my 5 years of designing. Some images of the shows have been attached to this page. I have also organized several shows and photo shoots.  Right now, I am looking to raise money for a no holds barred fashion show. It is a long story, which you will read later in this request but the short story is that I was asked to make 20 looks for an event and was only permitted to show 10 at the last minute. I would like to raise money to exhibit all of the pieces in one big show.

Wait... what is this for 

I was interested in doing a show (which will remain nameless), where the requirement to apply was I that needed 20 new looks. Since I am a over achiever, I made 25. These looks included  a story line, so the looks where cohesive. I am a very small business (it's just me), so I purchased all the fabrics, made all the patterns, sewed the garments, and did all the finishing. This processes took 3 months. I made every part of each look, most looks involving 3-4 pieces.  When the show happened, one other designer and myself where only allowed to show 10 of the 20 pieces we were asked to design, while other designers got to show their whole line of 20 looks. You can imagine that is was very hard to "cut" over half of what I made. I took a huge risk, especially financially, but I am not looking to re-coup the money I spent. 
However, I am looking to raise money to show 30 of my designs. I need the funds to pay vendors (lights, sounds, makeup artist, hair stylists), for media invites, photographers, press releases and advertising. There are also the big things like renting space for the  show, getting refreshments, and possibly even a band for live music. 
My goal is to have tickets be free, if possible or sold for a very low cost. I want to spread the word that art things are happening in CT. I want to make it free so that people that might not otherwise come, will. My hope is that students and people who would not normally take the time to go to an "art" event due to the cost, will attend. It would also be a child friendly event, so families can also experience art in a way that sheds light on the everyday aspects of it.

story:
Jump to FUNDING BREAKDOWN

To start with, thanks for taking the time to open up our campaign and look into it.

Our company is a “semi-start-up” fashion brand which initially began while we were living and working in Abu Dhabi and Dubai.

Us, the founders, are me, Marlena Guzowski from Canada and my partner Rizwan (Riz) Zafar from Pakistan.

We met in Dubai where our thought was that men, and especially middle class/upper middle class guys are overlooked in the fashion industry.  We wanted to create smart casual and cool clothes for guys between the average ages of 25-50; guys who still wanted to look cool but not dress in cheap ‘teen store’ clothing. These men have some disposable income and want high quality but are not in the ranks of ‘Armani or Gucci’ purchasers.  They are the majority of our population and yet the majority of stores, rather than catering to this middle-class professional guy who needs cool every day clothes, sell either cheap cost, cheap quality (and usually cheap looking) clothing, or high(er) quality but overly expensive clothes.

We started with some trials in Pakistan where production is more expensive than in places such as China but is generally 100% natural fibers and many things are still handmade when done on a smaller scale.

We first opened up 2 stores in Lahore, Pakistan where we produced by the people and sold back to the people. We design all our clothes with the help of  a professional and very talented tailor who now also works as our General Manager on the Pakistani side of things.

After about a year our goal became to bring our products to the western world and what better place to build a reputation than the capital of fashion – Milan, Italy.

Besides building up a reputation as a true, high quality brand we also chose Milan due to the gaping lack of middle-class clothing in Italy.  Known as the capital of fashion, the majority of the population is simply middle class individuals working regular jobs. Conversely, most of the clothing stores in Italy are either highly over-priced or the exact opposite; very cheap, low quality products. It is nearly impossible to find decent quality at a decent price. Additionally, the extra hurdle for men in Milan is trying to find 'regular' clothes. The majority of stores either cater to full-out suits or super casual, teen wear. Anything in between is a rarity.

We have found a gap in Italy; a gap which actually exists in most countries but is just much more prominent here. 

Our ultimate goal is to return to North America and expand our stores in Canada and the US, keeping the same mentality as we started with; the production of high quality, natural clothing for middle-class men between the average ages of 25-50. We want to become an international clothing brand that real men can afford but are still proud to wear.

Outside of our business goals we hope to make a positive impact on the people we work with. We have started working on a small scale in Pakistan, helping families pay for the education of their children as well as funding independent producers of textiles by purchasing their equipment, such as industrial sewing machines etc...

Of course, all businesses need to make money to survive, however, our number 1 prerogative is not the highest profits possible, but reasonable profits for high quality items and the possibility to give back and work with the world around us.

Obviously we make basically zero in profits in Pakistan (due to their economy as well as the inflation and exchange rate). However, we have managed to pool our money and open up our first store in Milan, Italy. We have now been open around 2 months and things are going well but of course we need to look at months of bare survival before our business can support itself.

Additionally, to lower production and shipment costs as well as to gain audience trust we need to have more visibility  than just one small store. We need to ‘look and feel’ like a real brand. In order to do this, we need a minimum of another store in Milan within hopefully the next year and ultimately 3 stores within the city. Extra funds can also allow us to produce a greater variety of clothing immediately, which in turn will allow us to gain a reputation quicker and therefore grow faster.

Trying to do this with our own finances is brutally hard and being in one of the most expensive cities in the world means that we are barely scraping by.

If you believe in our image and our conviction that with some help and extra start-up funds we can become something great and lasting, help us, and in return we will give you some amazing perks and gifts. Go to the perks section to find out what awesome perks we have for you.

The Funds:

In the funding section we have broken down as simply as possible the funds necessary for the upkeep of our first store for approximately another 6 months (after which it is projected to be able to support itself), and separately the funds necessary to open up a second store and run it for about 9 months (again, the projected amount of time that it needs to begin supporting itself). We’ve tried to be as transparent as possible while refraining from killing our audience with scores of pages of financial calculations. If you need/want any more details regarding any aspect please feel free to contact us and we will give you as much detail as you require to make an educated decision.

We hope to open up 3 stores in Milan in the shortest time span possible, however, if we can obtain help with the first 2 we will be able to get to the opening of the third store on our own.

Anything helps. We will look for any and all means possible to gain the funds necessary for these two first stores. Everything we receive will get us one step closer and step by step we will succeed.  So thank you for helping us take these steps!

FUNDING BREAKDOWN

Our first store in Milan officially opened at the beginning of June, 2014. The month of our opening was based predominantly on locating and obtaining a good commercial location at a reasonable price.

This was the month during which the street was shut down for construction and will remain so until February 2015.

In the long term this is a very positive thing as major improvements are being done in this commercial neighbourhood in anticipation of Expo 2015 which will be in Milan beginning May 2015 and is expected to bring in around 40 million tourists.

However, for the short term, and especially for the first months of survival of a store this is a huge difficulty. Outside of trying to collect the total of 150, 000 Euros for expansion and growth, we really need assistance in covering our quarterly rent in October. If we could obtain the funds at least for this rent, which is 12K, we will have the time necessary to look for more funding solutions.

In its first month, the store earned around 1200. In its second month it earned 2000. We predict that in around 6 months it will earn enough monthly to pay for itself as well as production costs etc…

We therefore need funding to maintain the store for another 6 months.

Whatever the store earns for the next 6 months, on top of the funding, will be partially used to provide us with some basic salaries (which, since last year, we have not been able to have) as well as quicker growth.

If we receive enough funding we will also open a second store as soon as possible, in order to build up visibility before Expo 2015.

The financial breakdown is based on costs in Milan, which may or may not compare to your city of residence/work. For example, commercial rent in Milan is taxed at 22%. Therefore, each month you pay rent + 22%. For the rental of commercial properties the general rule of thumb is also the payment of 3 months deposit + 3 months forward, which may also vary depending on what country you reside in. If a specific cost does not make sense to you, please ask and we will clarify.

MAINTENANCE OF 1ST STORE FOR 6 MONTHS (in Euros)

RENT

24,000

BILLS: phone + electricity

1,000

PRODUCTION

5,000

SHIPMENT COSTS

1,500

STORE INSURANCE

700

WEBSITE + FACEBOOK UPDATES: includes photoshoot of new merchandise

2,000

Legal fees including accountant, additional taxes etc..

3,000

1st STORE TOTAL: 37 200 Euros



2nd STORE – OPENING + 9 MONTHS OF MAINTENANCE (in Euros)

RENT (9 months + 3 months deposit – based on similar type of property as current)

48,000

COMMERCIAL AGENT COMMISSION (6%)

2,880

BILLS (phone + electricity)

1,500

START UP PRODUCTION

12,000

1ST SHIPMENT

2,500

2ND PRODUCTION

5,000

2ND SHIPMENT (cost based on adding it to 1st store’s shipment)

1,000

LEGAL FEES (REGISTERING STORE ACTIVITY, SIGNAGE APPLICATION ETC…)

2,000

PROPERTY SAFETY EVALUATION AND REQUIRED EQUIMPENT

1,000

1 FULL TIME EMPLOYEE

18,000

STORE RENOVATIONS (based on cost of current store renovation costs)

10,000

STORE FURNITURE

3,000

COMPUTERS AND TECHNICAL

2,000

STORE INSURANCE

1400

2ND STORE TOTAL:  110 280 Eu 

TOTAL FOR BOTH STORES: 147 480 Euros. This is rounded up to 150 000 to account for any unforeseen expenses.

story:
Update: a huge thanks for the support! Those who didn't attend our pick-up party, please fill in the google form to complete your address details. We will send out all the goods within one week.

Official site: www.sizable.eu
Don't forget to add your shipping costs. thanks a lot!

Confidence, Comfort & Style brought to you by Sizable!

About a year ago, we faced the exact same problem as our friend Joe. At Sizable, we believe that underwear shouldn't stop you from being confident.Therefore, we created and designed Sizable - Invisible Undershirts in Brussels, the capital of Europe. What makes it truly revolutionary, is that Sizable provides a tailor-made solution for every man. We understand that people come in different body shapes, but no problem: we took care of that.

Sizable is available for the three body types, indicated with following logo's and names: 

                             


  • Jim: The tall, slim guy - available in S, M & L
  • Joe: Average Joe with standard posture - available in M, L & XL
  • Jack: Lumber Jack, with athletic posture - available in S, M & L


Our undershirts aren't white. Why?! So they don’t show through under a white or light-colored shirt. Thanks to the low V-neck, Sizable undershirts stay invisible, even with an extra button opened. Because of the slightly longer fit, the undershirt stays tucked in and doesn't bunch up under your shirt.



Sizable takes care of your body, which is why only the most ecological and high quality fabrics are used, bamboo and organic cotton. Bamboo fibers are extremely soft, for a comfortable feeling.Did you know that bamboo absorbs three to four times more moisture than any other fabric?



Sizable undershirts will truly change your life. And you know, the best thing about it is that people won’t even notice it, but they will see the difference. We need your help to continue our journey in providing a tailor-made solution that will bring confidence, comfort and style to the modern man. 


What We Need & What You Get

  • With your support, we want to raise 6.000 EUR to bring our products to the market. Thanks to your support, Sizable will be able to further expand the product range and produce extra series of undershirts and bamboo garments.
  • Today, we give you the opportunity to receive one of the first made-to-fit Sizable undershirts.
  • True adventure seekers can opt for a sweat-proof skydive experience or be the star in our next photo shoot!


Extra crowdfunding offer: Bamboo socks

  • Exclusively for our Indiegogo funders: Sizable super soft Bamboo socks.

True love is like a pair of socks: you gotta have two and they've gotta match. We will provide bamboo socks in black or navy blue color. Available in size 39-42 and 43-46.

Pick-up party!

Instead of receiving your products by mail (and pay for shipping costs), we invite you to raise a glass with us and receive your order, directly after the crowd funding campaign. On the 15th of May, you will be one of our honored guests at the unforgettable Sizable launch event, near Brussels.
In case you cannot join us, you can alternatively add an optional 5 EUR (or 15 EUR for international shipping) shipping cost in the Additional Gift category.

The Impact

  • Sizable produces all of their products in a responsible way, with respect to the highest standards of quality & sustainability. 
  • At Sizable, we use superior bamboo, a natural fabric with minimal impact on the environment.


Other Ways You Can Help

Sizable already contracted several stores in Belgium, but our ambition is to sell worldwide!

  • If one of your friends hasn't discovered Sizable - Invisible Undershirts yet, please help him and give him the confidence and style he deserves.
  • Support us by spreading the word and help us achieve our ambitions!


FAQ

How do I choose my model, size and color (for the socks)?

At the end of our campaign (14th of May), we will send you a link where you can choose model, size and color. 
How can I order your products on this site?
Please select the perk and do the checkout. You can pay by paypal or credit card. We can help you with the order and payment handling, just send an e-mail to sales [at] sizable.eu.

How do I account for shipping costs (Belgium/The Netherlands)?
Please add an optional 5 EUR in the Additional Gift category.
Does Sizable ship internationally? 
Yes we do! Please add 15 EUR to your order for European shipping or 30 EUR for international shipping. This can be paid by paypal.


A Special Thank You!

We want to thank each and everyone who supported us in our fantastic journey so far. A special thanks goes to: Julien Mannenmode (Puurs), Barramundo (Mechelen), our models and actors, the team of photographers and camera crew, our make-up artist and all the family and friends.


Meet the team!
