story:
A breakthrough product that combines for the first time Self Protected Lenses like no one has ever done before with Premium Italian Handmade craftsmanship into ONE Revolutionary pair of glasses. Functionality, Top notch materials, Timeless Italian Design and Manufacturing: ALL-IN-ONE. 

WHAT ARE WE SOLVING?

According to the Vision Council research 4 billion people in the world wear glasses. This means that most of them have dealt with broken or scratched lenses at least once in their life! For this reason, we've created the First Crash-Proof Self Protecting glasses!

All products are subjected to wear and tear. Glasses are one of the few products that wear especially when they’re not in use: you can squash them in your pocket, you can scrape them in your bag, you can drop them from your desk causing accidental breakages and scratches. It’s an endless cycle that over the course of a lifetime will lead to a huge expenditure and lots of hassle.

 

The revolutionary frame can rotate on itself, allowing the hinges to fully cover and protect the Carl Zeiss® Vision lenses, making them impossible to scratch.

We’ve designed a Unique Patented® Locking System built to last, extending the lifecycle of your glasses from today to forever. 

LIFETIME GUARANTEED LOCKING SYSTEM

Our Patented® Locking system requires zero maintenance and won’t loosen over time. The rotation mechanism is stress tested for over 500,000 rotations and it is Lifetime guaranteed.

The future of eyewear in the strongest, thinnest, most lightweight product ever made.

  • TYTUS’s temples are made with the strongest, most resistant and flexible Aerospace Grade Beta Titanium® 
  • TYTUS weighs only 15 grams which is almost unbelievable for the category
  • TYTUS are scratch and shatter resistant thanks to its Lifetime Guaranteed Patented Locking System
  • TYTUS is designed to be durable and its timeless design guarantee a perfect fit for any occasion, whether it's casual or formal

Titus (Latin pronunciation: [ˈtɪtʊs]) is a Latin praenomen, or personal name, and was one of the most common first names in the old world. It comes from deep antiquity and derives from the verb Tueor = to protect. Therefore, the meaning is the defender (guess of what?!)

Beautifully handmade in Italy. We strongly believe that every single Detail makes the difference.

TYTUS will become your daily essential companion with its timeless design. Its system will improve your vision maintaining your lenses always in optimal shape and saving money for repairs. 

Thanks to TYTUS you can take care of your expensive prescription lenses!

COLOR AND STYLE OPTIONS

TYTUS comes in two timeless styles in order to suit your stylish needs: the rounded TONDO and the squared QUADRO. Each element is smooth, modern and ultra minimal. They are shaped and fit perfectly on all face shapes and you can wear them confidently. You can wear them in any occasion, whether it's formal or casual, they will always looks good on you.

They feature 7 different tinted lenses — including the innovative anti blue light block lenses to improve your focus while using electronic devices — all supplied by the renowned company Carl ZEISS®. All you need to do is choosing between the two frames available (QUADRO and TONDO) in two colors (Black and Silver) and the lenses that most fit your needs (7 different colors available).

 1) Choose your Frame (both available in black and silver)

 2) Choose your fav Carl Zeiss Lenses 

All the lenses showed below are available. Polarized lenses will be available as addon at the end of the campaign. 

3) Choose your reward and be ready to join the revolution! 

The best technology for our product and for your Eyes. 

The lenses mounted on TYTUS spectacles are supplied by Carl Zeiss® Vision and produced in its own Italian facilities. Carl Zeiss® Vision provides a product that guarantees a safe, comfortable vision together with a high contrast able to protect your eyes from UV exposure. 

We chose this company as partner because is one of the most renowned manufacturer of optical systems in the world. And we want only the best for our products and for your eyes. 

ZEISS DuraVision® Blue Protect is a coating specially developed for people who spend a lot of their time indoors and are exposed to blue-violet light from LEDs as well as TV, computer, tablet screens and smartphones. 

Work in front of a screen all day? Take care of your eyes with Blue Light Block Lenses!

The two sides of blue-violet light 

• REGULATES CIRCADIAN RHYTHM 

There is a body of evidence to suggest that blue light in the spectrum between 400 and 520 nm with a maximum of 460nm is important for the proper regulation of melatonin in the body, which influences circadian rhythms and general well-being 

• INCREASES RISK OF MACULAR DEGENERATION 

On the other hand, evidence suggests that long-term exposure to blue-violet light below 460nm. with a maximum of 440 nm, may contribute to photochemical damage of the retina, increasing the risk of macular degeneration over time (known as the "blue light hazard"). Filtering blue-violet light at 440 nm and below should have a minor impact on circadian rhythm while providing beneficial protection from potential phototoxicity. 

We are Italians, we do it better (someone said... )

Each pair of glasses is hand made locally by expert hands. 

All jokes aside. We've decided to do everything, from design to manufacturing, here in Italy. We wanted to offer you a timeless design, premium materials and the most important thing: the expertise of the people who do glasses from ages. 

MOVITRA is an Italian company founded by Giuseppe Pizzuto, Filippo Pagliacci and Diego Ponzetto in 2016 and takes its name from the Latin: “Movere” that means movement and “Vitra” that means lens. Movitra has the aim of revolutionizing the world of eyewear, combining their innovative idea of changing perspective with a contemporary vision of design, premium materials and traditional craftsmanship.  

“As often happens, all started from a common story and a simple need: protecting glasses from accidental knocks and scratches. The story began when we were with friends at the beach. One of them bent over to pick up her child and her glasses fell to the ground landing with the lenses on the ground. Her lenses were irreparably scratched. 

That got us thinking: “We need a simple and practical system to protect the lenses”. It was essential for us that it should be something practical, something that can be done easily, just like folding a normal pair of glasses. 

From that day we started thinking about it and we came up with Movitra.” 

We need your support to bring this innovative product to life.

Every kind of support is more than appreciated and — as many of us — You can’t wait to have TYTUS glasses in your hands... please share the project with all your family and friends out there. All of them deserve a pair of TYTUS in their life! 

THANK YOU from the bottom of our hearts! <3

Filippo, Giuseppe, Diego

In one word, Italy.  We are Italians, we do it better (someone said... )Each pair of glasses is hand made locally by expert hands. All jokes aside. We've decided to do everything, from design to manufacturing, here in Italy. story:
The Pins

Team Mystic represents wisdom and evolution. The design invokes elements of Art Nouveau, which takes from the organically inspired swoops and swirls of Rococo. In other words, Art Nouveau is an evolution from Rococo! The brocade of Blanche’s waistcoat depicts a wave and pearl pattern; the headdress, a nod to Articuno's own icy plumage; and the backdrop is a snowfall (Powder Snow) against a wintry stained-glass window.

 

Team Valor represents bravery, power, and passion. This design is probably the most 'pure' Rococo of the three, but does take design motifs from both the competing French and Italian styles ( w/ a nod to Carnevale di Venezia!) during the time period. I chose the sun’s rays (Moltres's "Sunny Day") as the stained glass motif and whorls with buds to represent the spring that Moltres is said to bring. The overall design was set to aim for the more protective and life-giving aspect of fire.

 

Team Instinct is all about following your true nature. My friend suggested a Rococo x Art Deco fusion. Both movements involved an excessive degree of self-expression, and I challenged myself to mix together the angular style of Zapados and Art Deco with the organic elements beloved in the Late Baroque period. The stained glass background is, of course, a lightning storm (Thunder Shock)!

 

 

About the Pins

  • 1.5" long pins, framed in gold, designed to make you the center of attention!
  • Pins are created via a combination of CMYK offset printing and die struck metal. The printed portion is covered a with high-grade resin enamel doming to give the graphics an intense shine. For this project, soft enamel was chosen over hard to give more pattern play against the shine.
  • The final result is a heavy-duty, colorful pin that will feel like jewerly.
  • All pins will include flat-head clutches which ensure better comfort, durability, and support compared to butterfly and rubber backings.
  • Each pin is signed and dated (but not numbered) on the back.

Factory Photos

Pins are ready! We're waiting for the final payment to clear. Estimated distribution will be mid-September.

There's a shirt!?

Yes! You can get shirts in various colors and sizes from my Etsy shop! All shirts are made from soft and durable ringspun cotton.  You can also opt for my shirt + pin packs available here on IGG.

Links Out

  • Visit & follow my Etsy Shop
  • Follow me on Instagram
  • Like my Facebook Page

story:
Button-Ups is an innovation that brings laces into the modern world. It's Click Click Go technology makes putting on shoes and "clicking your laces" fast, easy and fun! You’ll love clicking your laces so much with Button-Ups that you’ll wonder why no one thought of this sooner!

  • Get your shoes on quick with laces that click. 

  • Easily adjust the lace tension for a custom fit. 

  • Lock in a perfect fit to hold tight for any activity. 

  • Run or visit the gym without shoelaces getting in the way. 

  • Install Button-Ups in five minutes or less. 

  • Kids love to button their own shoes.

  • Button-Up your laces with just one hand. 

  • Available in 20 amazing color options.

Button-Ups were designed with adjustability in mind. You control the tightness, comfort, and function of your Button-Up Laces.  

Our feet expand and contract throughout the day and during workouts, so it’s important to easily loosen or tighten the tension around your feet. Have you ever tried to adjust your shoelaces while sitting in a cramped airplane? It’s literally a pain in the neck that no one wants to bother with! What about stopping in the middle of a workout to retie your laces over and over…what a pain! Our easy-adjust system allows you to quickly change the tension around your feet and lock in a custom-fit.

Quick-Fit (adjustable)

Adjust your laces quick to get the custom fit you need for every workout. Lace adjustment are secured with a click of a button. Button-Up makes it easy to re-adjust the lace tension based on your day's activities.  

Stay-Fit (lock in place)  

Button-Up Lacing System allows you to lock your laces in place. Set a custom fit and retain it for the life of your shoe. When necessary, such as when you wear thicker-than-usual socks, you can simply unlock and re-adjust the fit.

Tying shoelaces is an old-fashioned way of fastening shoes to our feet…it’s one of the first achievements we learn when we grow up, but it’s also an archaic process we’ve taken for granted.  

Are you still tying shoes because Velcro and other ‘no-tie’ options compromise the fit and style of your shoe?  

How many of you don’t even bother untying your laces when taking off your shoes? This means you jam your feet back into your shoes the next time you put them on. It's easier than having to retie your shoes every time, but it's still just another hassle.

Button-Ups solve the problem with just a simple click! It’s that easy! Laces That Click provide fast, one-hand “lacing” with a click — NO MORE TYING SHOELACES! It’s the ultimate fastening system that’s quick, easy and convenient. Click your laces in place with our unique Buttoning System and you’re ready to go! It’s really that easy!

Button-Ups give your shoes the ultimate stylish makeover by eliminating the unsightly clutter of dangling shoelaces. Our unique Button Hardware was designed to look great with any type of casual or athletic shoe. Button-Up Laces 2.0 will upgrade your shoes with a clean, modern look!  

With 20 colors of laces and buttons to choose from, you can customize your stride to fit your attitude! Choose the colors you want to match your style, whether it’s a matching, seamless look or a fun color pop with contrasting tones!

 First Stretch Reward (unlocked)

Tired of waiting for the kids to make their bunny ears and tie their shoes, only to have to re-tie them five minutes later? Or, maybe you've been buying Velcro shoes because you have limited use of your hands – but want the independence of choosing the shoes you want?  

Optional use pull tabs provide next level simplicity – making it easier for people with limited dexterity to button and un-button their shoes with just one hand.

The first time you use the Button-Up Lacing System, you can install in five minutes or less. Once installed, you'll be lacing your shoes as fast as you button your pants. Stop tying, re-tying, and making double knots to keep shoes on your feet. Now, you can just Button-Up and go.

I’m Chris Faith from Tulsa, Oklahoma. I created Button-Up Laces to solve my own personal frustrations with a timeless tradition of tying shoelaces.  

It didn’t make sense to me why no one had ever discovered a better way to fasten shoelaces besides tying knots. I was disappointed with all the previous ‘no-tie’ lacing products that I found, which were clumsy, ugly or didn't work. I finally gave up on waiting for someone else to solve the problem and I set out to find my own solution.  

The objective was simple: create a fast and simple way to secure my shoelaces that also looks clean and seamless. As I brainstormed all the possible solutions, a recurring thought stood out to me, “Wouldn’t it be great if I could just push a button to fasten my laces?” I realized I was onto something! I began creating prototypes at home using my own desktop 3D printer. I was soon wearing my prototypes and enjoying a solution I’d always wished for!  

Before long, friends and family asked me if I could make Button-Ups for their shoes too. It became increasingly clear that my solution needed to be shared with the world. In 2015, I presented the idea on Kickstarter and raised the funds to manufacture the first version of Button-Up Laces. Our Kickstarter backers gave an inspiring response and shared how Button-Ups positively impacted their lives! Following the success of the first campaign, I continued innovating and improving on the design of the original product. I'm now proud to introduce the new and improved Button-Up Laces 2.0 – an even better ‘no-tie’ lacing solution.

We've got finished designs for our product packaging. There is no foreseeable issues within the scope of packaging our product.

We love the look of this packaging, although will be difficult to keep it looking this great during the shipping process. We may switch to a more durable design for packaging.

We created Button-Ups with everyone in mind – from the busy parent trying to get kids dressed and out the door on time, to individuals with limited dexterity, to professional athletes needing a custom-fit, no-slip lacing solution.  

If you just don’t like the hassle of tying your shoes (and keeping them tied), you’ll love using Button-Ups!  

Rewards:

The Button-Up Lacing System and premium shoelaces are both proudly made in the USA:  

Premium Shoelaces  

Made by one of the top two shoelace manufacturers in the United States, Hickory Brands, Inc. is located in North Carolina.  

Button-Up Lacing System  

Made in Flippin, AR. Micro Plastics, Inc. is the largest manufacturer of threaded nylon fasteners in the world. Button-Up components are made of Nylon 6/6 (Impact Modified), to provide an advantage of very high impact strength at low temperatures and enhanced resistance to heat distortion over general purpose nylon 6/6.

Campaign ends – July, 2017  

Order Button Up laces from manufacturer – July, 2017  

Estimated manufacturing – August, 2017  

We receive shipment – September, 2017 

You receive "Perks" – November, 2017

We’re confident that manufacturing of version 2.0 will go smoothly, without serious complications. We learned a lot about the manufacturing process with our first production of Button-Up Laces. However, we can’t guarantee there won’t be unexpected complications or delays with production.  

Expensive tooling costs for the Button-Up components were paid for with the funds raised for version 1. To produce version 2.0, we’ll need to meet large minimum order requirements for each new color. Our shoelace manufacturer also requires a large minimum order for each of the different color options and lace styles.  

Plastic Components:  

Molds for the Button-Up components are ready for mass production. New color options won’t incur any delays associated with tooling a new mold. They’ll be produced using existing molds.

Premium Shoelaces:  

We chose the 2nd largest shoelace manufacturer in the USA to make our Premium Laces. They're so good at manufacturing shoestrings. Upon testing several batches of shoelace samples, their quality control appears top notch.

Our Lawyers Told Us to Tell You This  

Disclaimer: This project did not receive any endorsements by any brands. The shoes you see in the photos and videos were paid for and are my personal property. You will see the Button-Up Lacing System used in each of the shoes in photos and videos for this project, but the shoes work perfectly in their natural state without the use of our lacing system. The Button-Up Lacing System gives users optional ways to keep their shoes secure on their feet. As with all other shoelaces, it is the responsibility of the end user to make sure your Button-Up Lacing System is installed correctly to secure your shoes and provide the appropriate amount of support under both normal and vigorous activities. Always test your laces with light activity first to ensure the Button-Up Lacing System is secure and operating properly before using for more vigorous activities. 

Risks and challenges

This is not our first rodeo! Through manufacturing the original Button Up Lacing System, we've had the opportunity to learn much about the process of production to delivery. Our original happy backers can testify that we deliver on our promises of quality and timeliness. Our prototypes have been tested extensively and we are 100% committed to following through on our word and bringing Button Up Laces 2.0 to the masses.
story_txt:
Button-Ups is an innovation that brings laces into the modern world. It's Click Click Go technology makes putting on shoes and "clicking your laces" fast, easy and fun! You’ll love clicking your laces so much with Button-Ups that you’ll wonder why no one thought of this sooner!
Get your shoes on quick with laces that click. 
Easily adjust the lace tension for a custom fit. 
Lock in a perfect fit to hold tight for any activity. 
Run or visit the gym without shoelaces getting in the way. 
Install Button-Ups in five minutes or less. 
Kids love to button their own shoes.
Button-Up your laces with just one hand. 
Available in 20 amazing color options.
Button-Ups were designed with adjustability in mind. You control the tightness, comfort, and function of your Button-Up Laces.  Our feet expand and contract throughout the day and during workouts, so it’s important to easily loosen or tighten the tension around your feet. Have you ever tried to adjust your shoelaces while sitting in a cramped airplane? It’s literally a pain in the neck that no one wants to bother with! What about stopping in the middle of a workout to retie your laces over and over…what a pain! Our easy-adjust system allows you to quickly change the tension around your feet and lock in a custom-fit.Quick-Fit (adjustable)Adjust your laces quick to get the custom fit you need for every workout. Lace adjustment are secured with a click of a button. Button-Up makes it easy to re-adjust the lace tension based on your day's activities.  Stay-Fit (lock in place)  Button-Up Lacing System allows you to lock your laces in place. Set a custom fit and retain it for the life of your shoe. When necessary, such as when you wear thicker-than-usual socks, you can simply unlock and re-adjust the fit.Tying shoelaces is an old-fashioned way of fastening shoes to our feet…it’s one of the first achievements we learn when we grow up, but it’s also an archaic process we’ve taken for granted.  Are you still tying shoes because Velcro and other ‘no-tie’ options compromise the fit and style of your shoe?  How many of you don’t even bother untying your laces when taking off your shoes? This means you jam your feet back into your shoes the next time you put them on. It's easier than having to retie your shoes every time, but it's still just another hassle.Button-Ups solve the problem with just a simple click! It’s that easy! Laces That Click provide fast, one-hand “lacing” with a click — NO MORE TYING SHOELACES! It’s the ultimate fastening system that’s quick, easy and convenient. Click your laces in place with our unique Buttoning System and you’re ready to go! It’s really that easy!Button-Ups give your shoes the ultimate stylish makeover by eliminating the unsightly clutter of dangling shoelaces. Our unique Button Hardware was designed to look great with any type of casual or athletic shoe. Button-Up Laces 2.0 will upgrade your shoes with a clean, modern look!  With 20 colors of laces and buttons to choose from, you can customize your stride to fit your attitude! Choose the colors you want to match your style, whether it’s a matching, seamless look or a fun color pop with contrasting tones! First Stretch Reward (unlocked)Tired of waiting for the kids to make their bunny ears and tie their shoes, only to have to re-tie them five minutes later? Or, maybe you've been buying Velcro shoes because you have limited use of your hands – but want the independence of choosing the shoes you want?  Optional use pull tabs provide next level simplicity – making it easier for people with limited dexterity to button and un-button their shoes with just one hand.The first time you use the Button-Up Lacing System, you can install in five minutes or less. Once installed, you'll be lacing your shoes as fast as you button your pants. Stop tying, re-tying, and making double knots to keep shoes on your feet. Now, you can just Button-Up and go.I’m Chris Faith from Tulsa, Oklahoma. I created Button-Up Laces to solve my own personal frustrations with a timeless tradition of tying shoelaces.  It didn’t make sense to me why no one had ever discovered a better way to fasten shoelaces besides tying knots. I was disappointed with all the previous ‘no-tie’ lacing products that I found, which were clumsy, ugly or didn't work. I finally gave up on waiting for someone else to solve the problem and I set out to find my own solution.  The objective was simple: create a fast and simple way to secure my shoelaces that also looks clean and seamless. As I brainstormed all the possible solutions, a recurring thought stood out to me, “Wouldn’t it be great if I could just push a button to fasten my laces?” I realized I was onto something! I began creating prototypes at home using my own desktop 3D printer. I was soon wearing my prototypes and enjoying a solution I’d always wished for!  Before long, friends and family asked me if I could make Button-Ups for their shoes too. It became increasingly clear that my solution needed to be shared with the world. In 2015, I presented the idea on Kickstarter and raised the funds to manufacture the first version of Button-Up Laces. Our Kickstarter backers gave an inspiring response and shared how Button-Ups positively impacted their lives! Following the success of the first campaign, I continued innovating and improving on the design of the original product. I'm now proud to introduce the new and improved Button-Up Laces 2.0 – an even better ‘no-tie’ lacing solution.We've got finished designs for our product packaging. There is no foreseeable issues within the scope of packaging our product.We love the look of this packaging, although will be difficult to keep it looking this great during the shipping process. We may switch to a more durable design for packaging.We created Button-Ups with everyone in mind – from the busy parent trying to get kids dressed and out the door on time, to individuals with limited dexterity, to professional athletes needing a custom-fit, no-slip lacing solution.  If you just don’t like the hassle of tying your shoes (and keeping them tied), you’ll love using Button-Ups!  Rewards:The Button-Up Lacing System and premium shoelaces are both proudly made in the USA:  Premium Shoelaces  Made by one of the top two shoelace manufacturers in the United States, Hickory Brands, Inc. is located in North Carolina.  Button-Up Lacing System  Made in Flippin, AR. Micro Plastics, Inc. is the largest manufacturer of threaded nylon fasteners in the world. Button-Up components are made of Nylon 6/6 (Impact Modified), to provide an advantage of very high impact strength at low temperatures and enhanced resistance to heat distortion over general purpose nylon 6/6.Campaign ends – July, 2017  Order Button Up laces from manufacturer – July, 2017  Estimated manufacturing – August, 2017  We receive shipment – September, 2017 You receive "Perks" – November, 2017We’re confident that manufacturing of version 2.0 will go smoothly, without serious complications. We learned a lot about the manufacturing process with our first production of Button-Up Laces. However, we can’t guarantee there won’t be unexpected complications or delays with production.  Expensive tooling costs for the Button-Up components were paid for with the funds raised for version 1. To produce version 2.0, we’ll need to meet large minimum order requirements for each new color. Our shoelace manufacturer also requires a large minimum order for each of the different color options and lace styles.  Plastic Components:  Molds for the Button-Up components are ready for mass production. New color options won’t incur any delays associated with tooling a new mold. They’ll be produced using existing molds.Premium Shoelaces:  We chose the 2nd largest shoelace manufacturer in the USA to make our Premium Laces. They're so good at manufacturing shoestrings. Upon testing several batches of shoelace samples, their quality control appears top notch.Our Lawyers Told Us to Tell You This  Disclaimer: This project did not receive any endorsements by any brands. The shoes you see in the photos and videos were paid for and are my personal property. You will see the Button-Up Lacing System used in each of the shoes in photos and videos for this project, but the shoes work perfectly in their natural state without the use of our lacing system. The Button-Up Lacing System gives users optional ways to keep their shoes secure on their feet. As with all other shoelaces, it is the responsibility of the end user to make sure your Button-Up Lacing System is installed correctly to secure your shoes and provide the appropriate amount of support under both normal and vigorous activities. Always test your laces with light activity first to ensure the Button-Up Lacing System is secure and operating properly before using for more vigorous activities. Risks and challengesThis is not our first rodeo! Through manufacturing the original Button Up Lacing System, we've had the opportunity to learn much about the process of production to delivery. Our original happy backers can testify that we deliver on our promises of quality and timeliness. Our prototypes have been tested extensively and we are 100% committed to following through on our word and bringing Button Up Laces 2.0 to the masses.

story:
Ash & Anvil is creating the clothing experience that shorter guys deserve. We're starting with casual button downs. 

We believe all guys should have clothes that fit well and make them look great.

We are creating clothes geared towards men 5’8” and shorter. Our shirts are designed with the perfect length in the body and sleeves, collars that complement our height, and an overall fit that is more flattering.



Ash & Anvil takes the pain out of finding a perfect fitting shirts for the shorter guy. See what our Everyday Shirt offers vs a typical button down.

Our Shirt Patterns

We like options. We bet you do, too! When you buy a reward that comes with more than one shirt, you can mix and match any of the following patterns. 
*If you are getting custom shirts, we will work with you to find the specific fabric that you want




Risks & Challenges

We have created prototypes and are market-ready. We are finalizing our shirts with a manufacturer who can help us produce our initial small runs. Our preparation should allow for a smooth production and fulfillment process. 

As a backer, you can be assured that we will do the best job that we can in fulfilling your orders in a timely and expedient fashion. In addition, expect frequent updates to this campaign as we fully believe in transparency with everything we do.

Frequently Asked Questions

What does Ash & Anvil define as a shorter guy?
The US national average is 5'10". Our clothes are made for men 5'8" and below. We offer a variety of sizes for men 5'2" and up.

How do I choose my shirt materials and sizing?
After the campaign, we will reach out and send you to our ordering process on our website where you can pick your Everyday Shirt size and material options. 

How do I submit measurements for custom shirt orders?
After the campaign, we will follow up with more information about the process.

Can I tailor or alter the shirts?
Tailors should have no problem altering our shirts.  We expect that most shorter men won't have to hem the body or sleeve lengths.

What if my shirt doesn't fit?
We want to make sure that you're 100% satisfied with your everyday shirt and offer exchange and refund policies.

Exchange Policy: If the size you ordered doesn't fit,  you can send it back to us and we will replace the shirt for you at no extra cost.
Refund Policy: If there is something seriously wrong with your shirt, you can send it back to us for a complete refund. Refund should be claimed within 30 days from date of delivery.

What if there are any issues with quality?
We are confident that you'll enjoy the comfort and quality of the Everyday Shirt.  If you find anything wrong,  we will send you another shirt at no cost to you.

When is the expected delivery?
We expect to ship all Everyday Shirts by the end of summer 2015.  

Do you ship internationally? What are the charges?
Yes, we do! Please add $15 to your pledge for international shipping.

How do I take care of and clean my shirts?
All of our shirts are machine-washable.

story:
Tony Shearing very sadly passed away in March 2015, he was in South Africa surrounded by his family and friends. Tony was a pioneer in starting Polocrosse in the UK, he had played it for many years in South Africa and continued to grow the sport and develop young players throughout his life here in England.

Today Polocrosse is loved and played by over 400 people in the UK. Tony has been involved with and coached players from all age groups and indeed he is often considered responsible for the growth of Polocrosse, mainly through the beginnings of the sport with the Pony Club. He had a passion for the sport, he loved to see children grow in confidence and watch families enjoy time together surrounded by their children.

In his memory, the Shearing Family would like to give a Trophy “The Fair and the Brave” and ask for your donations to help create a bursary to run parallel with this award, which will be chosen annually. The family feel Tony was passionate about Polocrosse and he strived to uphold honesty and dedication for the sport, no matter at what level, and he always demanded integrity for the game. The bursary will go towards Polocrosse training and development. Although the family are initiating this award, it is being backed by the UKPA.

story:
M Watch.

The 20$ Bluetooth smartwatch.


Features:

M Watch for every smartpohone: iPhone, Android Smart phones.

. 1.5" Capacitive Touch Screen TFT LCD

. Time / Date / Week / Battery state display

. Ringing reminder when you receive a call

. Ringing reminder once your mobile phone disconnected

. Display the number or name of incoming calls

. Answer or Dial calls from your wrist

. Stopwatch function

. Support hands-free calls

. Play the music in your phone (after Bluetooth paring)

. Sync phone book/SMS/call history(only for android phone)

. BT-notification(only for android phone)

. Ring reminder when your Android 2.3 or above smart phone receive a message (including Wechat, Facebook, Twitter,WhatsApp, Skype,and so on)

. Anti-lost alarm function: When cellphone left watch alarm automatically, after a certain distance to avoid lose the phones

. Remote taking photo function: You can control your cellphone to take photo from your wrist (only for android phone,less android phone can't support)

. Passometer, Photograph

.Rest Alarm

.Drink Reminder

. Sleep Monitor

Specification:

1. Material: Import PC + ABS plastic alloy structure Rugged,Shockproof,Dustproof 

2. Size: 47*40*11mm

3. Bluetooth Version: Bluetooth V3.0+EDR

4. Bluetooth Protocol: A2DP + HFP 1.5 + HS P 1.2

5. Range of Frequency: 2.4GHz spectrum

6. Ambient Noise: ≤75dB

7. Transmitting Range: ≥10m

8. Language Support: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German,Turkish, Russian

9. Charging Time: about 1 hour

10. Talk Time: about 3hours

11. Music Play Time: about 5 hours

12. Standby Time: about 120 hours

13. Power Supply: Built-in 230mAh rechargeable battery 

14. Color: Black, White, Red




Package:

1 x Bluetooth Watch

1 X usb cable

1 x User Manual

story:
Our vision

«To create a new breed of watch to match our perception of architectural design and functionality. Manufactured in Switzerland at an un-Swiss price»

 

It's bold, it's a Bólido.

Having received the Red Dot Award 2018, the new BÓLIDO X now takes the concept to the next level.

The stainless-steel case incorporates a turning bezel with a diamond-cut side-knurling and additional attractive functionality. What looks competently sleek, requires a radically new technical construction, the complication being hidden on the inside. 

[Für Text in Deutsch nach unten scrollen] – [Pour texte français, faites défiler vers le bas]

 

 

Bólido X LOG black Chronometer

 

Bólido X Log

Only few watch brands have defied the challenges of incorporating a slide-ruler disk to their timepieces. To achieve accurate performance, this demands a particularly high level of mechanical precision in the case-making.

BÓLIDO X LOG shown together with an original Calculator disk from the late Fifties

 

 

Bólido X LOG logarithmic scale calculated  by Prof. (ret) Karl Kleine in Jena, Germany

 

Being "always at hand", a slide-rulers on your wrist is very useful for quick conversions of currencies when travelling, lengths, speeds and distances, weights, temperatures etc. on the fly. The new Bólido X Log enables quick easy divisions, multiplications and «rule of three»- calculations. Aside of this and its performance as a Swiss automatic mechanical timekeeper, the Bólido X Log is also simply a stunning eye-catcher.

 

Bólido X CD

Bólido X CD

 

The Bólido X CD has the same turning bezel construction, but it graphically indicates a remaining time, think of parking meter, meetings, diving etc. Simple, practical and quick: Match the position of the minute hand with a chosen amount of time on the bezel and the arrow indicates the end of the countdown; the last 15 minutes (in sailing regattas the most important-) are highlighted in color.

 

Bólido X CD black

 

The BÓLIDO X Swiss Technology automatic precision movement STP 1.11

 

The new Bólido X models are Instruments for a broad range of often-used tasks. The slightly increased overall size will please those backers with masculine wrists.    

 

Bólido X under the loupe

 

 

 

The crystal at the back of the BÓLIDO X is dome-shaped to give a loupe view of the movement, Also note the Quick-release spring bars that allow easy change of bands

 

 

A choice of attractive bands

The four Bólido X models come with a genuine, custom-made and durable Caoutchouc strap lasting "forever", it can be cleaned by holding it under a water tap; we think that it fits the modern, sporty design of the watches perfectly. Alternatively available at an additional cost of just 30 CHF to be added to your pledge, we offer a luxurious genuine ostrich-leather strap SAVANNA or a fashionable, fully adjustable MILANO wire-mesh bracelet; the MILANO is either steel coloured or black PVD coated to match the case colour.  Choose the preferred band-model on the survey that you'll receive after the campaign is completed.

Optional: SAVANNA ostrich leather (left), MILANO wire mesh steel and black (right)

 

 

 

 

Bólido rocks because it ticks

True longevity of watches is measured in generations, not in sequences of yearly updates.  Bólido timepieces are strictly mechanical and can be serviced and repaired during a lifetime and beyond; they will never become obsolete just because a certain battery type is no longer produced. 

 

Only a watch made in Switzerland is SWISS MADE

Savvy backers are not fooled by intentionally misleading euphemisms like “Swiss parts”, “Swiss design”, “Swiss company”, etc.  A truly “Swiss made” must comply with stiff regulations defined by the Swiss government in conjunction with the federation of the watch-making industry. They are manufactured in the birth land of watchmaking, where it is subjected to high statutory standards. Where an apprentice undergoes four years of basic professional training to learn the practical and the intellectual skills and to pass a demanding governmental examination, before being permitted to using the title of a Swiss watchmaker. And this of course is only the start, as freshmen will continue to enhance their skills to further their careers.

 

COSC chronometer certification

The one way to further enhance a product that already has received the best technical and artisanal attention of highly competent professionals would be an official and neutral certification of COSC Contrôle Officiel Suisse des Chronomètres

This coveted certification is awarded to an individually numbered movement after it has successfully passed an independent, 14-day inspection-sequence of precision and reliability in high and low temperatures as well as in 5 different positions. (It helps that all Bólido movements are factory-tested in the same 5 positions by default).

A C.O.S.C. certification is the highest quality rating a Swiss timepiece can obtain, the prestigious “Certified Swiss Chronometer C.O.S.C.” badge printed on the dial is seen on only 6 % of Switzerland’s total watch production. Backers can pledge for the chronometer-option at additional cost.

 

A mechanical watch is as good as its service

 

 

We take care of your timepiece, be it within the international 2-year warranty and beyond. Designated Bólido service centers are located in Switzerland, Germany (for the EU), the USA and Japan and are expanded to more countries as we grow.

 

A Bólido keeps its value

Anyone knowledgable about watches will wonder how it is possible that a timepiece such as the Bólido X costs only a fraction of absolutely comparable models of established brands with the same specs; and we are talking of our forthcoming regular shop prices! The additional discounts of our limited crowdfunding rewards are flat-out incredible, but you must take advantage quickly, as this opportunity will not come back. In all probability, the Bólido X, –notably from a company with a proven track-record of two successful previous campaigns–, will be our last project to be financed by crowd-funding at such exceptional conditions. To afford the advertising necessary to grow, we will no longer be able to give away the heavy crowdfunding discounts.  Price increases are to be expected; you'll never get a genuine Bólido at these outstanding offers again. 

 

 

 

Bólido X on your wrist, what a statement! (Top: CD, bottom: LOG)

 

 

What is this fund raising for?

We have financed the entire cost for design, R&D and the preparation of 1:1 working prototypes by ourselves. To now realise this project, new tooling and the advance-payments for considerable minimum initial order quantities (MOQ) are required. Your numerous pledges are making it all possible. In return we make our rewards as attractive as possible.  Let's make these beautiful timepieces a reality together! Thank you all.

 

Close your pledge NOW to secure your package!

 

 

Media raves about Bólido

 

 

This is only a selection of (unpaid!) Media coverage of Bólido, «a luminary that crosses between the somewhat immovable fixed stars of established brands on the watch firmament.»

–––––––––––––––––––––––––––

Deutsch-Übersetzung der Texte

Unsere Vision:

«Mit archetypischem Design Authentizität schaffen. Schweizer Manufaktur zu un-schweizerischen Preisen»

Sie ist kühn, es ist eine Bólido.

Nach der Auszeichnung mit dem Red Dot Award 2018 führt die neue BÓLIDO X das Konzept nun auf die nächste Stufe.

Das Gehäuse aus Edelstahl verfügt über eine Drehlünette mit einer seitlichen, diamantgeschliffenen Rändelung und zusätzlicher attraktiver Funktionalität. Was einfach und schlicht aussieht, erfordert eine radikal neue technische Konstruktion, deren Komplikation jedoch im Inneren verborgen bleibt.

 

Bólido X LOG

Nur wenige Uhren Marken haben sich der Herausforderung gestellt, eine Rechenscheibe in ihre Zeitmesser einzubauen. Dies erfordert eine besonders hohe mechanische Fertigungs- und Druck-Präzision. Eine in die Uhr eingebaute Rechenscheibe ist unterwegs «stets zur Hand» und sehr nützlich für die rasche Konvertierung von Währungs-, Längen-, Geschwindigkeits-, Distanz-, Gewichts- und Temperatur-Einheiten. Die aussergewöhnliche BÓLIDO X LOG ermöglicht auch Divisionen, Multiplikationen und Dreisatz-Rechnungen. Dazu besticht der neue mechanische Schweizer Zeitmesser mit seinem atemberaubend modernen Design.

 

 

Bólido X CD

Die gleiche Drehlünette ist auch in die Bólido X CD eingebaut und zeigt auf graphische Weise an, welche Restzeit einer vorher eingestellten Dauer bleibt, denken Sie an Parkuhr, Meetings, Tauchen usw. Das Ganze funktioniert auf denkbar einfache Weise: Stellen Sie die gewünschte Zeitdauer auf der Lünette auf die Position des Minuten-zeigers; der Pfeil zeigt nun das Ende des Countdowns an; die letzten 15 Minuten (bei Segelregatten die wichtigsten!) sind farblich hervorgehoben.

Mit ihrer Drehlünette und der breiten Palette häufig verwendeter Funktionen sind beide Bólido X Modelle im Vergleich zur klassischen Bólido auch etwas grösser. (s. Daten)

 

Eine Auswahl an attraktiven Bändern

Die vier Bólido X-Modelle sind standardmässig mit einem maßgefertigten und lang-lebigen Band aus Kautschuk ausgestattet; dieses hält "ewig" und lässt sich unter dem Wasserhahn reinigen. Wir sind der Meinung, dass es perfekt zum modernen, sportlichen Design der Uhren passt. Alternativ bieten wir Ihnen gegen einen kleinen Aufpreis von nur 30 CHF das luxuriöse SAVANNA Band aus echtem Straussenleder oder ein modisches, voll einstellbares MILANO-Drahtgeflecht-Stahlband an, welches wahlweise natürlich auch mit schwarzer PVD-Beschichtung passend zur Gehäusefarbe geliefert wird. Nach Abschluss der Kampagne erhalten Sie einen Fragebogen zugestellt, in welchem Sie das bevorzugte Bandmodel bestimmen können.

 

Die Bólido rockt, weil sie tickt

Die wahre Langlebigkeit von Uhren wird in Generationen gemessen, nicht in Sequenzen von jährlichen Updates. Die Mechanik aller Bólido-Uhren kann ein Leben lang – und darüber hinaus – gewartet und repariert werden; mit ihrem zeitlosen Design werden sie auch nicht veraltet sein, nur weil ein bestimmter Batterietyp nicht mehr hergestellt wird.

 

Nur eine in der Schweiz hergestellte Uhr ist SWISS MADE

Uhren-Kenner lassen sich nicht von irreführenden Euphemismen wie «Swiss Parts", "Schweizer Design", "Schweizer Hersteller" usw. täuschen; nur die gesetzlich geschützte Bezeichnung "Swiss made" auf dem Zifferblatt gewährleistet, dass die Uhr die strengen Vorschriften erfüllt, die von der Schweizer Regierung in Zusammenarbeit mit dem Verband der Uhrenindustrie festgelegt wurden. Nur dann wurde sie im Geburtsland der Uhrmacherei hergestellt, wo sie hohen gesetzlichen Mindest-Standards unterworfen ist. Wo ein Uhrmacher eine vierjährige berufliche Grund-ausbildung und eine anspruchsvolle staatliche Abschluss-Prüfung bestehen muss, bevor er den Berufstitel tragen darf. Und die weiteren Karriere-Schritte bedingen eine ständige Weiterbildung.

 

COSC-Chronometer-Zertifizierung

Die einzige Möglichkeit, den Nimbus einer Schweizer Uhr zu steigern, ist deren offizielle Zertifizierung durch die unabhängige COSC Contrôle Officiel Suisse des Chronomètres.

Diese exklusive Zertifizierung wird an ein einzeln nummeriertes Uhrwerk vergeben, nachdem es eine 14-tägige Prüfsequenz von Präzision und Zuverlässigkeit bei hohen und tiefen Temperaturen sowie in 5 verschiedenen Positionen erfolgreich durchlaufen hat. (Es hilft, dass alle Bólido-Werke bereits werksseitig in den gleichen 5 Positionen getestet werden).

Eine C.O.S.C.-Zertifizierung ist die höchste Auszeichnung für einen Schweizer Zeitmesser. Die auf dem Zifferblatt aufgedruckte, prestigeträchtige Bezeichnung “Certified Swiss Chronometer C.O.S.C.” findet sich nur auf ca. 6 % aller Schweizer Uhren.

In dieser Kampagne haben Sie die exklusive Möglichkeit, sich Ihre Bólido gegen Aufpreis als zertifizierten Chronometer zu bestellen.

 

Eine mechanische Uhr ist so gut wie ihr Service

Wir kümmern uns um Ihre Bólido. Ausgewiesene Bólido-Servicezentren befinden sich in der Schweiz, in Deutschland (für die EU), in den USA und in Japan und werden im Zuge unserer Marktentwicklung auf weitere Länder ausgedehnt.

 

Eine Bólido behält ihren Wert

Jeder, der sich mit Uhren auskennt, wird sich fragen, wie es möglich ist, dass ein Zeitmesser wie die Bólido X nur einen Bruchteil vergleichbarer Modelle etablierter Marken mit den gleichen Spezifikationen kostet; und wir sprechen hier von unseren zukünftigen regulären Ladenpreisen! Die zusätzlichen Preisnachlässe unserer limitierten Kickstarter-Prämien sind umso unglaublicher, aber Sie müssen sich schnell entscheiden, denn diese Gelegenheit wird sich nicht mehr bieten.

Aller Wahrscheinlichkeit nach wird die Bólido X unser letztes Crowdfunding Projekt sein, dessen Realisierung mit solch außergewöhnlichen Bedingungen finanziert wird. Um uns die für das weitere Wachstum notwendige Werbung leisten zu können, werden wir nicht mehr in der Lage sein, die hohen Preisnachlässe aus dem Crowdfunding zu verschenken; Preiserhöhungen sind zu erwarten. Deshalb werden Sie nie wieder eine Bólido zu derart sensationellen Preisen bekommen.

 

 

Wozu dient der Ertrag aus diesem Crowdfunding ?

Wir haben die gesamten Kosten für Design, Forschung und Entwicklung und die Vorbereitung von (funktionierenden!) Prototypen selbst finanziert. Um dieses Projekt nun zu realisieren, sind neue Werkzeuge und die Vorfinanzierung beträchtlicher Mindest-Bestellmengen (MOQ) erforderlich. Erst Ihre Investition in diese Kampagne ermöglicht die Realisierung dieses ehrgeizigen Projekts. Deshalb wollen wir Sie im Gegenzug mit den am schärfsten je gerechneten Preisen belohnen.

Nur mit Ihrer Hilfe werden diese wunderschönen Zeitmesser Wirklichkeit werden. 

Wir danken Ihnen allen.

 

 

––––––––––––––––––––––

Traduit en Français

Notre vision :

«Créer l'authenticité avec un design archétypal. Manufacture suisse à des prix non suisses» 

Elle est audacieuse, c'est une Bólido.

Ayant reçu le Red Dot Award 2018, la nouvelle BÓLIDO X fait passer le concept à un niveau supérieur.

Le boîtier en acier inox intègre une lunette tournante avec un moletage latéral taillé en diamant et des fonctionnalités supplémentaires attrayantes. Ce qui paraît simple et épuré, nécessite une construction technique radicalement nouvelle, la complication étant cachée à l'intérieur. 

 

Bólido X Log

Peu de marques de montres sont parvenus à relever le défi d'incorporer des disques de règle à calcul à leurs garde-temps. Pour obtenir des performances correctes, cela exige un niveau de précision mécanique particulièrement élevé dans la fabrication des boîtiers.

Étant "toujours à portée de main", une règle à calcul à votre poignet est très utile pour convertir rapidement les devises lors de vos déplacements, les longueurs, les vitesses et les distances, les poids, les températures, etc. à la volée. La nouvelle Bólido X Log permet de faire des divisions, des multiplications et des calculs rapides. Outre ses performances en tant que chronométreur mécanique automatique suisse, la Bólido Log est tout simplement un étonnant accroche-regard.

 

Bólido X CD

La Bólido X CD a la même construction de lunette tournante, mais elle indique graphiquement un temps restant, pensez au parcmètre, aux réunions, à la plongée, etc. Simple, pratique et rapide : faites correspondre la position de l'aiguille des minutes avec un temps choisi sur la lunette et la flèche indique la fin du compte à rebours ; les 15 dernières minutes (dans les régates de voile, les plus importantes) sont mises en évidence en couleur.

Les nouveaux modèles Bólido X sont des instruments pour un large éventail de tâches souvent utilisées. Sa taille globale légèrement augmentée plaira aux supporters aux poignets masculins.

 

Un choix de bracelets attrayantes

Les quatre modèles Bólido X sont d’office équipés d'un véritable bracelet en Caoutchouc, fabriqué sur mesure et durable "à jamais", il peut être nettoyé en le tenant sous un robinet d'eau ; nous pensons qu'il s'adapte parfaitement au design moderne et sportif des montres. Cependant, vous pouvez également choisir, pour un coût supplémentaire de 30 CHF seulement à ajouter à votre engagement, un luxueux bracelet en cuir d'autruche véritable SAVANNA ou un bracelet en acier à mailles métalliques MILANO à la mode et entièrement réglable ; la MILANO est soit de couleur acier, soit revêtue de PVD noir pour s'harmoniser avec la couleur du boîtier.  Choisissez le modèle de bracelet préféré sur le questionnaire que vous recevrez une fois la campagne terminée.

 

La Bólido vibre parce qu'elle fait tic-tac

La véritable longévité des montres est mesurée en générations, et non en séquences des updates annuelles.  Les montres Bólido sont strictement mécaniques et peuvent être entretenues et réparées tout au long d’une vie entière et au-delà ; elles ne deviendront pas obsolètes simplement parce qu'un certain type de pile n'est plus produit.

Seule une montre fabriquée en Suisse est SWISS MADE

Les connaisseurs avertis ne sont pas dupes d'euphémismes intentionnellement trompeurs comme "Swiss Parts", "design suisse", "entreprise suisse", etc.  Un véritable "SWISS MADE" doit se conformer à des règles strictes définies par le gouvernement suisse en collaboration avec la fédération de l'industrie horlogère. Elles sont fabriquées dans le berceau de l'horlogerie, où elles sont soumises à des normes légales élevées. Où un apprenti suit une formation professionnelle de base de quatre ans pour acquérir les compétences pratiques et intellectuelles et passer un examen gouvernemental exigeant, avant d'être autorisé à utiliser le titre d'horloger suisse. Et ce n'est bien sûr qu'un début, car  les étapes suivantes de la carrière nécessitent une formation continuelle.

 

Certification de chronomètre COSC

La seule façon de valoriser davantage un produit qui a déjà reçu la meilleure attention technique et artisanale de professionnels hautement compétents serait une certification officielle et neutre du COSC Contrôle Officiel Suisse des Chronomètres

Cette certification très convoitée est attribuée à un mouvement numéroté individuellement après qu'il ait passé avec succès une séquence d'inspection de 14 jours de précision et de fiabilité à haute et basse température ainsi que dans 5 positions différentes. (Il est utile que tous les mouvements Bólido soient testés en usine dans les mêmes 5 positions par défaut).

La certification C.O.S.C. est le plus haut niveau de qualité qu'un garde-temps suisse puisse obtenir. Le prestigieux badge “Certified Swiss Chronometer C.O.S.C.” imprimé sur le cadran apparaît sur seulement 6 % de la production horlogère totale de la Suisse. Les bailleurs de fonds peuvent s'engager pour l'option chronomètre moyennant un coût supplémentaire.

 

Une montre mécanique est aussi bonne que son service

Nous prenons soin de votre montre. Les centres de service Bólido sont situés en Suisse, en Allemagne (pour l'UE), aux États-Unis et au Japon et s'étendent à d'autres pays au fur et à mesure de notre croissance.

 

Une Bólido garde sa valeur

Quiconque s'y connaît en horlogerie se demandera comment il est possible qu'un garde-temps comme le Bólido X ne coûte qu'une fraction des modèles comparables de marques établies ayant les mêmes caractéristiques ; et nous parlons ici de nos prochains prix réguliers en magasin ! Les réductions supplémentaires de nos récompenses Kickstarter limitées sont tout simplement incroyables, mais vous devez en profiter rapidement, car cette opportunité ne se représentera plus. Selon toute probabilité, le Bólido X, notamment de la part d'une société qui a fait ses preuves lors de deux campagnes précédentes, sera notre dernier projet financé par le public à des conditions aussi exceptionnelles. Pour nous permettre d'assurer la publicité nécessaire à notre croissance, nous ne pourrons plus accorder les lourdes remises liées au financement par le public et il faut s'attendre à des hausses de prix. Vous n'aurez plus jamais de Bólido à ces offres exceptionnelles.

 

À quoi sert cette collecte de fonds ?

Nous avons financé nous-mêmes la totalité des coûts de conception, de R&D et de préparation des prototypes de travail à l'échelle 1:1. Pour réaliser ce projet, il faut maintenant de nouveaux outillages et des avances pour des quantités initiales minimales de commande (MOQ) considérables. Vos nombreuses promesses de dons rendent tout cela possible. En retour, nous rendons nos récompenses aussi attrayantes que possible.  Ensemble, faisons de ces beaux garde-temps une réalité ! Merci à tous.

 

Les médias s'enthousiasment pour Bólido

Il ne s'agit que d'une sélection de la couverture médiatique (non rémunérée !) de Bólido, "un luminaire qui croise les vedettes fixes quelque peu immobiles des marques établies sur le firmament horloger".

 

Risques et défis

L'équipe de Bólido est composée de professionnels expérimentés de l'horlogerie, qui connaissent les rouages du développement, de la production, du contrôle qualité et de la logistique des montres. Toutes nos sources et tous nos fournisseurs sont des entreprises réputées et éprouvées. Ceci, combiné à notre expérience en matière de crowdfunding de deux campagnes réussies dans le passé, constitue une base solide pour une exécution ordonnée de ce projet.

Néanmoins, nous sommes bien conscients que chaque projet comporte ses propres risques et défis. Il est inévitable que des difficultés surviennent au cours du processus et l'expérience nous aide à les surmonter. Si nous devions rencontrer un problème important susceptible d'affecter nos performances, nous nous engageons à vous en informer immédiatement.           

 Il est évident que le plus grand risque (pour nous) est de ne pas obtenir le finance-ment de ce projet; si tel est le cas, vous n'aurez aucun frais à payer et votre carte ne sera pas débitée. Cependant, dès que nous aurons atteint notre objectif de financement de cette campagne, nous et nos fournisseurs serons prêts à commencer la production.

 

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Our vision
«To create a new breed of watch to match our perception of architectural design and functionality. Manufactured in Switzerland at an un-Swiss price»
 
It's bold, it's a Bólido.
Having received the Red Dot Award 2018, the new BÓLIDO X now takes the concept to the next level.
The stainless-steel case incorporates a turning bezel with a diamond-cut side-knurling and additional attractive functionality. What looks competently sleek, requires a radically new technical construction, the complication being hidden on the inside. 
[Für Text in Deutsch nach unten scrollen] – [Pour texte français, faites défiler vers le bas]
 
 
Bólido X LOG black Chronometer
 
Bólido X Log
Only few watch brands have defied the challenges of incorporating a slide-ruler disk to their timepieces. To achieve accurate performance, this demands a particularly high level of mechanical precision in the case-making.

BÓLIDO X LOG shown together with an original Calculator disk from the late Fifties
 
 

Bólido X LOG logarithmic scale calculated  by Prof. (ret) Karl Kleine in Jena, Germany
 
Being "always at hand", a slide-rulers on your wrist is very useful for quick conversions of currencies when travelling, lengths, speeds and distances, weights, temperatures etc. on the fly. The new Bólido X Log enables quick easy divisions, multiplications and «rule of three»- calculations. Aside of this and its performance as a Swiss automatic mechanical timekeeper, the Bólido X Log is also simply a stunning eye-catcher.
 
Bólido X CD

Bólido X CD
 
The Bólido X CD has the same turning bezel construction, but it graphically indicates a remaining time, think of parking meter, meetings, diving etc. Simple, practical and quick: Match the position of the minute hand with a chosen amount of time on the bezel and the arrow indicates the end of the countdown; the last 15 minutes (in sailing regattas the most important-) are highlighted in color.
 

Bólido X CD black
 

The BÓLIDO X Swiss Technology automatic precision movement STP 1.11
 
The new Bólido X models are Instruments for a broad range of often-used tasks. The slightly increased overall size will please those backers with masculine wrists.    
 

Bólido X under the loupe
 
 
 

The crystal at the back of the BÓLIDO X is dome-shaped to give a loupe view of the movement, Also note the Quick-release spring bars that allow easy change of bands
 
 
A choice of attractive bands
The four Bólido X models come with a genuine, custom-made and durable Caoutchouc strap lasting "forever", it can be cleaned by holding it under a water tap; we think that it fits the modern, sporty design of the watches perfectly. Alternatively available at an additional cost of just 30 CHF to be added to your pledge, we offer a luxurious genuine ostrich-leather strap SAVANNA or a fashionable, fully adjustable MILANO wire-mesh bracelet; the MILANO is either steel coloured or black PVD coated to match the case colour.  Choose the preferred band-model on the survey that you'll receive after the campaign is completed.

Optional: SAVANNA ostrich leather (left), MILANO wire mesh steel and black (right)
 
 

 
 
Bólido rocks because it ticks
True longevity of watches is measured in generations, not in sequences of yearly updates.  Bólido timepieces are strictly mechanical and can be serviced and repaired during a lifetime and beyond; they will never become obsolete just because a certain battery type is no longer produced. 
 
Only a watch made in Switzerland is SWISS MADE
Savvy backers are not fooled by intentionally misleading euphemisms like “Swiss parts”, “Swiss design”, “Swiss company”, etc.  A truly “Swiss made” must comply with stiff regulations defined by the Swiss government in conjunction with the federation of the watch-making industry. They are manufactured in the birth land of watchmaking, where it is subjected to high statutory standards. Where an apprentice undergoes four years of basic professional training to learn the practical and the intellectual skills and to pass a demanding governmental examination, before being permitted to using the title of a Swiss watchmaker. And this of course is only the start, as freshmen will continue to enhance their skills to further their careers.
 
COSC chronometer certification
The one way to further enhance a product that already has received the best technical and artisanal attention of highly competent professionals would be an official and neutral certification of COSC Contrôle Officiel Suisse des Chronomètres

This coveted certification is awarded to an individually numbered movement after it has successfully passed an independent, 14-day inspection-sequence of precision and reliability in high and low temperatures as well as in 5 different positions. (It helps that all Bólido movements are factory-tested in the same 5 positions by default).
A C.O.S.C. certification is the highest quality rating a Swiss timepiece can obtain, the prestigious “Certified Swiss Chronometer C.O.S.C.” badge printed on the dial is seen on only 6 % of Switzerland’s total watch production. Backers can pledge for the chronometer-option at additional cost.
 
A mechanical watch is as good as its service
 

 
We take care of your timepiece, be it within the international 2-year warranty and beyond. Designated Bólido service centers are located in Switzerland, Germany (for the EU), the USA and Japan and are expanded to more countries as we grow.
 
A Bólido keeps its value
Anyone knowledgable about watches will wonder how it is possible that a timepiece such as the Bólido X costs only a fraction of absolutely comparable models of established brands with the same specs; and we are talking of our forthcoming regular shop prices! The additional discounts of our limited crowdfunding rewards are flat-out incredible, but you must take advantage quickly, as this opportunity will not come back. In all probability, the Bólido X, –notably from a company with a proven track-record of two successful previous campaigns–, will be our last project to be financed by crowd-funding at such exceptional conditions. To afford the advertising necessary to grow, we will no longer be able to give away the heavy crowdfunding discounts.  Price increases are to be expected; you'll never get a genuine Bólido at these outstanding offers again. 
 

 
 

Bólido X on your wrist, what a statement! (Top: CD, bottom: LOG)
 
 
What is this fund raising for?
We have financed the entire cost for design, R&D and the preparation of 1:1 working prototypes by ourselves. To now realise this project, new tooling and the advance-payments for considerable minimum initial order quantities (MOQ) are required. Your numerous pledges are making it all possible. In return we make our rewards as attractive as possible.  Let's make these beautiful timepieces a reality together! Thank you all.
 

Close your pledge NOW to secure your package!
 
 
Media raves about Bólido
 

 
This is only a selection of (unpaid!) Media coverage of Bólido, «a luminary that crosses between the somewhat immovable fixed stars of established brands on the watch firmament.»
