story_txt:
Text in englisch -deutsch- francais  please scroll !!!  
About me                                               
Katrin Leiber
I was born in Germany. At a young age I became interested in art and design and decided that Paris was the best place for me to be. After passing my A-levels I moved from Germany to Paris to study fashion design at “ESMOD Paris”. In 1996 I received the first prize of ESMOD as best student of my year.  After this first step in the fashion world, I have started my professional life by working for several brands I made an early start as freelance designer.  After I started my career as designer I decided to create my personal vision of fashion. The dream came true in January 2003 when I presented my first handbag collection for winter 2004, illustrating my talent in design.
In October 2009 I presented my first shoe collection of changeable heels(screw type) at the the trade show “Premiere Class “in Paris.The press releases were very positive.When creating my second collection I realised that my designs would be limited as all the heels had to be round because of the screw system.This was the start of the new system which I started with my father, a well-known engineer in the automobile industry. I am now reay to start a brand new technology and Must-Have in women's shoes.
 
AS SEEN IN :

and more.......
"ELLE (Germany)” in the September 2005 edition presented me as a new talent with a great future in the fashion world, they also underlined my original and personal conception of accessories.  “Lucky (USA)”selected me as one of the 8 best new designers worldwide and presented my portrait and biography in the September edition 2006.  “C+ Accessoires (France)” presented me in 2007 as the “rising star of leather goods”.  SWR, a german television channel, selected me in 2009 as one of the best European new Designers. 
 
OUR STORY
We offer a new possibility in women's footwear with our patented idea of making high heels with changeable heels. These are expressed in thoughtful designs, handmade in Italy using ecologically advanced technology in sophisticated forms and materials. The major part of the heels can be also produced by 3 D printing which allows incredible heels designs never seen before. This production tool is absolutely new in the shoe industry.
Now women have the freedom to change shoe heels according to the mood or situation they are in. Just with a few adjustments they are ready for work, clubbing, shopping and so on. Heels ruined on curb stones are no longer a disaster- just click on a new heel and the shoe is brand new or has another style.

Picture of black high heel with changeable leather heels
 
Getting it right in combining Italian fitting and workmanship with German high-tech tools for heels also meant finding a manufacturer whose “got it”. Our partners for the development of the changeable heel system and manufacturing of the heels are based in Munich and Dieburg, Germany. Our partner for the shoe development and production is based in Italy’s specialized shoe region “Le Marche“ (near Ancona). This region is known as the heart of the Italian footwear industry. Artisans here have honed their skills over generations. Just as our manufacturer has done for other well-known labels, each high heel is tailored and manufactured using the finest materials.

Picture of black high heels with changeable Swarovski crystal heels
 
What is the difference between our technology and other changeable heel systems?
- We can offer any heel design as the ouside of the heel is just a cover  stuck to the heel itself
- We can use new technology like 3 D printing and produce designs not possible with inject molding
- We do not need  extra soles inside or outside the shoe to fix the heel
- Our shoes can be of the same design as shoes without the changeable heel system
- Our system is very light beause it is made of abs plastic which is as solid as metal, but lighter in weight
Why don't we offer heels of different heights?
Even a few millimeters difference in the height will destroy the perfection of the shoes. You might even have some back pain from walking with heels that are not perfectly balanced.
 
COLLECTION
Collection Details:
- Patented heel system made in Germany
- Shoes handmade in Italy - High quality and eco-friendly materials  - Shoes are delivered in a very high quality, sophisticated shoe box with  2 extra shoe bags, 1 heel bag and a certificate of authenticity

Picture of metal tag with Katrin Leiber Logo inside the shoes
 
Picture of zebra heels
 
THE IMPACT 
Having the freedom to change shoe heels according to your mood or situation you are in. This is what I want to feature to all women in the world.
In short: one shoe + different heels = endless, funky styles and looks!
The project is in its final stage and ready for production. To make all of this happen I need your help. I need to raise $38.000 to purchase the first inventory. If you like the shoes and want your own pair with changeable heels, please buy your limited, first founder edition shoes through Indiegogo. Participating now is the only way you can get the limited, founder edition shoes and heels. These come with a special metallic edition logo and a numbered certificate of authenticity, with special discounts of up to 30% off post-launch retail pricing, because we change the euro price into dollar price for this project. Within one month after we completed our Indiegogo project successfully, we will email you to finalize the style and size you wish to order. When you buy high-quality pumps and high heels, they can last longer and save you money in the long-run. Your cost per wear can be lower with high-quality shoes that last for several years than cheaper one that lasts for only one season. Shoes with changeable heels save you even more money. If your heel is damaged you don´t need to dump your shoes - with few adjustments you practically have a new pair of shoes!
 
WHY PERK THIS PROJECT?
Here is what you will help to accomplish:
- Help cover the remaining cost of the first ever mass production order for fall /winter 2013
- Help to pay for an advertising agency to promote the line
- Help cover cost for beginning the 2014 collection
- Make it possible to begin prototyping the bag and accessories line.
- Help with the cost of getting the online store up and running!
 
PERKS
 
5 $ +  thank you for making a pledge. You will receive a mention on our website.

15 $ +  thank you for making a pledge. You will receive a handwritten thank you note from the designer and a mention on our website.

$45 +  you will receive a specially designed cellphone cases printed with our 3D printer.
Available cases:  iPhones 4 and 5 and Samsung Galaxy S3,S3 mini and S4  with or without Katrin Leiber Logo
Available Colors (from left ot right): Rose; Anthracite metallic, black and silver

$60 +  you will receive a specially designed cellphone cover printed with our 3D printer.
Available cases:  iPhones 4 and 5 and Samsung Galaxy S3,S3 mini and S4  with or without Katrin Leiber Logo
Available Colors (from left ot right): Pink; gold, silver and red

65 $ +  (right side) you receive ONE pair of bronze, limited Katrin Leiber edition heels and a certificate of authenticity. The first 100 pairs we produce will be signed by the designer and will ship first.
85 $ + (left side) you receive ONE pair of silver, limited Katrin Leiber edition  heels and a certificate of authenticity .The first 50 pairs we produce will be signed by the designer and will ship first.
 
 
120 $ +  you receive ONE pair of gold, limited Katrin Leiber edition  heels and a certificate of authenticity.
145 $  +(left side) you receive ONE pair of multicolor Swarovski crystals, limited Katrin Leiber edition heels and a certificate of authenticity.
150 $ +  (right side) you receive ONE pair of black & white Swarovski crystals, limited Katrin Leiber edition  heels and a certificate of authenticity.

 
380 $ +  you receive ONE black pair of Katrin Leiber high heels in calfskin leather and a certificate of authenticity. The first 80 pairs we produce will be signed by the designer and will ship first.
 
SPREAD THE WORD
Help spread the word! Even if you are not able to provide financial backing, you can still help out in a major way. A brand is nothing without the people who support it, so please use the Indiegogo "Share Tools" to spread the word about KATRIN LEIBER! Thank you for taking the time to visit this page, all contributions and publicity are greatly appreciated!
Thanks so much ! :-)
Katrin Leiber
 
 °°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°
                                                                                                            deutsch
 
Katrin Leibers Designer Pumps und High Heels mit dem besonderen Kick – der Absatz ist auswechselbar und kann je nach Stimmung oder Anlass beliebig ausgetauscht werden.
                                                                                                           
Über Katrin Leiber
Ich bin in Mannheim geboren und habe mich schon früh für Kunst und Design interessiert. Deshalb bin ich nach meinem Abitur nach Paris gegangen, um an der berühmten ESMOD Schule Modedesign zu studieren. Hier habe ich 1996 als Jahrgangsbeste in den Fächern Styliste und Modeliste abgeschlossen.
Während einiger Stationen als Freelancer bei namhaften Modefirmen reifte in mir immer mehr der Traum eine eigene Handtaschenkollektion mit meiner ganz persönlichen Handschrift zu kreieren. Im Januar 2003 wurde der Traum Realität und ich präsentierte meine erste Handtaschenkollektion für Herbst / Winter 2003.
Im Oktober 2008 präsentierte ich meine erste Schuhkollektion mit auswechselbaren Absätzen (damals noch ein einfaches Schraubsystem) auf der Prèmiere Class in Paris. Für diese Idee habe ich bereits damals schon einige positive Pressestimmen geerntet. Beim Designen der zweiten Kollektion wurde mir klar, dass ich mit diesem Schraubsystem zu limitiert war im Design der Absätze, weil diese alle rund sein mussten. Ich habe deshalb gerne die Hilfe meines Vaters, einem renommierten Ingenieur aus der Automobilbranche, angenommen. Heute kann ich ein System präsentieren, das technisch absolut neuartig ist und das Potential für ein absolutes must have bei Damenschuhen hat…
GESEHEN IN:

und mehr............
Die deutsche Elle präsentierte mich in der Ausgabe vom September 2005 als ein neues Talent mit großer Zukunft in der Modewelt. Auch mein eigenständiger, unverwechselbarer  Stil wurde lobend erwähnt.
Die amerikanische Lucky kürte mich im Herbst 2006 zu einer de acht besten Nachwuchsdesignerinen  weltweit und präsentierte ein Portrait von mir.
Das französische Magazin C+ accesoires titelte in der März 2007 Ausgabe «der aufgehende Stern bei Lederwaren»
Der Fernsehsender SWR wählte mich in einem Fernsehbeitrag im Jahr 2009 zu einer der besten europäischen Designer.
 
Unsere Geschichte
Mit unserem patentierten System für Pumps und High Heels mit auswechselbaren Absätzen eröffnen wir völlig neue Möglichkeiten im Bereich der Damenschuhe. Diese erscheinen in ansprechenden Designs, werden in Italien per Hand unter Berücksichtigung  ökonomischer und ökologischer Standards mit anspruchsvollen Materialien gefertigt.  Der größte Teil der Absätze kann dabei auch mit 3 D Druckverfahren hergestellt werden, was bisher noch nie gesehene Designs bei den Absätzen ermöglicht. Diese Technik kam bisher in der Schuhindustrie noch nie zum Einsatz.
Als Frau die Freiheit zu haben sich, mit wenigen Handgriffen, auf die aktuelle Stimmung oder Situation einzustellen. An Bordsteinkanten ruinierte Absätze bedeuten jetzt nicht mehr den Verlust eines geliebten Schuhs. Einfach einen neuen Absatz angebracht und der Schuh ist wieder wie neu.
 

schwarzer Peep Toe mit Lederabsatz
 
Unsere Pumps und High Heels sind dabei eine Deutsch / Italienische High-Tech Koproduktion und es war gar nicht so einfach die passenden Partner zu finden. In Deutschland sitzt die Entwicklung des Systems in München, die Produktion der Absätze in Dieburg. Unsere italienischen Partner, die für die Entwicklung und perfekte Passform der Schuhe verantwortlich sind, haben in der Gegend um Ancona (Region le Marche) ihren Firmensitz. Diese Region ist bekannt als das Herzstück italienischer Schuhmanufaktur und die Mitarbeiter in den Firmen haben über Generationen das Handwerk verfeinert. Unsere Firmen arbeiten auch für andere namhafte Marken.  

schwarzer Peep Toe mit Swarovski Absatz
 
Worin liegen die Unterschiede unseres Systems im Vergleich zu anderen System am Markt?
 Designvorteil: unser Absatz ist eine Hülle ohne tragende Funktion. Deshalb können wir Produktionsverfahren wie 3 D Druck, um bisher nie da gewesene Designs zu produzieren.
Produktionsvorteil: durch den Einsatz von 3 D Druckverfahren können wir sehr schnell und flexibel kleine und große Stückzahlen (nach)-produzieren.
Kostenvorteil: wir benötigen bei der Produktion der  Absätze weniger Material und haben ein einfaches Rastsystem, das auf zusätzliche Sohlen / Halteschienen verzichtet.
 Besserer Tragekomfort: unsere Schuhe sind perfekt austariert und bieten damit einen hervorragenden Tragekomfort. Bei den anderen Systemen  mit unterschiedlichen Absatzhöhen stimmt die Statik nicht mehr und dadurch ist der Tragekomfort extrem eingeschränkt. Dies kann dauerhaft zu Gelenkschädigungen führen.
 
Warum bieten wir keine unterschiedlichen Absatzhöhen bei einem Modell an?
Bei Systemen mit unterschiedlichen Absatzhöhen stimmt die Statik nicht mehr und dadurch ist der Tragekomfort extrem eingeschränkt. Dies kann dauerhaft zu Gelenkschädigungen führen. Selbst ein paar Millimeter Höhenunterschied sind spürbar.
 
Kollektion
Details
- Patentiertes Absatzsystem made in Germany
- Alle Schuhe handmade in Italy
- Verwendung von qualitativ hochwertigsten und umweltfreundlichen Materialien
- Die Schuhe werden in einer hochwertigen Schuhschachtel mit 2 extra Schuhsäcken und 1 Absatzsack sowie einem Echtheitszertifikat geliefert
 
Metalllogo innen

Schwarzer Peep toe mit Zebraabsatz
 
Zebraabsatz
Die Wirkung
Als Frau die Freiheit zu haben den Schuh der jeweiligen Stimmung oder Bedarf anzupassen. Das ist es, was ich allen Frauen in dieser Welt ermöglichen möchte.
Kurz gesagt: eine Schuh + verschiedene Absätze = unendlich viele Styles und Looks!
Das Projekt ist in der Produktionsreife. Um die Produktion zu starten benötige ich ihre Hilfe. Ich brauche 38.000 $, um die erste Kleinserie zu produzieren. Wenn Ihnen die Schuhe gefallen und sie als eine der ersten ihr erstes Paar High Heels mit auswechselbaren Absätzen in der Hand halten wollen, kaufen Sie dieses einfach als limitierte Edition auf Indiegogo.
Das ist die einzige Möglichkeit, wie sie an die ersten limited Edition High Heels und Absätze gelangen können. Diese Edition ist mit einer speziellen Metallplakette im inneren des Schuhs und einem Echtheitszertifikat ausgestattet. Und das zu einem Spezialpreis mit bis zu 30% Rabatt, weil wir die € Preise einfach 1 zu 1 in $ Preise umgewandelt haben.
Innerhalb eines Monat nach Abschluss des Projekts auf Indiegogo bekommen sie von uns eine Bestätigungs-Email mit ihrer Bestellung und dem Auslieferungstermin.
Qualitativ hochwertige Schuhe sparen bares Geld, denn sie halten länger als billige Saisonware und geben ein gutes Gefühl beim Tragen, weil sie eine perfekte Passform haben.
Schuhe mit auswechselbaren Absätzen von Katrin Leiber sparen mehrfach, denn ruinierte Absätze bedeuten jetzt nicht mehr den Verlust des geliebten Schuhs. Einfach den Absatz gewechselt und der Schuh ist wie neu. Auch das gute Gefühl beim Tragen wird gesteigert, weil sie jetzt die Freiheit haben den Schuh ihrer Stimmung oder dem Anlass anzupassen.
 
Warum dem Projekt auf die Beine helfen? 
- Helfen sie die Kosten der ersten Produktion für Herbst / Winter 2013 mit zu tragen
- Helfen sie uns eine professionelle Werbeagentur zu beauftragen
- Helfen sie uns die Kosten für die Prototypen der neuen Kollektion zu minimieren
- Ermöglichen sie uns die Handtaschen- und Accessoires Kollektion zu starten
- Helfen sie uns den Online Shop zu entwickeln
 
Unterstützungen
 
5 $ + vielen Dank für ihre Unterstützung. Wir werden sie namentlich auf unserer Homepage erwähnen.

 
15 $ +  vielen Dank für ihre Unterstützung. Wir werden ihnen eine handsignierte Danke Karte zusenden und sie namentlich auf unserer Homepage erwähnen.
45 $ +  sie erhalten eine speziell designte Hülle für ihr Handy die mit unserem eigenen 3 D Drucker gefertigt wurde. Erhältlich für
Erhältliche Modelle: i Phone 4 und 5 und Samsung Galaxy S 3, S 3 mini und S4
Erhältliche Farben: (von links nach rechts): rose, Anthracite Metallic, Schwarz und Silber mit oder ohne Logo
60 $ + - sie erhalten eine speziell designte Hülle für ihr Handy die mit unserem eigenen 3 D Drucker gefertigt wurde.
Erhältliche Modelle: i Phone 4 und 5 und Samsung Galaxy S 3, S 3 mini und S4
Erhältliche Farben: (von links nach rechts): Pink, Gold, Silber und Rot

 
65 $ +(rechte Seite) sie erhalten ein paar limitierte Bronze Edition Indiegogo Absätze und ein Echtheitszertifikat. Die ersten 100 Paar die wir produzieren werden von der Designerin unterzeichnet und als erste geliefert.
85 $ + (linke Seite)  sie erhalten ein paar limitierte Silber Edition Indiegogo Absätze und ein Echtheitszertifikat. Die ersten 50 Paar die wir produzieren werden von der Designerin unterzeichnet und als erste geliefert.
 

 
120 $ +  sie erhalten ein paar limitierte Gold Edition Indiegogo Absätze und ein Echtheitszertifikat.

145 $ +  (linke Seite) sie erhalten ein paar limitierte Multi Color Swarovski Kristall Absätze, Edition Indiegogo und ein Echtheitszertifikat.
150 $ +(rechte Seite)  sie erhalten ein paar limitierte schwarz weiße Swarovski Kristall Absätze, Edition Indiegogo und ein Echtheitszertifikat.
 

 
380 $ +  sie erhalten ein Paar schwarze Katrin Leiber High Heels in Kalbsleder und ein Echtheitszertifikat. Die ersten 80 Paar die wir produzieren werden von der Designerin unterzeichnet und als erste geliefert.
 
Teile unser Projekt mit der Welt
Auch wenn sie nicht in der Lage sein sollten uns eine finanzielle Unterstützung zukommen zu lassen, indem sie eines unserer Produkte kaufen, können sie uns trotzdem aktiv unterstützen, indem sie die Indiegogo „Share Tools“ benutzen und der Welt von Katrin Leiber erzählen.
Wir bedanken uns, dass sie sich für unser Projekt interessieren und sich die Zeit genommen haben. Jeder Kommentar und die Verbreitung unseres Projektes ist willkommen!
 
Vielen Dank :-)
Ihre Katrin Leiber
 
°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°
 
Talons hauts de Katrin Leiber avec un plus innovant : le talon est échangeable selon l‘occasion, l‘envie et l‘humeur.
 
Katrin Leiber
Je suis née en Allemagne. Très tôt, j‘ai été attirée par le monde artistique: la peinture et la mode,  ce qui me poussa à m’installer à Paris en 1993, pour intégrer l’école de mode « ESMOD Paris » dont je suis sortie major de ma promotion.
Après une première étape d’apprentissage chez des créateurs, j‘ai décidé de me lancer comme styliste free lance. Dès mes premiers pas dans le monde de la mode, je souhaitais exprimer ma vision personnelle de mon univers créatif.
Ce sera chose faite en 2003 : je lance ma propre ligne d’accessoires, en exprimant ma sensibilité et mon talent dans une première collection de sacs à mains.
Vu dans

et d ´autres...............

« ELLE » dans son édition de Septembre 2005 présente Katrin Leiber comme nouveau talent dans l’accessoire, en soulignant également l’originalité et le style très personnel de mes créations.
 « Lucky (USA) » a sélectionnée Katrin Leiber en 2006 parmi les 8 meilleurs nouveaux designers mondiaux.
 « C+ Accessoires » présente Katrin Leiber en 2007 comme « l’étoile montante de la maroquinerie »
 
En octobre 2008 j‘ai présenté ma première collection de chaussures avec les talons échangeables au salon d‘accessoires Première Classe de Paris.
L‘accueil  positive de la presse me rendait consciente du potentiel de cette idée. Pendant le développement de ma deuxième collection j‘ai corrigé le système initial d‘hélice grâce à l‘aide de mon père, un ingénieur renommé de l‘industrie automobile. La chaussure doit être au maximum confortable et surtout la parfaite stabilité du talon doit être assurée. Mon système de talons échangeables est techniquement une nouveauté absolue. Aujourd‘hui il est breveté internationalement ( PCT ). 
 
Notre histoire
On ouvre des possibilités infinies à l‘univers des chaussures aux femmes grâce à notre système breveté de talons hauts échangeables.
Infinies au niveau du design et pratiques pour la femme, qui aura enfin la liberté de changer ses talons selon ses envies ou situations de vie: du bureau au shopping et ensuite au cocktail sans perdre du temps. Avec très peu de manipulation: d‘un simple ‘‘clic ‘‘ et la chaussure s‘adapte à votre envie dans la vie quotidienne. 
Les talons abimés au bordures de trottoir ne poseront plus de problème et n‘entraineront pas la perte de votre chaussure aimée: avec un simple ‘‘clic ‘‘ la chaussure est neuve. L‘avantage de la diversité au niveau du design s‘explique toute seule. Je vais créer de nombreux modèles de talons ce qui permettra d‘avoir un choix interminable.  Il me sera donc facile de changer: la couleur, la matière et le design selon les saisons et mes inspirations.
 
L‘aspect production: 
Nous fabriquons en co-production, notre production est aujourd‘hui une symbiose du savoir-faire de chaque partenaire: 
En Allemagne nous avons développé le système technique et la production des talons et en Italie la fabrication. 
Nous avons su trouver le fabricant adapté à nos exigences en Italie, pays spécialisé et renommé  pour la production de la chaussure dans le monde entier. 
Nos partenaires italiens fabriquent les chaussures manuellement et selon des critères strictes économiquement et écologiquement. Nous exigeons des matériaux nobles. Nos manufactures ont sublimé leurs artisanat sur des générations et ils produisent aussi bien pour d‘autres marques réputées.
Je peux produire la plus grande partie des talons avec une imprimante 3D, ce qui me permet des choix infinis au niveau du design avec une technique jamais vue dans l‘industrie des chaussures. 
 Les avantages de notre système des talons échangeables par rapport aux concurrents 
 
Design: 
Une gaine se clipsant sur un talon stable.  Cela nous permet une technologie comme l‘impression en 3D, donc en conséquence des possibilités de design infinies. 
Production: 
La mise en jeu de l‘imprimante 3D nous permet de produire sur des délais courts et d‘être très flexible: en petite ou en grande quantité.
Coûts: 
Il nous faut peu de matériel pour les talons. Un simple système de clip d‘accrochage nous permet d‘éviter les rails de retenue et souliers supplémentaires.     
 
GRAND CONFORT À PORTER:
Nos chaussures sont précisément équilibrées, ce qui permet un confort absolu.
Les systèmes avec différentes hauteurs des talons ne peuvent pas garantir la stabilité et peuvent provoquer des atteints articulaires.
 
Collection
Détails
 -un système breveté made in Germany
- toutes les chaussures fabriquées à la main en Italie
- utilisation des matériaux nobles et écologiques 
- la livraison des chaussures s‘effectue dans des boîtes luxurieuses    accompagnée de 2 housses pour les chaussures et 1 housse  pour les talons.  
- un certificat d‘authenticité est évident
 
plaque métallique á l´interieur de la chaussure

peep toe noir avec talon zebra

talons zebra
 
L‘impact
 
Avoir la liberté en tant que femme d‘adapter à son humeur, ses envies ou ses besoins sa chaussure. C‘est ce que je veux rendre possible aux femmes de ce monde.
En bref: une chaussure + divers talons = des styles et looks infinis.
Mon projet est à maturité de production. Il me faut de l‘aide pour commencer la première production : 38 000 $ pour le début d‘un lançement de la première petite série. Si mes chaussures vous plaisent et si vous voulez être parmi les premières à posséder une paire de high heels avec talons échangeables, vous pouvez les acheter en exclusivité sur Indiegogo en édition limitée.
Dès maintenant profitez de la seule possibilité de recevoir la première édition limitée de mes talons hauts. Cette édition contient un certificat d‘authenticité et une vignette de métal exclusive. Nos prix sur Indiegogo permettent une économie de près de 30% car nous avons adapté le taux de change pour qu‘un euro vale un dollar.
Vous allez recevoir un mois, après l‘achèvement du projet sur Indiegogo notre mail de confirmation avec votre commande avec la date précise de livraison.
Des chaussures de grande qualité vous permettent de faire une importante économie. Ils durent plus de temps que des produits bon marché et ils vous donnent un bon sentiment, car ils sont d‘un confort absolu.
Les chaussures avec les talons échangeables de Katrin Leiber permettent de multiples économies car un talon cassé n‘est plus synonyme de mise au rebus de votre paire de chaussure préférée.
Juste un clic et le talon est échangé et la chaussure comme neuve. A partir de maintenant, vous avez la liberté d‘adapter la chaussure à votre humeur et la situation, vous offrant de la fantaisie chaque fois que vous les portez... 
 
Pouquoi soutenir mon projet ? 
 
- Aidez-nous à financier la première production de A/H 2013.
- Aidez-nous à engager une agence de publicité professionnelle.
- Aidez-nous à minimiser les coûts pour les prototypes de la nouvelle collection.
- Permettez-nous d‘initier la collection de sacs à main et accessoire.
- Aidez-nous à mettre en place notre e-shop.
 
SOUTIENS:
 
5$  merci beaucoup pour votre soutien et vous serez citée sur notre site pour votre sponsoring.
 
15$ + merci beaucoup pour votre soutien et vous serez citée sur notre site pour votre sponsoring et vous recevrez oir une carte de remerciement signé manuellement.

45$ +  vous recevrez une pochette concue  spécialement pour votre téléphone portable, faite avec l‘imprimante 3D
Models possible: i Phone 4 und 5 und Samsung Galaxy S 3, S 3 mini und S4
Couleurs (de gauche á droite): Rose, Anthracite Metallic, Black et Silver avec ou sans Logo

60$ + vous recevrez une pochette concue  spécialement pour votre téléphone portable, faite avec l‘imprimante 3D
Models possible: i Phone 4 und 5 und Samsung Galaxy S 3, S 3 mini und S4
Couleurs: (de gauche à droite): Pink, Gold, Silver und Red avec ou sans Logo

65 $ + (droite) vous recevrez une paire de talons de l‘édition limité BRONZE Indiegogo et un certificat d‘authenticité. Les premières 100 paires seront décicacée personnellement par la créatrice et livrées en priorité.
85$ + (gauche) - vous recevrez une paire de talons de l‘édition limitée ARGENT Indiegogo et un certificat d‘authenticité. Les premières 50 paires seront dedicacées personnellement par la créatrice et livrées en priorité.
 
120$ + vous recevrez une paire de talons de l‘édition limitée Indiegogo OR et un certificat d‘authenticité.
 
180 $ + (gauche) vous recevrez une paire de talons de l‘édition limitée Indiegogo MULTI COLOR SWAROVSKI CRISTAL et un certificat d‘authenticité.
200 $ (droite) + vous recevrez une paire de talons de l‘édition limitée Indiegogo en strass noir & blanc SWAROVSKI et un certificat d‘authenticité.
 
 
 
380 $ + vous recevrez une paire de talons hauts de Katrin Leiber en noir et vachette et un certificat d‘authenticité. Les premières 80 paires seront dedicacées personnellement par la créatrice et livrées en priorité.
 
Partager notre projet avec le monde
 
A la place de nous soutenir financièrement en achetons nos produits
vous pourriez aussi bien nous aider activement: utiliser les „share tools“
de Indiegogo  pour diffuser Katrin Leiber et notre idée dans le monde. 
On vous remercie de s‘intéresser à notre projet et votre temps. Merci d‘avance pour chaque commentaire et médiatisation.  
Merci d‘avance de s‘intéresser à notre projet et de votre temps. Chaque commentaire et médiatisation est le bienvenu. 
 
Mille merci :-)
votre Katrin Leiber

story:
THE STORY OF GIJ

GIJ is committed to offering great vegan bags that are both current and timeless.  Designed and headquartered in Manhattan Beach, California, GIJ bags are meant to be well-used, well-traveled and well-loved.  They are made to get better with age, tell the story of where you have been & to take with you on your life journey.

GIJ is a lifestyle brand that will grow and transition and the goal is for GIJ to be a great vegan brand that will eventually include shoes, other accessories, companion animal accessories... the possibilities are endless!  The bags are where GIJ is starting and WE NEED YOUR HELP TO TRULY LAUNCH THIS BRAND! 

At the heart of GIJ vegan is RESPECT -

  • For ANIMALS - All bags are 100% vegan and cruelty free.  No animal products, skins or insect-based dyes are used.
  • For PEOPLE - We only source factories and resources that practice fair trade and are actively committed to improving labor conditions in the garment industry.
  • For the ENVIRONMENT - We use the most sustainable & eco-friendly fibers we can find for each bag, use EU approved dyes and finishes, and our makers carefully control and monitor waste water.  Our bags are all mindfully designed and sourced. 
  • For our local COMMUNITY - The founder of GIJ has been rescuing dogs from the streets of Los Angeles for the past 6 years.  GIJ LLC is committed to GIVING BACK a portion of their proceeds to continue in this effort to rescue, tend to medical needs, train, foster and find forever homes for animals in need.

GIJ FOUNDER AND DESIGNER - KATHY ARTHUN

"With 28 years in the fashion industry as a Designer and Design Director, I realized there was a handbag niche that I could fill with a California casual aesthetic that would appeal to vegans and non-vegans alike.  I decided to name the company GIJ (pronounced 'gidge') after my beloved dog, Gidget, who was the start of my love and respect of all animals.

I have worked for very small companies, mid-size companies, very large companies like Target Corp. and started a clothing company shortly out of college.  My diverse background and entrepreneurial spirit has given me a well-rounded knowledge of design, development, sourcing, manufacturing, production, sales and marketing.  I am very excited to bring this all together with GIJ LLC - a business I have worked very hard to develop up to this point and one that I am very proud of.  CONTRIBUTING TO THIS CAMPAIGN WILL BE TRULY LAUNCHING MY BUSINESS!!  THANK YOU!"

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

100% of the money raised in this campaign will go to fund our first round of production of the Kingsley hemp bags and the California Streets vegan pouches and to hire a great website designer to design and get www.gijvegan.com up and running.  Our goal is $40,000 - however, we would LOVE to raise more so we will be able to launch the 2nd three colors of the Kingsley bag.  If we raise less, we will be funding the production as a first priority and the website will have to wait.  We hope to be able to do it ALL! 

In exchange for contributions, you can get one of the very first GIJ bags!  We are offering both the Kingsley hemp bags and the California Streets pouches as great "perks".  In our retail business, we are targeting accounts like Neiman Marcus Cusp, Barneys, Anthropologie, Urban Outfitters and every hip, trendy boutique in the country.  Although we don't know what they will retail for at each store, we feel these "perk" prices offer about a 10% discount.  You will be helping me start a business that I am very proud of & you can feel good about PLUS get a GREAT bag that is timeless and destined to become a favorite!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

SHARE SHARE SHARE!!!!  Whether you can or can't donate, PLEASE share my campaign with coworkers & friends, post on FB, IG, Twitter, forward in emails, use the handy Indiegogo "share" tools!  Please help spread the campaign far and wide and create some great buzz!  It makes a HUGE difference!

PLEASE click on the Facebook link below and "LIKE" the GIJ vegan fan page - please ask your friends to do the same!

FOLLOW us on Twitter @gijvegan and Pinterest!  Help us start building a fan base!

PLEASE go to our temporary website at www.gijvegan.com and sign up to join our mailing list!

PLEASE be the first to follow us on Instagram @gijvegan


PERK DETAIL PHOTOS BELOW:

HIGHLAND WALLET (BELOW) - APPROX 5" X 3.35".  AVAILABLE IN SILVER, TURQUOISE, AND BLACK/SILVER.


SUNSET COIN PURSE (BELOW) APPROX. 3.5" X 3.75".  AVAILABLE IN CHERRY, YELLOW, AND BLACK/SILVER.


WILSHIRE BAG (BELOW) - APPROX. 7.5" X 4.25".  AVAILABLE IN APPLE, BLACK/SILVER, AND CHERRY.


MULHOLLAND LONG POUCH (BELOW) - APPROX. 8.25" X 2.75".  AVAILABLE IN TURQUOISE, BLACK/SILVER, APPLE, AND CHERRY.


LAUREL CANYON BAG (BELOW) - APPROX. 8.5" X 5".  AVAILABLE IN YELLOW, BLACK/SILVER, SILVER, AND APPLE.


VENTURA BAG (BELOW) - APPROX. 9" X 4.75".  AVAILABLE IN BLACK/SILVER, TURQUOISE, SILVER, AND YELLOW.


KINGSLEY HEMP BAG (BELOW) - APPROX. 18" WIDE X 14" HIGH.  2 STRAP LENGTHS - 44" REGULAR AND 50" LONG.  AVAILABLE IN CHARCOAL, STONE AND ARMY GREEN.  IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO WAIT APPROXIMATELY ANOTHER MONTH (END OF JULY), WE WILL BE MAKING THE DUSTY BLUE, BRICK RED AND BROWN FOR THAT DELIVERY.

ONE OF A KIND Hill Tribe Pouch.  I only have 6 available.  All are approximately 4.5" tall and 6" wide.  Lined in vintage printed fabric.  All embroideries have a very similar look to this one, but each is unique!

ONE OF A KIND Hill Tribe Pouch (BELOW).  I only have 2 available.  Both are approximately 3.5" tall and 5.5" wide.  Lined in vintage printed fabric.  Both embroideries have a very similar look to this one, but each is unique!

ONE OF A KIND Hill Tribe Pouch (BELOW).  I only have 1 available.  Approximately 3" tall and 8.5" wide.  Lined in vintage printed fabric. 

Clean simple lightweight crossbody square pouch (BELOW).  Vegan leather.  I only have 4 available.  Inside faux suede lining.  Small magnet closure.  Inside zip pocket.  Approximately 8.5 x 8.75.  46" strap.

story:
www.etsy.com/shop/GutterQueenJewellery

A little bit about this lil' company I call GutterQueen...

I started up GutterQueen Jewellery as I've always been a very DIY kind of gal, and have now been running it single-handedly for nearly a year and a half. I always design for people who love a bit of colour, attitude and a big helping of studs, and aren't scared of standing apart from the rest. I've been lucky enough to have some of the most awesome customers around, which makes it worth every ounce of passion and effort that I pour into making the products.

I have SO many ideas for a brand new collection in mind that's ready to go, but it's near impossible to achieve as every penny that I make from selling the jewellery goes straight back into buying materials and keeping the company going. I had to take a break a few months ago, as trying to balance the business and my personal life and the finances of keeping GutterQueen afloat was becoming too much, but now I'm back and ready to be bigger than ever, and I really need your help.

Where the funds are going...

Every single penny will go straight toward new products to ensure that I can provide you guys with some brand new, spankingly badass pieces!

  • - I'm planning to branch out to acrylic necklaces and rings, which means there will be more variety in design and colours. Also will be introducing some really badass stickers and badges, which will be professionally designed!
  • - I source a lot of my materials from abroad to make sure that the quality stays high but the prices for customers stay as low as possible. This means that with funding I can afford to ship over many more materials for new necklaces, hair fascinators and, most importantly, LOTS OF STUDS! :)
  • - I have some AMAZING models on board for new promotional materials such as flyers, stickers and banners. A lot of this material will be used at a couple of tattoo conventions that I'm planning on having a trader's stall at this year, including the Manchester International Tattoo Show.
  • - Plans for a new, proper GutterQueen Jewellery website are underway, and this funding would help to get it set up and professionally designed. 

What it would mean...

I've not asked for any financial help with my company before, as I've always been a bit stubborn ;) So every spare bit of money that I've used to fund it has been off my own back, so I really toyed with the idea of setting up this page. But without a doubt this money would completely change everything for GutterQueen, and help me provide you guys with some really amazing products, without a single pound being wasted. I've never really come from a well off background, and even though I've struggled sometimes in the past it's still such a huge passion for me, and £500 would mean the difference between GutterQueen sinking into nothingness, and GutterQueen getting taken to a completely new level. The appreciation I have for your help is beyond words.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know not everyone will be able to contribute, but even if you can't spare anything please do help get the word out. Share, share, share with your friends and on any social media platforms you possibly can! The more people that spread the word the more funds I'll be able to raise and that means better products for you all!

 

Thank you so much for reading through this and for all your support for the past year and a half. It means so much to me - you guys are f**king awesome!

xxx

GQ

story:
Some Of My Designs

My Story

About 3 months ago i was looking for more out of life and wanted to do something that made me happy for a living. I was out and about and came upon a yard sale where i saw a woman whose daughter had a great bow in her hair. I started talking with the woman about the bow and asked her where she got it from, she replied that a friend of hers had made it and she did not know where you could buy them from. I got to thinking and realized that it was a great product for kids but there was no where locally to buy them from. I want to Walmart and bought all the supplies i needed and got to work. I created a bunch of bows and started showing them off around town and to people with kids. The bows were a hit but due to the cost of materials i had to sell them for $5 each to turn a small profit and make it worth my time to keep making them. I faced a new problem and that was being able to buy materials in bulk so i could charge less for the bows and in the end sell more of them. This is where you come in.

What i need to get started?

I am in need of more capital so i can buy more materials in bulk and cut down on my cost of each bow. Currently i have to charge $5 for each bow but i would like to be able to charge $3 per bow to make them more affordable for people to buy while still getting a hand crafted designer bow.

The End Result

If i was able to raise $4,000 i would be able to really start rolling on making many more bows and take my business online. If i was able to charge less for the bows not only would i sell more but my customers would be able to get a great product at a fair price.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone has money to help donate and bring my dream to life. You can also help me by sharing this page on your Facebook or Google + or by leaving me comments with any info you think would be helpful to me.

story:
The coolest wallet for minimalists and artists


Story:
Hi everybody there! I am Alexei Nagel, the developer and manufacturer of the Victoria wallet. It is my happy fortune to tinker crazy and unusual things, especially when it gives me a real pleasure. To test, to play and to tinker have been my passions since the time I can remember. Even as a child I tried to build my own bike. Later, wood sculptures, furniture, and even radios used to be my hobbies. I could never stop with tinkering! Why? Because I love it!

Why a wallet?
I was always in search of a special kind of wallet. Although the market is literally flooded with different kinds of wallets, there has never been anything suitable for me till now. I need a wallet that is like a shadow - everywhere with me. Thus, it must be easy and lie unobtrusive in my pocket, but being out of the pocket it must be an elegant eye-catcher. Finally, it keeps all my important documents together and deserves therefore a lot of attention.


About a year has passed from the moment as I started to tinker my own wallet. I remembered as being a little boy in kindergarten I made a kind of a “magic bag” from rubber bands and paper. After having made many various prototypes in the past months, I have finally achieved the result with which I can be very satisfied. And the best of all is: The wallet can be also designed individually. 

Style:
The wallet Victoria has a simple design and is very practical for everyday life. Banknotes, credit cards, notes and receipts (and of course much more) can be easily stowed with the help of the wallet. The wallet Victoria has been an eye-catcher at numerous fairs - especially in combination with business cards. With the help of the eccentric function of the wallet I stayed in memory of many people and thus received significantly more callbacks from the interested. 

Universal:
The Victoria wallet is very light, has a comfortable size and lies well in the hand. The wallet can be quickly hidden in a trouser pocket or a pocket of a jacket and remains not obtrusive. Even in a woman's handbag, the Victoria wallet can be found very well.

Material:
After long considerations and countless tests the material for the purse has been finalized: acrylic glass.
Acrylic glass is durable, light and can be multifunctionally used. Additionally acrylic has a high gloss finish and offers very good maintenance qualities.

Production:
For the reason that the price of production remains adequate, the minimal produced quantity should be at least 300 wallets. It means at least 600 acrylic plates that are needed for the production. The acrylic plates are cut by a laser and brought to a right form. A pattern is engraved on one side of the plates, and then they are colored. Both acrylic plates are manually connected by an elastic rubber band. The used rubber band is very stable and extremely durable. I've been using my first prototype since 7 months – faultless and without any weaknesses. The rubber band remains in a good form even by an intensive usage of the wallet. 

Perks:

Further development:
If I succeed in a start of the project – of course only with your great support - Victoria wallet has great potentials for further developments in different directions - for example in color, personalized engraving, different materials (leather, aluminum, wood, etc.). The possibilities are far from being exhausted.

Your support:
At this point your support is needed to bring to life this type of a wallet. Manufacturing, packaging and logistics are funded with your support. Thanks a lot in advance for your interest in my project.

Risks:
It is now almost a year passed since I've started working on the first Victoria wallet.  Many things have changed meanwhile. I have developed and optimized, and now I can proudly present you "Victoria". At this point I would like to thank you as active supporters.
Still, I do not know how much interesting the wallet will be really.
In case of really great interest, it can happen that the production will take more time and thus it may come to delays in deliveries. I would like to thank you in advance for your understanding.

 

 

 

Die coolste Brieftasche für Minimalisten und Artisten

Story:
Seit gegrüßt alle miteinander! Ich bin Alexej Nagel der Entwickler und Hersteller des Victoria Portmonee. Ich brenne dafür verrückte und außergewöhnliche Dinge zu basteln, vor allem wenn es mir richtig Freude bereitet. Ausprobieren, Spielen und Tüfteln sind für mich eine Passion, seither ich zurückdenken kann.  Schon als Kind versuchte ich mein eigenes Fahrrad zu bauen. Später mussten Holzskulpturen, Möbel und sogar Radios für mein Hobby herhalten. Mit dem Basteln konnte ich niemals aufhören! Warum? Weil ich es liebe!

Wieso ein Portmonee?
Ich war immer auf der Suche nach einer besonderen Art von Geldbörse. Obwohl  der Markt förmlich von Portmonees überflutet ist, war für mich bis jetzt nichts passendes dabei. Ich brauche eine Geldbörse die wie ein Schatten überall dabei ist. Demnach muss es leicht und unauffällig in der Tasche liegen aber beim Hervorholen als eleganter Blickfang dienen.  Letztendlich bewahrt es alle meine wichtigen Dokumente an einem Ort  auf und verdient deshalb auch viel Aufmerksamkeit.

Etwa ein Jahr ist es her als ich angefangen habe an meinem eigenen Portmonee zu basteln. Dabei erinnerte ich mich, wie ich als Kind im Kindergarten aus Gummibändern und Papier eine Art „Zaubertasche“ gebastelt habe. Nach einer Vielzahl von Prototypen in den letzten Monaten habe ich endlich das Ergebnis erreicht mit dem ich sehr zufrieden sein kann. Und das Beste ist:  Die Geldbörse lässt sich auch individueller gestalten.

Design:
Die Victoria Geldbörse verfügt über ein schlichtes Design und ist überaus praktisch für das alltägliche Leben.  Mit Hilfe des Portmonees lassen sich Geldscheine, Kreditkarten, Notizzettel und auch Kassenbons kinderleicht verstauen (natürlich auch vieles mehr).  Auf zahlreichen Messen war die Victoria Geldbörse ein Blickfang vor allem in Kombination mit Visitenkarten. Mit Hilfe der ausgefallenen Funktion des Portmonees blieb ich vielen Menschen in Erinnerung und erhielt somit deutlich mehr Rückrufe von Interessenten.

Universal:
Das Victoria Portmonee ist sehr leicht, besitzt eine angenehme Größe und liegt dabei  gut in der Hand.  In der Hosen- oder Sakkotasche lässt sich die Geldbörse schnell verstecken und fällt dabei nicht auf. Auch in einer Frauenhandtasche lässt sich das Victoria Portmonee sehr gut wiederfinden.

Material:
Nach einigen langen Überlegungen und unzähligen Test steht das Material für die Geldbörse endgültig fest: Acrylglas.
Acrylglas ist robust, leicht und vielseitig einsetzbar. Dabei besitzt Acrylglas eine hochglänzende Oberfläche und bringt sehr gute Pflegeeigenschaften an den Start.

Produktion:
Damit der Preis der Herstellung angemessen bleibt, rechne ich mit mindestens 300 Geldbörsen. Dabei handelt es sich um mindestens 600 Acrylglas-Platten die für die Produktion benötigt werden. Die Acrylglas-Platten werden mit Hilfe eines Lasers ausgeschnitten und in die handliche Form gebracht.  Auf eine Seite wird ein Muster graviert und anschließend gefärbt. In Handarbeit werden beide Acrylglas-Platten durch ein elastisches Gummiband miteinander verbunden. Dabei ist das verwendete Gummiband sehr stabil und äußerst langlebig. Meinen ersten Prototyp benutze ich schon seit 7 Monaten, einwandfrei und ohne Schwächen. Das Gummiband bleibt auch bei intensiver Benutzung der Geldbörse in Form.

Perks:

Weitere Entwicklung:
Sollte mir ein erfolgreicher Start des Projekts gelingen - natürlich nur mit eurer großartigen Unterstützung - hat die Victoria Geldbörse großes Potenzial für weitere Produktentwicklungen. Dabei plane ich zur Zeit in viele unterschiedliche Richtungen z.B. Farbe, persönliche Gravur, verschiedenste Materialien (Leder, Aluminium, Holz etc.).  Die Möglichkeiten sind noch lange nicht ausgeschöpft.

Ihre Unterstützung:
Hier ist jetzt Ihre Unterstützung gefragt um diese Art von Geldbörse zum Leben zu erwecken. Mit Ihrer Hilfe werden Herstellung, Verpackung und Logistik des Portmonees finanziert.  Vorweg ein großes Dankeschön für das Interesse an meinem Projekt.

Risiken:
Ein Jahr ist es nun fast her seit ich die Arbeit an der ersten Victoria Geldbörse aufgenommen habe. In diesem Zeitrahmen hat sich seither so Einiges getan. Ich habe entwickelt und optimiert und kann Ihnen jetzt stolz „Victoria“ präsentieren. Hier möchte ich Ihnen als tatkräftigen Unterstützer danken.
Trotzdem weiß ich noch nicht, wie groß das Interesse an der Geldbörse wirklich sein wird.
Bei sehr großem Interesse könnte es also durchaus vorkommen, dass sich die Produktion verzögert, sodass es zum verspäteten Versand kommt. Hier möchte ich für Ihr Verständnis danken.
story_txt:
The coolest wallet for minimalists and artists
Story: Hi everybody there! I am Alexei Nagel, the developer and manufacturer of the Victoria wallet. It is my happy fortune to tinker crazy and unusual things, especially when it gives me a real pleasure. To test, to play and to tinker have been my passions since the time I can remember. Even as a child I tried to build my own bike. Later, wood sculptures, furniture, and even radios used to be my hobbies. I could never stop with tinkering! Why? Because I love it!

Why a wallet? I was always in search of a special kind of wallet. Although the market is literally flooded with different kinds of wallets, there has never been anything suitable for me till now. I need a wallet that is like a shadow - everywhere with me. Thus, it must be easy and lie unobtrusive in my pocket, but being out of the pocket it must be an elegant eye-catcher. Finally, it keeps all my important documents together and deserves therefore a lot of attention.
 About a year has passed from the moment as I started to tinker my own wallet. I remembered as being a little boy in kindergarten I made a kind of a “magic bag” from rubber bands and paper. After having made many various prototypes in the past months, I have finally achieved the result with which I can be very satisfied. And the best of all is: The wallet can be also designed individually. 

Style: The wallet Victoria has a simple design and is very practical for everyday life. Banknotes, credit cards, notes and receipts (and of course much more) can be easily stowed with the help of the wallet. The wallet Victoria has been an eye-catcher at numerous fairs - especially in combination with business cards. With the help of the eccentric function of the wallet I stayed in memory of many people and thus received significantly more callbacks from the interested. 
Universal: The Victoria wallet is very light, has a comfortable size and lies well in the hand. The wallet can be quickly hidden in a trouser pocket or a pocket of a jacket and remains not obtrusive. Even in a woman's handbag, the Victoria wallet can be found very well.


Material: After long considerations and countless tests the material for the purse has been finalized: acrylic glass. Acrylic glass is durable, light and can be multifunctionally used. Additionally acrylic has a high gloss finish and offers very good maintenance qualities.

Production: For the reason that the price of production remains adequate, the minimal produced quantity should be at least 300 wallets. It means at least 600 acrylic plates that are needed for the production. The acrylic plates are cut by a laser and brought to a right form. A pattern is engraved on one side of the plates, and then they are colored. Both acrylic plates are manually connected by an elastic rubber band. The used rubber band is very stable and extremely durable. I've been using my first prototype since 7 months – faultless and without any weaknesses. The rubber band remains in a good form even by an intensive usage of the wallet. 

Perks:










Further development: If I succeed in a start of the project – of course only with your great support - Victoria wallet has great potentials for further developments in different directions - for example in color, personalized engraving, different materials (leather, aluminum, wood, etc.). The possibilities are far from being exhausted.

Your support: At this point your support is needed to bring to life this type of a wallet. Manufacturing, packaging and logistics are funded with your support. Thanks a lot in advance for your interest in my project.

Risks: It is now almost a year passed since I've started working on the first Victoria wallet.  Many things have changed meanwhile. I have developed and optimized, and now I can proudly present you "Victoria". At this point I would like to thank you as active supporters. Still, I do not know how much interesting the wallet will be really. In case of really great interest, it can happen that the production will take more time and thus it may come to delays in deliveries. I would like to thank you in advance for your understanding.

story:
Meet the Mobrly — the shoe designed from the ground up for comfort, performance, and everyday versatility. The Mobrly is 100% waterproof, ultra-durable, and specifically engineered for comfort and ease.

With the launch of this campaign, we are proud to announce that we will also be supporting the Vancouver Aquarium and its affiliated Ocean Wise® conservation programs.

The Mobrly was made for ultimate versatility. It’s the one shoe you can take everywhere and do everything in. Work, hike, splash, chill, and commute in absolute comfort without worry.

 

 

 

 

The Vancouver Aquarium is an Ocean Wise® initiative and landmark in Vancouver, British Columbia’s world renowned Stanley Park. Home to thousands of aquatic species as well as research professionals, the Vancouver Aquarium supports research, conservation, and education to help maintain healthy oceans and marine life.

As part of our commitment to sustainability and community support, we are dedicating time to bring awareness on the environmental impacts of harmful algae blooms and will be working to do our part in helping save the Vancouver Aquarium and its mission to promote healthy oceans.

For more information, please refer to our blog. Let’s make an impact together. Do good to feel good.

Ergonomically Engineered 

Easy No-Tie Lace-Lok

Impermeable Waterproof Membrane

Spring Loaded Insoles

Bouncy High-Density Cushioning

Ultra-Soft Microfiber Collar Lining

Balanced Elasticity for Perfect Fit

Military-Grade Ballistic Weave Nylon

Secure Fit Lockdown Cage

Welded TPR Protection

Foam Rubber Midsole 

4-Way Multi-Terrain Traction 

F1 Inspired Performance Grip

Ultra Lightweight

Breathable Upper

Anti-Odor 

Temperature Regulation

 

We won’t settle until you feel and look great. That’s why all our sneakers have a 100% satisfaction guarantee. As long as your shoes have not been worn outside, still have the tags attached, and are accompanied by the original order number within 30 days of receiving the shoes, we’ll exchange them for the right size and color.

Once our shoes are available for retail, you can purchase your correct size from us at retail, and we’ll refund the difference. If there’s a manufacturing issue with your shoes, no problem, we’ve got it covered. Connect with us, and we would be happy to assist.

Note: Refunds will not be available, but we guarantee to get you in the perfect fit.

This isn’t our first crowdfunding campaign. Our last campaign, the Stnly Sneaker-Boot Hybrid, raised over $196,000 from 1,355 backers! Not only have we delivered, our backers LOVE them.

With the Mobrly, we want to bring the same comfort, durability, versatility, and performance to an everyday sneaker you can wear ANYWHERE. Grab yours now and experience freedom and comfort like never before! 

IMPORTANT: Shipping is calculated during the survey process and will be collected after the campaign. The shipping charges are based on our expected volume and could increase or decrease slightly. The shipping charges shown are the estimated TOTAL amount you will be charged. For more shipping information, visit our website.

We are SKYE Footwear. For those who value quality over quantity, combining your favorite essential pairs of shoes into one sensible, attractive pair would be a dream. We made it our goal to make that dream a reality by creating eco-friendly, exceptionally crafted, affordable shoes that guarantee comfort, longevity and versatility. 

We pour our hearts and dedication into every pair of shoes we make. We hope they bring you a lifetime of comfort, fun, and adventure wherever you go.

We’re only happy if you’re super-comfy and look great. We’ll be sure to exchange your shoes as long as they have not been worn outside, still have the tags attached, and are accompanied by the original receipt within 30 days of receiving the shoes.

Once our shoes are available for retail (a few months after backers receive the early-birds), you’ll need to purchase your correct size from us at retail, and we’ll refund the difference. If there’s a manufacturing issue with your shoes, no problem, we’ve got it covered. Connect with us and we would be happy to assist.

story:
Press about us

Expert opinion about SELFIE MIRROR


Surveilance for home

Another high-ranking feature of The SELFIE Mirror is home security. Protect yourself and people around you. The SELFIE MIRROR’s built-in camera uses two-way video surveillance with motion sensor and transmits images directly to your mobile device.

High Fidelity Sound System 

A built in Hi-Fi system plays music from any source. High quality sound system integrated right into the mirror fills your life and videos with the inspiration of the music! 

Smart Home 

SELFIE MIRROR is more than a fancy thing. It’s your SMART HOME portal. THE SELFIE MIRROR controls smart home devices like video door bells, lights, air conditioner, security surveillance and much more.

 

Technical details

 Any application from Google Play


Dashboard options let you choose a business version or a personal one 


The personal dashboard version includes fast access to the selfie app and smart home management. Stay informed with live info feed including current weather, time, date, and your social network news feeds. The business dashboard gives you and your customers a fast access to UBER, Maps, TripAdvisor and the selfie button. So your customers are entertained, impressed, and informed. The MIRROR has 2 USB ports so they can charge the phones.

The Selfie Mirror is more than just an object of beauty and entertainment. The mirror also a great instrument of security. The two­way video communication allowsyou to know what is going on at your home no matter wherever you are. 
. 


Android Application

 Thousands of apps available from Google Play, you will discover a lot of  new possibilities of the SELFIE MIRROR. 

The video bloggers version 

The VIDEO BLOGGERS version is another buzzworthy feature of the mirror. The Mirror has a built-in HD camera with autofocus, 2000 Lumen light and SD Card. From this moment you don’t need to buy a lot of the equipment to make your videos look professional. Just Selfie mirror and you all set! 

The business version

The BUSINESS version of the SELFIE MIRROR has a unique start screen giving a fast access to UBER, Maps apps, TripAdvisor, and other applications related to the business needs. Using the Selfie button your customers can take selfies and post them to social networks instantly. They will become the real and fast advertising of your business. Perfect for the retail stores, restaurants, beauty salons, photo studios. Entertain and impress your customers and they will advertise your business for free! 

THE SELFIE MIRROR is available in 3 sizes


The Selfie Mirror is available in 3 sizes:
Vanity Table Version 550 X350 mm
 Small  75 X 56,5 mm ,  Big 700 X 1200 mm.

Custom sizes for business can be made by order. Perks Selfie mirror

Timeline


Progress


Our team has worked on bringing a world first smart mirror for 2 year.We have gone through various iterations to reach a final working prototype that we have now.So now we are ready to place factory order and ship the mirror to customer.

Progress

story:
The Hoss USMC patches 

Look, Hoss is my brother,and he gets a lot done, but we all know, he was never going to get these made..  at least I was sick of waiting for him.

So together a group of us pitched in and got these made !!!


These are being made !!


You can still jump in and get one of these

 1st edition TheHossUSMC (two patches) for $10 with a sticker SHIPPED



BONUS Extra, We Hit Our Goal

We will now order patches in 2 color options

Everyone will get 2x the patches

  • If you pledged $10, you will get BOTH color patches and a sticker
  • If you pledged $25 you will get 3x of BOTH colors, (that is SIX patches) and the stickers


Thanks all, for helping to get these made.

All additional funds raised will go to Hoss in a stack of cash when he rolls through Tucson in November


  • Already ordered
  • He can pick them up on his road trip !!
  • He will have them for SHOT 2015

Everyone will get 2x the patches



If you pledged $10, you will get BOTH color patches and a sticker


If you pledged $25 you will get 3x of BOTH colors, (that is SIX patches) and the stickers




Thanks all, for helping to get these made.
All additional funds raised will go to Hoss in a stack of cash when he rolls through Tucson in November


Already ordered
He can pick them up on his road trip !!
He will have them for SHOT 2015

story:
Behind the Scenes 

The Don Ciccio Co. brand was created due to crucial pressure from our Palermo associates in 2013 founded in 2013 after good advice and inspiration from our friends in Palermo. The idea behind the brand is to show the fictitious Ciccio family history in the United States of America through the 1930's, showing the wide range of Don Ciccio's business ventures during that time.

Don Ciccio is a fictive character, any resemblance to any person living or diseased is purely unintentional and coincidental. 

What We Need & What You Get

The goal of this campaign is to gather enough funds to publicize more Don Ciccio business venture motives and introduce a variety of apparel from and including; t-shirts to hoodies, work shirts, tank tops, beanies, guns and other forms of "kindness" and more. Funds raised will be used to pay off the Palermo family and money laundering establish our international e-shop www.ciccio-clothing.com and the Don Ciccio Co. apparel brand, which will be launched after the end of this campaign. 

As one of our anonymous investors and family members, you receive life time benefits from the Don Ciccio Co. e-shop, thus preventing sudden accidents which meet all that refuse to support the Ciccio family. We will be more than happy to listen to any ideas, inspirations and constructive mementos you might have to share with us.

Quality Assured

The Don Ciccio Co. apparel is made of quality material using modern printing and sewing techniques assuring years of durability or in the event of early retirement from the Ciccio family, a going away gift for your loved ones.

Sizes, Options & Designs

 Men

  • S, M, L, XL, XXL, XXXL
  • 185g/m2
  • Front motive (Dentist Clinic, Colombian Airlines, Car Service)
  • Back motive (Don Ciccio Co., small logo)

Women

  • S, M, L, XL
  • 185g/m2
  • Front motive (Dentist Clinic, Colombian Airlines, Car Service)
  • Back motive (Don Ciccio Co., small logo)
  • Lady cut

Once the campaign ends we will send you an email asking which motive(s) and what size(s) you prefer.

Dentist Clinic

Colombian Airlines

Car Service

Back Logo (small)

Continued......

Don Ciccio thanks you for your support!

Don Ciccio FB Club

story:
The Dream

We are a startup company in the field of Information Technology and Services. We are a team of highly passionate technology professionals who contributed in the success of the largest Egyptian, Middle-Eastern, Global and Multinational companies such as ITWorx, FAWRY, Vodafone, Logica and Microsoft.

Our campaign is aimed to fund raise the seed money necessary for our first steps towards our BIG dream. Your contribution forms a big hope for us to start up our business that’s aimed to not only generate revenue for a limited number of people, but to contribute in boosting our country’s economy by creating lots of new jobs while significantly cutting cost for our customers - our business model keeps a good balance between being smart and labor-based - enabling them to create new revenue channels and typically an extraordinary profit growth.

Your contribution will help us to make significant improvement on how our customers (mainly retailers & SMEs) run their business in much smarter way (by leveraging cutting-edge technologies of mobile/tablet POS (Point of Sale) & apps, e-payment, e-commerce/m-commerce and cloud computing at these sectors) that will make the life of everyone doing shopping better (faster, more flexible, diverse, secure and cost efficient shopping will definitely mean better day and better life!).

The Start

Our planned investment for the first year is ~ USD 1.3M. Only an initial fund of USD 50K is required to make the first steps those are:

  • Market research, market survey and finalization of business plan
  • Development of product – missing – features in order to be market ready
  • Initial marketing activities
  • Pilot operations and activities
Your contribution would be helpful in all cases, if we didn’t reach the goal we will finance whatever it suffices of the above mentioned activities as they are all crucial to start the business and to seek other ways of funding if required.
 

The Shared Benefit

In the era of globalization and open skies, business – specially software-based- is not an exception of the connectivity of everything. If our business succeeded with your contribution, so seeing us expanding directly or indirectly in your country creating new jobs and business opportunities boosting your local economy shouldn’t be a surprise for you :).

Risks & Challenges

I have no fear to mention that any business (specially software-based) implies some considerable risks, further we are entering an area where good competitors
are targeting worldwide! and I would love to share what we did/do to mitigate the
implied risks:

  • Planning phase took enough time (more than 1 year now!) 
  • We have built good understanding about the differences between us and the competitors and we have many edges such as price, business model and early market presence (if we moved ASAP and that’s another reason why your contribution is important for us) at least on the local/regional level
  • The skillset and profiles of the founding members who are all coming from
    multinational companies with long experience in the field and proven track
    records
  • We have planned and designed pilot phase/activities to verify our numbers/forecast and tune/adapt accordingly before we invest more to make risk the lowest

Other Ways You Can Help

As it’s about building software, your contribution could be in other ways than money such as:

  1. Go refer it to your network (use the social networks widgets: Facebook, Twitter and e-mail you see in the 'Share This Campaign' on the site). You can see also our campaign on mygigs (you shares and retweets can help us spread it more):

    https://www.facebook.com/mygigs.co

    https://twitter.com/mygigs_co

    https://plus.google.com/+MygigsCo1/posts

  2. Thoughts/questions on our campaign and/or our idea, what did/didn't you like about it, what do you think would/wouldn't help make it happens...etc. Any contribution on this will be much helpful for us and much appreciated.
  3. If you are interested in beta testing and has background in POS/Retail systems just drop us a comment/e-mail and you can get shortlisted for our beta testing activities as we might need to conduct an open beta at certain point of time.

story:
Founded in 2011, MMT specialises in singular watches, blending quality watchmaking and poetic storytelling.

In all our products, we integrate our signature material: wood. As a lively material, all pieces of wood are unique in texture and age differently over time, making each MMT watch a one-of-a-kind piece.

We believe that honesty and simplicity in design are the keys to make beautiful and lasting products. MMT watches are the perfect match for people in search of quality timepieces, easy to wear but with a unique twist and character.

So far, MMT has already successfully released two collections of pocket watches, the 'Calendar series' and the 'T series'. These two collections have been featured on several reference blogs and sold in design stores across the globe.

We are passionate about what we do and we are very excited to introduce our new collection, the 'R series'. We have come to Indiegogo to raise funds and with your help, bring our new collection to life!


The R series is an elegant wristwatch, combining very clean lines and rich textures and quality materials.

In line with MMT’s DNA, the new 'R series' features a delicate wooden ring, making a complete revolution around a domed glass.

The secret of the 'R series' lies inside its case: it is powered by a Swiss parts movement that doesn’t require a crown to set the time, allowing the watch outline to remain perfectly circular.

Here are some key elements of the MMT 'R-series':

  • Clean and minimalist silhouette: In addition to its iconic silhouette, the 'R-series' reveals a minimalist design, perfected in details and use of quality materials.

  • No watch crown! A clean and elegant timepiece around your wrist! Easy to wear on your right or your left wrist.

  • Swiss parts movement: We sourced a very specific Swiss parts Movement from renown brand  ISAswiss.

  • Your MMT Revolution is unique: The 'R series' bezel, made of walnut wood, makes each watch a truly one-of -a-kind timepiece.

  • Engrave it! Make it even more personal by getting a message engraved at the back of the watch case. Perfect for a gift!

  • Premium stitched genuine leather strap: Comes in 2 colors: black and brown.

  • Each watch comes in a smart box: The packaging is sized to well protect your watch while using small shelving space.

Setting the time

At the back of the watch, just press on the central button with a pointy object to make the hands move forward (it works well with a pen).


  • Swiss parts movement from ISAswiss
  • All 316L Stainless Steel watch
  • Walnut wood bezel
  • Domed glass
  • Metallic or off-white embossed dial
  • Premium stitched leather strap 
  • Water resistant 3 ATM 
  • Watch diameter : 43 mm
  • Unisex, left and right handed!


The MMT R series collection includes 4 models:

Limited edition

The first 20 pieces of each model will be numbered 01/20 to 20/20. Make sure to order one before they sell out! (Numbers will be attributed chronologically)

Custom engraving

Select the engraving perk ($15) and we will engrave the message of your choice at the back of your R series. Your engraving can include up to 20 characters (including spaces).



We have managed to optimise the production lead time with our factory so that you can receive your watch as early as possible.

We plan on shipping your watch starting from mid June 2015.



Why funding us?

We are a small design brand. It allows us to focus on designing good products and to have a close relationship and follow-up with our customers. Using crowdfunding such as Indiegogo will help us keep our creative freedom.

Become a backer! This campaign is a very secure and exclusive way for you to get our products at an unbeatable price.

Where does your money go?

Our number one goal is to make good products so about 85% of the money we will collect will be used to making the watch themselves. It will cover the design, development and production cost. The remaining 15% will be used to promote our products, take part of trade shows and help pay for our online store and sales expenses.

In order to make MMT 'R series' campaign on Indiegogo successful, we need your support! 

You can help us by :

  • Buying perks on the right side of this page. This is a great opportunity to pre-order our new 'R series' collection at a special price!
  • Sharing our campaign through social medias , emails or your website and blog.

How do I buy a watch?

On the right side of our campaign page, a vertical banner shows you the different perks you can buy. Some of them will get you one or two watches in return. You can also get a special discount for our existing pocket watches on our online store.

How to specify the watch model and engraving?

At the end of the campaign, we will send you an email in order to confirm your choice of watch model (and engraving - if you chose the ''Get your MMT engraved" perk).Of course, you can already let us know your choice(s) by writing to sales@mmtstore.com, or you can think a little bit more and wait for our email!

Can I buy the watch after the campaign?

After the Indiegogo campaign, the R series will be available for sale on our website and at selected retailers. The retail price will be $399 so you save a lot by buying the watch during the crowdfunding campaign!

When will I receive my watch?

Good news ! We have worked hard on shortening the production lead-time of our collection. Therefore, we will be able to deliver the 'R series' watch to you starting mid-June 2015!

Do you ship everywhere? How much does it cost?

Another good news! YES! We bare all costs relative to shipping, wherever you are! shipping is worldwide and free.

Will there be any additional fees?

There may be additional fees specific to your countries such as VAT, import and customs fees. We do not cover these possible extras.

What is your refund policy?

Following Indiegogo terms and conditions, all contributions are definitive and we cannot refund you.

Legal disclaimer (as per Paypal policy)

“Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.“


Contact us!

Whether you have enquiries, you need help, or just want to share some comments, drop us a line by commenting this project or send us an email to info@mmtstore.com.

You can also contact us through our social medias profiles (please follow us if you are not already!)

story:
Love the Earth. Love Green. Bring Your Own Kit is your first step to save the Earth. Silicone Q-kit is perfect for use at home/office or on-the-go (with smart cover).

Q-kit is made of 100% food grade silicone which is eco-friendly material. Silicone is an odourless, colourless polymer composed mainly of silicon, which is found naturally in sand, quartz and rocks. It is flexible, resistant and withstands high temperatures. This is the ideal material for manufacturing products that will come into contact with food. It doesn’t leave residues and doesn’t alter the flavour of foods.

Q-kit is Non-Toxic, BPA-free and Phthalate-free. It is microwave, oven, freezer and dishwasher save with the temperature range from -40℃ to +220℃. With the collapsible space saving design, it is perfect for use at home/office or on-the-go.

Capacity of bowl: 150ml.   Weight of bowl + cover: 60g.

Q-kit is perfect for use at home:

Use as small capacity air-tight containers to store foods

Use as jelly cups to make jelly or fruit jelly

Use as ice-cream cups to serve family and friends

Use as egg poacher to poach or steam eggs

Use as cup lid/coaster or water drip collector

Q-kit is perfect for use in the office:

Use as snack/fruit bowl or cup lid/coaster

Q-kit is perfect for use on-the-go:

Use as snack bowl for kids

Use as baby food bowl on-the-go

Use as drink coasters in party or happy hours

Use as food container to take away leftover

Yes! Q-kit does it all! Simple, but useful!

Color: red, yellow, green & crystal green

 

Q-kit is 100% Hong Kong Design

The product and packaging design are 100% done in Hong Kong by designer Steve Au. The toolings and goods will be produced in mainland China by a ISO qualified Silicone Rubber Manufacturer.

 

Support to this project

I need your help to get this product into the global market. With your support, I'd like to gather enough pre-orders to cover the costs of production toolings, first production run and packaging materials. They require the sum of $8000. Your perks will enable me to finish this project and to continue developing new products.

Your support is greatly appreciated!

 

Our production plan

We have completed an intensive, 3 months long prototyping process with our engineering team to solve any durability problems and challenges we might face as we move into production. The next step is to place the order for production toolings and start the first production run of the Q-kit.

Production schedule (after funds cleared)

Week 1: Place order for production toolings

Week 1: Place order for materials and schedule production

Week 2: Place order for packaging materials

Week 3: Test shots for production toolings

Week 4: Start the first production run

Week 5: Check every Q-kit to make sure they are perfect

Week 5: Package Q-kits for shipment

Ship! We expect to start shipping orders in November.

 

Thank you so much in advance!

Please spread the word!

story:
Limited Run for Indiegogo Pledges: This project is to start brand awareness, website functionality and future production for fH.

Over the last few years we asked people what makes them strive to have fun in their activities. And we asked how can we help others to enjoy life in a positive note? We all hustle but why do we hustle? After listening and learning from 10 year old little league players to a 60 year old triathlete we all have that Passion in ourselves. We all like to Perform well but most importantly we all love to Play.

Be sure to look for us at Agenda - Long Beach in 2015. We will be adding a video platform, forum, and e-commerce to our website to enable the fH community to upload and share their "Passion + Performance + Play." Daily submissions of your hustle videos and pictures will be entered into a monthly contest for free gear. We are also looking for pop-up space in Seattle and or Los Angeles.

Your pledges are being used for:

  • Inventory
  • Design Team - Passion + Performance + Play Creative Dept.
  • Photography and Video for our e-commerce site 
  • Website Design and Development
  • Marketing and Branding

                                                          "Formula of Hustle” 

Passion - strong and barely controllable emotion.

 + Live in the moment.

Performance - the action or process of carrying out or accomplishing an act, move, or function.

 + Excel on land, water and air.

Play - engage in activity for enjoyment and recreation

 + Let your dreams come true.

Manufacturing Note: 2015 Winter collection will include hats, long sleeve t's, rugby collared shirts. We are also working with all facets of production and are always looking to create the best product for our fH Crew. There are new US manufacturers arising and it will be great to work with these outlets to keep all production in the USA. If you are an employee or employer of a US apparel manufacturer please contact us and we would like to discuss opportunities.

Hats - 3D embroidery fH logo. Solid color front with white mesh back. Snap on back. One size fits all.


White Long Sleeve w/green&yellow fH


White Long Sleeve w/blue&green fH

Gray Long Sleeve w/ Navy Blue fH

Gray Long Sleeve w/ Black fH


White T


Black T


2014 Futbol USA White -


2014 Futbol Brasil Green -

  USA Hoodie w/ Kangaroo pocket -

Black Hoodie w/ Kangaroo pocket

Branded "fH" collar tag with washing instructions 


 

Risks & Challenges

We are a small shop right now we will be as fast as we can regarding all customer support via email and phone. We are a lean startup but we have the hustle to listen and speak with every one of our customers to provide support and assist their needs. Our goal for delivery is 2-4 weeks after the campaign ends.
