story:
At the beginning it was just an unspoken concept, an idea based on our laptop use experiences.  An idea that felt just right, a bag that could protect things inside, look good, be unique and at the same time be convenient.

Therefore one Sunday morning our team members (Jan, Ilya, Leo) got together and we discussed the overall concept of the bag creation. We laid down the guidelines for the bag design, sample making and manufacturing.


Certainly all of us experience times when we simply don't want to sit at home or the office and would like to take our work with us to a park or a coffee shop. Going out, enjoying the scene and taking the job with us is a dream. But it could become reality. Our bag perfectly fits the bill: it is easy to pack, comfortable and before you know it you will be enjoying a nice cup of coffee or tea and having some real creative work done. 


We can’t imagine our life without a laptop or at least a tablet nowadays. But carrying those with you all the time is tiring, inconvenient and there is always a chance of damaging your equipment. You are lucky if you never had problems with your laptop screen breaking in your bag and making all your data on it temporally unavailable. The damages could be even more serious and you could loose all your precious information on the hard drive. This is where our bag really shines thanks to its protective design.


Naturally, we do realize that there are many users that don't need to carry a laptop around. Perhaps just a tablet or some documents or a book.  We let you  in on a little secret, our bag is perfectly suited for that as well.  We started the project with focus on laptops and it turned into an awesome, multipurpose bag with a totally unique look and style.








We have evaluated several options and finally decided for a hard top, soft body construction. Have you ever seen a hard shell traveling luggage? It is sturdy and light, typically made out of two hard shell closed by a zipper. This gave us an idea to combine a hard shell with a soft body for an extra laptop protection.  We also wanted the bag to be rather stylish and suitable for the office environment as well as for a walk in the countryside, so it is really tempting to use it on a daily basis. 


The initial design was done in 3D software including the soft body:


Then we made vacuum molded shell prototypes:

(lower right indentation is reserved for our all-metal logo)


And finally we took the parts to another factory to create the soft body, the belt and to do the final stitching of the bags:







-The top cover shell is made out of vacuum molded plastic and it is highly resistant against impact.


- The soft body is padded all around with foam for extra shock absorption.




- Easy to reach pocket for your smartphone



- Convenient, adjustable messenger style belt


- There is enough space in it to accommodate 13” laptops, documents and other useful stuff




As you may see we already made it to the prototype stage and got few samples from the manufacturer. What we need now is your support for launching a full-scale production and producing the first batch of bags. We have many design ideas for bags, but we decided to start with just one of them. After we make the first batch, launching new designs would be easier for us. If you do care about protection of you laptop and information on it please support us.

Our campaign is runnig already for a few days and not so good so far. But we are not going to despair. We really belive in our product. Is there any better way to carry your laptop with you? I don't think so. So if you need a nice and protective bag, our ROCKPEPPER bags is the right choice for you. Come and preorder one now!

story:
The website is now live at www.ViveNchill.com.  Website is stocked and ready and orders are being fulfilled daily.

The Vive's amazing room scale ability allows players to be physically engaged and immersed in endless alternate realities for hours at a time. However, wearing a bulky headset while being physically active is the perfect recipe for an uncomfortable and sweaty situation.  

The ViveNchill is a heat fighter! It's effective, quiet, and discrete.  It's the perfect companion for your headset, keeping you cooler and more comfortable with the press of a button. 


 

See what people are saying about ViveNchill!
 

We iterated over many design choices when creating the ViveNchill.  Our initial prototypes focused on piping air into the headset.  Users complained about dry eyes, high noise levels, vibration, interference with the built in mic, and low cooling effect.  So we took things outside and directed airflow at the forehead and contact area with the facial foam.  We found a drastic improvement in its ability to cool you off with no negative side effects.  As an added benefit, reducing heat and moisture also reduced fogging and nausea.  

The science behind the madness

According to research at Veostrip:

"The forehead produced the largest absolute volume of sweat per unit of surface"

"The forehead is the best heat dissipating skin on the body"

“The forehead is particularly important to cooling and can dissipate heat at 4x the rate of the torso”

“Bloodflow to the forehead increases by 12x during exercise, specifically to aid cooling”

A similar study from Frontiers in Neuroscience states that “Conversely, although the head and neck represent only 7–9% of the total body surface area, even a small increase in heat loss from surface cooling of this region causes a relatively larger cooling of the body core (Pretorius et al., 2006)." 

By directing air at and over this crucial part of the body, the ViveNchill helps reduce your overall temperature effectively in a compact package. 

Reference 1: Veostrip. “Science behind Veo.”, 2017, www.veostrip.com/science-behind-veo

Reference 2: Frontiers in Neuroscience. “Thermal Regulation of the Brain”, Jan. 2016, www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4720747/#s7title


Switch development


Various prototype parts

Injection mold machine with 3 plate double cavity ViveNchill mold setup for run.

Core of the ViveNchill mold with slider components made from high quality NAK80 Steel

2+2 Cavity side mold with edge / pin gates made from high quality NAK80 Steel

The ViveNchill packs a 1-2-3 punch. A clean and discrete form factor is paired with effective cooling and an easily accessible on/off switch.  This allows you to regulate your temperature instantly based on the intensity of the game play.   


 


 


 


 


 


 

Actual production injection molded components and custom cable harness with overmolded switch shown below. 






 

 
 
 
The ViveNchill uses high quality CE, CUR, TUV, and UL approved fans and draws under 200mAh from the accessory USB port.  The fans feature auto-stop and restart feature, and won't snag on hair, skin, clothing, or whatever else you feel like sticking in there.
 
 


The ViveNchill has a runtime of 70,000 hours.  It should last as long if not longer than your Vive.  Premium MagLev vapo bearings ensure vibration free operation throughout it's lifespan.  To stay ahead of the curve, the ViveNchill is compatible with the HTC deluxe audio strap, TPCast wireless module, and current prototype DisplayLink XR. The ViveNchill is a perfect partner in crime for these upgrades since it allows for greater mobility and a bigger chance of being a sweat mongrel.
 
 
 
 

 

RedRotor VR is a team of 2 engineers with a knack for solving problems. In the past, we have successfully launched several drone related products under our RedRotor RC label. We both share a passion for creating beautiful, functional and reliable products.

We're currently on track in our development cycle and have our final injection mold samples and cabling completed. The next step in line for us is to begin the assembly run and go to production. This is where we need your support to keep the price as affordable as possible!

Being at a late stage in the product cycle allows us an excellent chance of success to meet our delivery window. Not having to fuss with prototypes and having a finished production ready product means we're focusing all our effort on mass scale production now.

We've gone through many iterations of prototypes and after multiple rounds of refining tooling, we're very happy with the end product. Nailing down the tooling was a big milestone for us because it is the key process in successfully moving past the prototyping phase to a production worthy item.

Through countless test sessions we've garnered extensive feedback and are quite pleased with the response from players. Hearing a big sigh of relief each time as we turn on the ViveNchill for players during an intensive gaming session gives us confidence we're delivering an effective product.

While the inherent risks associated with mass production are still there, we are confident that our years of experience in designing and manufacturing drone products will ensure a smooth process. This is why we're happy to offer 2 years warranty for parts.

story:
Shirts! <3

  • If you didn't get one of these awesome shirts last year, now is your chance
  • I'm pretty sure they are the only UChicago slogan shirts printed on American Apparel shirts so if you want a high-quality slogan shirt now is your chance.
  • Alternatively, you can buy one printed on a Gildan shirt. If you have ever gotten a T-Shirt from a house/fundraiser/event etc. it was probably printed on a very similar shirt

Delivery to dorms only. NO PICKUP

Please only order a shirt if you are going to put in a delivery address at one of the undergraduate dorms. If you do not live in a dorm, ask one of your friends if you can have your shirt delivered to them. If you are a graduate student or something maybe I'll be nice and make special arrangements but please contact me BEFORE you order because Indiegogo is not designed for refunds.

I'm sorry if this inconveniences you but having people pick up shirts turned out to be a huge pain.

story:
We designed Pix to be your best buddy in any life situation.

Use widgets to make Pix your everyday assistant. Display the time, weather, your mobile notifications and much more through PIX’s widgets.

Display things you’re passionate about on your backpack: favorite characters, sport team logos, music bands or just have fun displaying funny pictures or eye-catchy pixel art. 

You can also play ‘old school’ 8-bit games and much more right on your Pix backpack!  

Use your Pix Backpack as a bright and eye-catchy indicator in the darkness or where additional attention is needed.

Didn't find your favorite art in our app library? Create your own images and animations right in the free companion app and upload them to your Pix backpack.

Control your PIX backpack’s appearance with the touch of your fingertips using the PIX app on your mobile device.  

Open API will allow users to create and upload their own designs/widgets/games.

The Pix Cycling Remote is an additional device we developed which is connected with Pix Backpack via Bluetooth. Working in tandem with the Pix Cycling Remote, the backpack can be used to indicate left and right ahead of making turns while cycling. The stop signal will automatically show up if you're slowing down. Choose “cycling widget” in the app and pair remote with your PIX. 

 

Simply add a Power Bank to your pledge and we'll deliver it to you with PIX backpack.

We wanted to make something that helped people stand out from the crowd, be noticeable and visible, so we set out to make the reddest backpack out there.

We developed PIX as a way to help people develop their creativity and share their unique vision with the world. 

We also loved the added fun factor that PIX brought to people’s everyday lives. PIX can be used as a customizable personal display to help in many different situations: meeting a person at the airport, indicating turns and stops for cyclists, playing old-school video games and so much more! 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make PIX a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a PIX backpack, if you’re a supporter of PIX, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
SUMMARY

The silent, soulful recognition in the eyes of the Oneida artisans as they watched a video of traditional Maasai song performed by OMWA:  Olorgesailie Maasai Women Artisans of Kenya, stirred my soul, I cried.  Something I often do as this process evolves.  Neither the Maasai or Oneida have time for tears so I have learned to hide my emotional outbursts. But it was so beautiful, I don’t have the words to express it properly. 

At that moment sitting in the Oneida Nation of New York over 7,000 miles away from the small Maasai village in the South Rift Valley. I realized that a new creative community was born.  Back in March,  when I was in Olorgesailie with OMWA, I showed the Maasai women the amazing work of the Oneida artisans: the wampum Haudenosaunee bracelets, the bone and turquoise necklaces, the elaborate beading depicting flora and fauna.  The women excitedly placed the jewelry on their arms and necks, smiling, nodding, “Sidai! Sidai oleng,"  they exclaimed.  "Beautiful, very beautiful!"  Mpuyuk, a Maasai elder woman said, "Together we can take over the world."    

My name is Tereneh Mosley of Idia'Dega, along with my creative partners OMWA and the Oneida Beading Wolves artisans we have co-designed, a first of its kind, global Indigenous eco-design collection.  A collaboration with Indigenous artisans working together across the globe.  We need you to help bring it to life. 



What we're doing and why we need you

To begin this global take over powered by passion, fabric and beads -  we have co-designed a collection based on the June flowering fruits that blossom in Olorgesailie and Oneida.  In Kenya, it’s the plum and in Oneida the strawberry. In fact, the Haudenosaunee people (the Oneida is one of the Six Nations) call June, Strawberry Moon.  Combining the environmental and cultural connections of these communities we created a collection that builds on these and other shared cultural, creative and environmental themes. 

We need your support to buy the sustainable fabrics and materials, beads (both artisans groups use the same Czech glass beads, size 11!) and to fund the artisans work.  

Another exciting thing is that we know our work will be presented this fall during New York Fashion Week in September, continuing our amazing collaboration with a gallery in Brooklyn.  So time is of the essence.  We have already designed the collection, now we need to bring it to life, with your help and only with your help, we can do it!  


PERKS 

While we value any and all contributions at any level, we hope that these Perks will encourage your support for our collaboration:  

• $10 - Ashe Oleng/Thank You/Yawa - Personalized note on our website 

• $25 - A hand-written thank you note 

• $50 - Maasai/Oneida inspired handmade friendship bracelet. 

• $75 – OMWA + Idia’Dega Eni Spring Ongun 4-tier ring 

• $150 - Haudenousaunee wampum bracelet/armband 

• $250 - Maasai 2-tier ‘bridal’ necklace 

• $500 – Olorgesailie photograph by Tereneh Mosley (select 1 of 3)

• $1000 – Maasai-Oneida The Original Clan Family jacket from Spring'17 

                                Perks delivered in September 2017.  


The Impact
This is proof of theory, proof of dreams to reality,  proof that Indigenous innovation is sustainable and must contribute to the 21st century global economy. Our goal is to develop a Indigenous global creative community bound by creative, cultural, environmental and economic connections this is "Globalization for Good:  engage and benefit the entire world.” 
Not only will your support help bring this collection to life and help in the creative process.  Your support will give the Olorgesailie women, a community of 500 people, the power to decide for themselves and their families.  OMWA’s goals are to use their talents to build their community – not handouts, not charity.  Connecting Indigenous communities and artisans like the Oneida and Maasai, is a South-South” collaboration seen by organizations such as the United Nations is a key to achieving sustainability goals for this century.     


Risks & Challenges

From living/working in a hut in the rural Rift Valley waiting for the OMWA women to agree to become our creative partners, to showing our first collection in Paris - to approaching our now, design partners Oneida Beading Wolves at a Pow-Wow last year in New York.  Every step of this process is a challenge, a beautiful challenge.  So far we meet each one and succeed.  

Please help us continue to achieve our goals.  


Other Ways You Can Help

• Please contribute to this campaign, even $1 makes a huge difference.

• Spread the word:  Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Snapchat, email, in any and every way you can.

• Host or co-host an event or trunk show to support the campaign.

• Share this campaign with local, national or international media. 

• Visit www.idiadega.com and buy looks from our previous eco-design collaboration with OMWA.

Thank you.
story_txt:
SUMMARY
The silent, soulful recognition in the eyes of the Oneida artisans as they watched a video of traditional Maasai song performed by OMWA:  Olorgesailie Maasai Women Artisans of Kenya, stirred my soul, I cried.  Something I often do as this process evolves.  Neither the Maasai or Oneida have time for tears so I have learned to hide my emotional outbursts. But it was so beautiful, I don’t have the words to express it properly. 
At that moment sitting in the Oneida Nation of New York over 7,000 miles away from the small Maasai village in the South Rift Valley. I realized that a new creative community was born.  Back in March,  when I was in Olorgesailie with OMWA, I showed the Maasai women the amazing work of the Oneida artisans: the wampum Haudenosaunee bracelets, the bone and turquoise necklaces, the elaborate beading depicting flora and fauna.  The women excitedly placed the jewelry on their arms and necks, smiling, nodding, “Sidai! Sidai oleng,"  they exclaimed.  "Beautiful, very beautiful!"  Mpuyuk, a Maasai elder woman said, "Together we can take over the world."    
My name is Tereneh Mosley of Idia'Dega, along with my creative partners OMWA and the Oneida Beading Wolves artisans we have co-designed, a first of its kind, global Indigenous eco-design collection.  A collaboration with Indigenous artisans working together across the globe.  We need you to help bring it to life. 
   

What we're doing and why we need youTo begin this global take over powered by passion, fabric and beads -  we have co-designed a collection based on the June flowering fruits that blossom in Olorgesailie and Oneida.  In Kenya, it’s the plum and in Oneida the strawberry. In fact, the Haudenosaunee people (the Oneida is one of the Six Nations) call June, Strawberry Moon.  Combining the environmental and cultural connections of these communities we created a collection that builds on these and other shared cultural, creative and environmental themes. 
We need your support to buy the sustainable fabrics and materials, beads (both artisans groups use the same Czech glass beads, size 11!) and to fund the artisans work.  
Another exciting thing is that we know our work will be presented this fall during New York Fashion Week in September, continuing our amazing collaboration with a gallery in Brooklyn.  So time is of the essence.  We have already designed the collection, now we need to bring it to life, with your help and only with your help, we can do it!  



PERKS 
While we value any and all contributions at any level, we hope that these Perks will encourage your support for our collaboration:  
• $10 - Ashe Oleng/Thank You/Yawa - Personalized note on our website 
• $25 - A hand-written thank you note 
• $50 - Maasai/Oneida inspired handmade friendship bracelet. 
• $75 – OMWA + Idia’Dega Eni Spring Ongun 4-tier ring 
• $150 - Haudenousaunee wampum bracelet/armband 
• $250 - Maasai 2-tier ‘bridal’ necklace 
• $500 – Olorgesailie photograph by Tereneh Mosley (select 1 of 3)
• $1000 – Maasai-Oneida The Original Clan Family jacket from Spring'17 
                                Perks delivered in September 2017.  


The Impact



This is proof of theory, proof of dreams to reality,  proof that Indigenous innovation is sustainable and must contribute to the 21st century global economy. Our goal is to develop a Indigenous global creative community bound by creative, cultural, environmental and economic connections this is "Globalization for Good:  engage and benefit the entire world.” 
Not only will your support help bring this collection to life and help in the creative process.  Your support will give the Olorgesailie women, a community of 500 people, the power to decide for themselves and their families.  OMWA’s goals are to use their talents to build their community – not handouts, not charity.  Connecting Indigenous communities and artisans like the Oneida and Maasai, is a South-South” collaboration seen by organizations such as the United Nations is a key to achieving sustainability goals for this century.     




Risks & Challenges

 From living/working in a hut in the rural Rift Valley waiting for the OMWA women to agree to become our creative partners, to showing our first collection in Paris - to approaching our now, design partners Oneida Beading Wolves at a Pow-Wow last year in New York.  Every step of this process is a challenge, a beautiful challenge.  So far we meet each one and succeed.  
Please help us continue to achieve our goals.  


Other Ways You Can Help
• Please contribute to this campaign, even $1 makes a huge difference.
• Spread the word:  Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Snapchat, email, in any and every way you can.
• Host or co-host an event or trunk show to support the campaign.
• Share this campaign with local, national or international media. 
• Visit www.idiadega.com and buy looks from our previous eco-design collaboration with OMWA.
Thank you.

story:
Nalla is a brand new and revolutionary type of swimwear that allows a single cut of stitchless Lycra to be used for multiple purposes. With a simple twist, knot or accessory, this patent pending design allows you to create unlimited styles and looks without compromising functionality or comfort. Now, you can transition from one look at the beach, to a different look at the party, and everything in between without going somewhere to change outfits. Our goal is to empower women by giving them a garment that suits various body types and can be used for many different applications. Our premium fabrics and color options will ensure there is a Nalla here for you!

Nallas can be used in an unlimited number of ways! You can use the same Nalla either as a top or a bottom. You can apply a twist, a knot, or use any of our accessories which automatically and instantaneously change the way they fit and look. You can also make it bigger or smaller, tighter or looser, depending on your body type or style preference. It's up to you!

.

  

Nallas can also be combined together. They work perfectly when used one on top of the other creating multiple layers of colors that can highlight different designs or styles. Take a look at our combinations where you can see that Nallas provide endless options.

 

Nallas are available in a wide range of colors. Our first collection includes 22 colors with different finishes. 

 


Nallas were made for all body types. Our fabrics have 4 way stretch with no stitching, so they can mold to your body, allowing users with different body types to use the same Nalla. Don't be afraid to try them out!


What makes Nallas so special?

Our Mission

Our mission is to create a new style of swimwear that encourages women to feel confident, comfortable and happy with themselves. We are passionate about creating garments that allow our customers to feel sexy and free.  We want you to be able to express your own personal style through Nalla, and, most importantly, feel great about who you are and how you look.

Our Story


Nalla is a brand that focuses on positivity. We seek to cater to women equally and inspire confidence in how they look and who they are. Our products are a reflection of these messages. Nallas adapt to your body, allowing you to modify your look depending on how you feel, and ultimately project that feeling to the world. Nallas are seamless; there is no stitching or structured fit that may prevent you from getting the look you want. Like we always say, "it's up to you!" 

 We invite you to try our products, discover new ways to use them, and create new styles with them. With Nallas, your options are endless. Don't be afraid to explore your creativity; mix them up, add our accessories, and find something that really shows who you are!  

Every day is a new opportunity to feel something different. "Let's Feel!" 


 

 

 

 

 

Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!


Our first campaign, "Let's Feel!", invites women to feel not only our garments, but, most Importantly, themselves. Through Nalla, you will be able to feel exactly as you wish. There is no longer a need to plan outfits for  where you are, or where you are going, as with a simple change, you can customize your Nalla to work perfectly in any venue, event or activity! So let’s feel strong, amazing, free, confident, and, most importantly, let’s feel proud to be ourselves!


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 



Why Crowd Funding?


Creating Nalla has been a long, loving, and arduous process. We have spent many months creating and improving our molds, testing new fabrics, and developing a line that provides the best possible quality for our customers. Now, after continuous testing and development, we are ready to introduce our product. That's where you come in! We need your help to fulfill the substantial order minimums and raise the much-needed capital to fund our first production run. So please help us reach our goal and bring this product to the world!

story:
– You'll find the english text at the end of each paragraph. If you´d like to watch the top video, remember to turn on the english captions on the bottom right of the YouTube player.

 

La espera por envíos internacionales terminó

- The wait for worldwide shipping is over -

 

¿Qué productos puedo adquirir? / What products can I purchase?

Tenemos 7 diseños de pines esmaltados de 4 cm hechos en aleación de zinc y 4 diseños de stickers en vinilo con una medida aproximada de 4.5  cm.

                                                            _____________________

We have 7 different enamel pin options (size 40 mm) and the material is zinc alloy. We also have 4 vinyl different stickers (size 45 mm).

Pines esmaltados / Enamel pins:

Estas son las opciones que podrás elegir después de hacer la compra. 

                                                            _____________________

These are the options you´ll be able to choose after purchasing.

1. El Grootfesional / The Grootfessional

2. Paltuga ninja / Kowacado

 

3. Deadpin

 

4. Madre de dragones / Mother of dragons

5. Hora de leer / Time to read

6. Buhoenos días / Good morning

7. Descanso de la realidad / A break from reality

 

Calcomanías / Stickers:

1. El príncipe ha llegao' / The new prince is here

 

2. Ser realista apesta

3. Sé feliz / Be happy

4. Guitar hero

 

¿Qué son PERKS? / What are perks?

Un perk es un paquete que podrás elegir, cada uno con una combinación diferente de productos. Al elegir una opción, podrás ver la descripción y el contenido de este perk. 

                                                         _____________________

A perk is a package you can choose, each one with a different combination of products. Once you select one, you´ll be able to see the description and contents of that specific perk.

 

¿Cómo elijo los diseños de pines y stickers que quiero? /

How do I select exactly the pins and stickers I want?

Simplemente adquieres uno de los perks que aparecen en esta página. Una vez hagas la compra, te llegara un email en menos de 12 horas donde te pediremos que nos digas cuáles son los diseños que te gustaría recibir, dependiendo del paquete que compraste. Recuerda revisar la carpeta de correo no deseado en caso de no recibirlo, el email de donde te vamos a contactar es andres@wawawiwadesign.com.

                                                           _____________________

All you need to do is purchase a perk from this campaign. Once you do so, you´ll receive an email from us in less than 12 hours. In this email, you need to specify exactly the designs you want us to send you. Remember to check your spam folder in case you don´t get our email, look for andres@wawawiwadesign.com.

 

¿Cuándo llegaría mi compra? / When will I receive my items?

Los retratos individuales personalizados los recibes directamente en tu email en 5 días hábiles, después de haber hecho tu compra. Todos los demás productos serán enviados al finalizar la campaña de Indiegogo el 08 de septiembre del 2018, el tiempo de entrega es de alrededor de 20 días hábiles.

                                                              _____________________

Personal portraits will be delivered in a week from the moment you make your purchase. All other products will be sent by the end of our Indiegogo campaign, around september 8 of 2018, you´ll be receiving your items in less than a month.

 

Cargos de aduana y envíos internacionales / Customs & extra charges

Los cargos de aduana pueden variar para cada país, esto puede causar retrasos, y en algunos casos, cargos extras al momento de recibir el paquete. Wawawiwa design no se hace responsable por cargos adicionales de aduana, o si algún producto específico es retenido o confiscado debido a determinadas leyes en tu país.  Te recomendamos averiguar estos detalles con la aduana en tu país si nunca has recibido un envío internacional.

                                                        _____________________

Customs rules in various countries can frequently change, causing delays and at times, additional charges imposed by the receiving country. While we take all reasonable steps to comply with general world shipping standards, Wawawiwa may not know the details of additional customs taxes or duties, or if any specific item is prohibited or can be confiscated by the receiving country. We recommend doing some research before buying.

 

¿Por qué estamos haciendo esta campaña? / Why did we start this campaign?

Wawawiwa es una empresa familiar, integrada por Andrés J. Colmenares y Viviana Navas, que cada día se esfuerzan más para mejorar la calidad de sus productos y llegar a más lugares. Lamentablemente nuestra herramienta principal de trabajo sufrió un daño irreparable, y la tableta de dibujo Wacom que solíamos usar, también dejó de funcionar unos meses atrás. Situación que nos obliga a ausentarnos por un tiempo hasta conseguir una solución a este problema.

Uno de nuestros planes ha sido incluir envíos internacionales en nuestro sitio web para todos los seguidores que han estado pidiéndolo. ¡Creemos que esta es la oportunidad perfecta para hacerlo por un tiempo limitado! Durante 30 días (hasta el 08 de septiembre) podrás adquirir pines, stickers y retratos individuales personalizados al estilo Wawawiwa.

                                                          _____________________

Wawawiwa is a small family business owned by Andres J. Colmenares and Viviana Navas, each day we work harder to improve our products quality and presentation. Sadly, our main laptop and Wacom tablet stopped working, which is practically our office.

We´ve been planning to activate the worlwide shipping option in our website for all wawawiwa fans outside Colombia. We believe this is the perfect oportunity to do it for a limited time and see the response. For 30 days, you´ll be able to purchase pins, stickers and personal portrait illustrations, wawawiwa style!

 

 

¿En qué será utilizado el dinero reunido?

Los fondos serán utilizados para fabricar los productos y empaques, pagar comisiones a Indiegogo, costear los envíos internacionales. Pero principalmente queremos volver a comprar los equipos que nos permitan continuar e incluso mejorar nuestro trabajo en Wawawiwa. Y si sobrepasamos la meta, nos gustaría poder establecer nuestra primera oficina formal.

story:
Handcrafted In America to Wear in, Not out.

Each Apple Watch band is handcrafted in our Laramie, Wyoming workshop where our goal is to create products that wear in, not out.  We love the timelessness of leather and aim to highlight that in all of our designs.

 

LEATHER COLORS

For this project we have specifically chosen Horween's Dublin tannage because it is ideal for an everyday watch band.  While the leather has many rustic qualities, it maintains a classic look and feel.  Horween Dublin specifically has what we call "pull-up" in the leather industry.  Pull up is the displacement of oils when the leather is stretched or stressed which causes a sunburst effect - giving the leather that rustic, aged look.  Over time these oils will settle down, returning to a solid color, all while creating an amazing patina.  So don't be worried when your band lightens when you first put it on, it just means you're wearing high quality leather.

We are offering three leather colors - Black, Nut Brown, and Natural.  ​

 

 ADAPTER COLORS

We have sourced the highest quality Apple Watch adapters for this project that slide in and out with ease.  We are offering three different colors - Black, Silver, & Rose Gold.  

 

HARDWARE COLOR 

We are providing two options for hardware color - Matte Black and Matte Silver.  Unfortunately, there is no rose gold hardware option to match the rose gold Apple Watch adapter at this point.

 

SIZING

With each band that you order, you will receive a three piece set- one buckle and two tail pieces (see photo below).  

Case Size 38 mm (Strap includes both S/M and M/L tail pieces)

  • 38 mm Apple Watch face = 22 mm band width
  • Small/Medium fits wrist circumferences approx. 5.1 - 7.1 inches (130 - 180 mm)
  • Medium/Large fits wrist circumferences approx. 5.9-7.9 inches (150-210 mm)

Case Size 42 mm (Strap includes both S/M and M/L tail pieces)

  • 42 mm Apple Watch face = 24 mm band width
  • Small/Medium fits wrist circumferences approx. 5.5 - 7.3 inches (140 - 185 mm)
  • Medium/Large fits wrist circumference approx. 6.3 - 8.3 inches (160 - 210 mm)

38 & 42 mm Apple Watch  (Fits Series 1, Series 2, and Series 3)


*Each Range Leather Band comes with 2 tail pieces and 1 buckle piece.

 

FINISHED FLESH SIDE

One of the unique characteristics of our band is the finished flesh side.  This extra step in the tanning process creates a smooth underside of the leather, leaving an almost polished finish. This allows us to use a thick piece of full grain leather and still achieve a smooth finish on both sides of the band.  

 

 

PROTOTYPE & DESIGN PROCESS

We love to take unique and creative approaches to designing everyday items.  When we thought about creating a better Apple Watch band at a better price, we knew that we wanted to ditch the stitching and let the leather stand by itself.  We assemble our bands with small, hand pounded rivets, which gives our bands an industrial look that compliments the modern technology on your wrist.

 

RANGE TRAVEL ROLL

In addition to our Apple Watch Band we'd like to introduce you to the Range Travel Roll.  We love adventure at Range, but we noticed a need to organize our technology and smaller accessories while traveling.  This roll provides you three versatile slots along with a buttoned pocket.  You can easily store the following in your roll while you travel:

  • 2+ Apple Watch Bands
  • Apple Watch Charger
  • Iphone Charger
  • Airpods
  • Wall Connector
  • Additional Cords

 

PERKS

 

TIMELINE

 

RANGE LEATHER TEAM

Other Crafters
Colin Rucinski
JT Taylor

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How do I select my size?
A: For your convenience, each band comes with two tail pieces (a short and a long).  This allows our bands to fit almost every wrist circumference.  To double check lengths, visit the SIZING portion of the campaign.  

Q: Will the adapters colors match my watch exactly?
A: The three adapter colors (Black, Silver and Rose Gold) will not match the watch face exactly but we have chosen adapter colors that compliment the color schemes of each watch face.

Q: I have a specialty color apple watch not shown in the photos, what adapter colors should I choose?
A: Choose whatever adapter color you believe will compliment your watch the best.   Very little of the adapter is actually seen.  If you want to be safe, go with the BLACK adapter because it matches the screen of the Apple Watch.

Q: I'm getting the perk that includes 2 or 3 bands, do I have to get all the same bands/colors or can I mix and match?
A: Of course you can mix and match.  You will select leather color, adapter color, hardware color and watch face size for each band.  

Q: When will I receive my perks?
A: As of now there are two estimated delivery dates June and July.  Make sure you look at which reward you are selecting and the reward will have an estimated delivery date.  Please note that estimated delivery dates are for the United States.  Please allow additional shipping times for international locations.
story_txt:
Handcrafted In America to Wear in, Not out.Each Apple Watch band is handcrafted in our Laramie, Wyoming workshop where our goal is to create products that wear in, not out.  We love the timelessness of leather and aim to highlight that in all of our designs. LEATHER COLORSFor this project we have specifically chosen Horween's Dublin tannage because it is ideal for an everyday watch band.  While the leather has many rustic qualities, it maintains a classic look and feel.  Horween Dublin specifically has what we call "pull-up" in the leather industry.  Pull up is the displacement of oils when the leather is stretched or stressed which causes a sunburst effect - giving the leather that rustic, aged look.  Over time these oils will settle down, returning to a solid color, all while creating an amazing patina.  So don't be worried when your band lightens when you first put it on, it just means you're wearing high quality leather.We are offering three leather colors - Black, Nut Brown, and Natural.  ​  ADAPTER COLORSWe have sourced the highest quality Apple Watch adapters for this project that slide in and out with ease.  We are offering three different colors - Black, Silver, & Rose Gold.   HARDWARE COLOR We are providing two options for hardware color - Matte Black and Matte Silver.  Unfortunately, there is no rose gold hardware option to match the rose gold Apple Watch adapter at this point. SIZINGWith each band that you order, you will receive a three piece set- one buckle and two tail pieces (see photo below).  Case Size 38 mm (Strap includes both S/M and M/L tail pieces)
38 mm Apple Watch face = 22 mm band width
Small/Medium fits wrist circumferences approx. 5.1 - 7.1 inches (130 - 180 mm)
Medium/Large fits wrist circumferences approx. 5.9-7.9 inches (150-210 mm)
Case Size 42 mm (Strap includes both S/M and M/L tail pieces)
42 mm Apple Watch face = 24 mm band width
Small/Medium fits wrist circumferences approx. 5.5 - 7.3 inches (140 - 185 mm)
Medium/Large fits wrist circumference approx. 6.3 - 8.3 inches (160 - 210 mm)
38 & 42 mm Apple Watch  (Fits Series 1, Series 2, and Series 3)*Each Range Leather Band comes with 2 tail pieces and 1 buckle piece. FINISHED FLESH SIDEOne of the unique characteristics of our band is the finished flesh side.  This extra step in the tanning process creates a smooth underside of the leather, leaving an almost polished finish. This allows us to use a thick piece of full grain leather and still achieve a smooth finish on both sides of the band.    PROTOTYPE & DESIGN PROCESSWe love to take unique and creative approaches to designing everyday items.  When we thought about creating a better Apple Watch band at a better price, we knew that we wanted to ditch the stitching and let the leather stand by itself.  We assemble our bands with small, hand pounded rivets, which gives our bands an industrial look that compliments the modern technology on your wrist. RANGE TRAVEL ROLLIn addition to our Apple Watch Band we'd like to introduce you to the Range Travel Roll.  We love adventure at Range, but we noticed a need to organize our technology and smaller accessories while traveling.  This roll provides you three versatile slots along with a buttoned pocket.  You can easily store the following in your roll while you travel:
2+ Apple Watch Bands
Apple Watch Charger
Iphone Charger
Airpods
Wall Connector
Additional Cords

story:
SANTA MONICA, CA:  Media Technology - Wireless Impulse Signals from new conductor chip in Headphone deliver Blockbuster Special Effect for Peak Entertainment Experiences. (PR Wire)

 

                        NULYX: World's Most Natural High.

 

                      SPECIAL PREVIEW: World debut of New Technology in headset plus, a brand new entertainment medium for Developers.  Available for first time to gain worldwide market feedback through ---                            

 

                                               

 

                      The NULYX Headphone - fully loaded:        

 NULYX  is -

                              MORE THAN A HEADPHONE:  an extraordinary advance in headphone design built around Bluetooth  -  with brand new "smart" features and breakthrough special effects from Neuroscience  -  all-in-one device,                                   

                                     We Reinvented the Headphone

                               A PROGRAMMABLE - BRAND NEW MEDIUM:  a magic Special Effect Technology - based on a fundamental discovery in Science - widely supported academically and - by  a major university affiliate. ( See Link Here )

                              It's like being at the "beginning" of Stereo, or Wide Screen, or 3-D, or even when movies " learned to talk," 

                                --- A Revolution of the First Order.

 

 

                           

                     How the NULYX Special Effect Works:

     "...a new technology based on magnetic waves for enhancing the perception of sight and sound."         ---   UCLA Engineering

 

                          NULYX USES A SPECIAL LABYRINTH CHIP - as a conductor generating a natural and low frequency pulsed magnetic wave in a headphone - to get you : psyched to feel the story or song ... more intensely.

  

 

                                     How NULYX Feels:

                    an UP, without a Down and YOU CONTROL It.

 

                             MORE... charged; elated; fired-up; amped; even, exhilarated and with feelings  euphoric and  in high-fidelity --- all this describes the rush without a letdown of the immersive NULYX experience --- made possible by BLUETOOTH.

 

 A dramatic and engaging effect described in Neuroscience, as: 

".... richer, more emotional, personally meaningful and real" and that, "subjects with experience of using mind altering (substances) ,  stated the experience was similar to those states." 

 And even, as  " a natural experience, .... associated with creativity and inspirational states for centuries," 

                               as published in a summary of 19 major studies,

                                       ---  International Journal of Neuroscience.

 

Read all about the exciting research  in actual published studies and more in "For Developers" and "Our Science" within Parts 2 and 3 below:

                                              

 

                           

                      BLUETOOTH NEWS -  For Contributors:  NULYX  BLUETOOTH APPROVAL,  NULYX has been Approved and Licensed to Build Products Using Latest Bluetooth Technologies. Includes, new 3D and Dual View Interactive Gaming and - Specific Approval to use the famous Bluetooth Trademark and Logo worldwide.

                      BLUETOOTH NEWS -  For Developers: Stereo headphones with  NULYX combined with new 3D Bluetooth Glasses, and panoramic 3D display using Bluetooth Synchronization Protocol offers a superior and more economic solution to total immersion than Virtual Reality systems today - a gold mine for the earliest adopters in the development community.

 

            NULYX is a Big Idea and Comes in Three Parts:

                                          PREVIEW

                    Part 1 - for Contributors, it's all Here.

                              More Than a Headphone: A New Way to Listen. Here, you can experience the NULYX special effect in an advanced headphone: a perk for our Contributors.  The goal of the NULYX project on Indiegogo is to raise awareness for a new fundamental discovery in Science and to build a commercial product from this finding from our working models and fund our production run.  By supporting our debut and manufacturing roll-out  -  you'll be first to get your hands on an amazing instrument. 

                                                    

                   Part 2 - for Developers, a New Gold Rush 

                             Our First Audience is Developers of Content.  Here and in Part 1 - "Inside NULYX," we carefully reason our proposition that a new discovery in Neuroscience will give an edge to the earliest adopters in the development community. We seek the brightest developers and content producers - those who strive for new features to give them a deciding edge.  And, those  who will read and grasp the fundamental discoveries that open a new market opportunity - Gold Mine for development.

                              Now for just this time on Indiegogo, a few early adopter Developers can use our headphone and SDK as a test module and easily experiment and build gaming and mobile apps with a powerful new medium for programing neuromodulaton: producing peak experiences  and new highs for consummers of all media content - movies, TV, games and handheld devices. We anxiously wonder: What "Dark Arts" will the programming Wizards conjure up next ? 

                       "This is NULYX"  Part 2 - Video:  for Developers:

                      

                       Part 3 - Our Science: The Evidence.

                             Programmable Neuromodulation: Big Opportunities for Content Development to Distinguish Offerings. We believe if we can make all content more intense, vivid and real and that this will be a gold mine for content creators, developers and hackers. It can give them the deciding edge with gamers, music lovers and all those who crave peak highs and new thrills. In both Part 2 and Part 3, we show developers recent research highlights published in the field of Neuroscience from nearly a dozen universities that support NULYX'S proposition, that: neuromodulation offers an opportunity to become the most powerful new special effect on the entertainment horizon today.

                      " This is NULYX" Video on:  How NULYX Feels.

                              NULYX -  A NEW WAY OF LISTENING  with your Smartphone.  NULYX TURNED ON: remember how you felt in the middle of a great dream?  NULYX TURNED OFF: suddenly ... you wake up? You want to go back: with NULYX, you notice the difference in seconds ... now, for the first time, you are able try it.

 

                                       ,
              The NULYX Headphone - Limited Offerings 

 
                             PART 1:  For Contributors

                             A Technical Tour de Force: The NULYX Headphone delivers a range of engineered experiences. Your support is helping us build a daring  brand -- driven by excellence, rarity and exclusivity. In order to build a NULYX  community and to incentivize rapid development our Elite model will be restricted to this Indiegogo offering only, as follows:

  • Limited Headphone Availability:  Just For Contributors. One time only, to start the buzz and carry the word. The Elite model will be available in this time window only through Indiegogo - Exclusively.
  • Limited Technology Availability:  Just For Our Developers. In order to protect their work  -  the Elite Model will be available with a free transferable and registered technology license, and even special research archive site access one time only through Indiegogo - Exclusively.   

 

 

                    It's About - Engineered Experiences:

                                        

                         NOW, for Contributors - NULYX'S headphone debut: three distinct headphone models packed with most-wanted features: 

 

                           THE NULYX ELITE - amazingly ultra - light, water resistant, folds and slides into your pocket - Bluetooth Stereo, heavy duty, super flexible - almost impossible to break, for sport and office. Hi-Fi never felt so wearable.   Limited Availability to Indiegogo only.

 

                           THE SUPREMO - bigger, from top-levels to the bottom - crystal clear highs and deep rumbling Bass, Bluetooth Stereo: high-energy dynamic sound, two microphones - super comfort for gaming, Skype, and curling up on the sofa.   

 

                                           Photos of TESLA PRINCIPIA -  4.0  Here: 1 2 3 4  

                            THE TESLA PRINCIPIA  4.0. A classic design honoring the greatest Hacker of all time. Heavier than the Supremo and build to last. Battery saving 4.0 carries Bluetooth Smart Ready hub interoperability allowing the Tesla to control your Smartphone with voice command - while gathering data from a myriad of nodes and sensors in development worldwide for home automation, heath, medicine and fitness. (See General Features Below)  What would Tesla do today  - with NULYX?

 

PAYMENT ON  INDIEGOGO - While our campaign has PayPal enabled as the preferred payment option, contributors may also select the 'Pay As A Guest' option to charge to a credit card without logging into a PayPal account. Please follow this link for more details on credit card payments.                 

                         

 

 

 

                     GENERAL HEADPHONE FEATURES:

  • Noise Cancellation Microphone for talking,
  • Noise Cancellation for listening,
  • 200% longer talk time,
  • Rugged Foldable Elite Model slides into your pocket,      
  • Bluetooth Highspeed 3.0 - enhanced data rate,  8X times faster for richer sound; 4.0 in Tesla only,


  • Advanced Bluetooth Stereo Distribution Profile -  A2DP- 2, 
  • Hands-FreeCalling and Call Answering - comply with legislation for
  • hands-free in the car, 
  • Dual Stereo Channel Loud Speakers, 
  • Voice Dialing and Redialing; and call last incoming call,
  • Rechargeable Ion Battery ( never buy replacements again )

  • Automatically connects to handheld devices using Bluetooth -- 100% of smart phones today, 
  • Water Resistant - unlike other headphones (Elite Model),   
  • Wireless Leash (notifies you when you have left your phone behind),
  • Accept or Decline Incoming Calls, with voice command,
  • Neodymium Magnet Speakers - the most powerful magnet available - gamers will hear every sound ( Supremo and Tesla Models )

  • Remote music playback and pause/play/stop, Automatic Connecting with Bluetooth devices within 32 Feet,
  • Remotely control Bluetooth handheld  devices--control IPhone while it is tucked in your pocket by talking to it with your Nulyx Headphone,
  • Uses  voice to send you Email text messages and set calendar reminders. Leave your phone in your pocket or backpack. Receive  incoming notifications and alerts from Facebook, Twitter, Yahoo Mail, GMail, Hotmail -- notifications trigger silent vibration on a chip,
  • Pairs automatically with new Bluetooth 3D glasses and 3D TV, 3D movie screen or Bluetooth game console - ready for 3D Synchronization Profile and Dual View interactive gaming from Bluetooth.

  • Listen to Emails or text messages from Android, IOS and translated from multiple languages with IOS 6 Apple iPhone.
  • Special scratch resistant Stealth Matte Black finish (Elite Model)
  • High Gloss UV hardened Two Coat Clear Scratch Deterrent over Piano Black or Metallic Color Choice (Supremo Model), 
  • plus, THE NULYX SPECIAL EFFECT--- on board at no cost, as a bonus.


 
                                     And, the Sound:    

                                    
                             Quality: You'll hear things in a way you've never heard before. So, when we say "...engineering experiences" you might just hear and feel what we're talking about. Technical refinements include a new diaphragm and voice coil design. At the $49 - $169 price points, nothing in the market can touch the Elite: big bass while still responsive to vocals, (crisp vocals and guitars plus, NULYX delivers a live concert-like experience).


                             Specs: Supremo and Tesla ( just arrived ) use very high-power neodymium magnets for more dynamic sound. The result: crystal highs and deep rumbling lows with high definition.  Coils are wound from ultra high-purity, oxygen-free copper wire, slowly drawn and annealed for sound which is cleaner


                              Range: These manufacturing specifications permit our headphones to reproduce as natural a sound stage from stereo recordings as the producers intended (our reference criteria---a fine pair of speakers). We've remapped the music experience for anywhere you might go in the realms of your mind.With NULYX, Depth, detail and concert hall experience you never knew existed. 

 


 
                  Stretch Goals: Customize your Headset


                             You Become the Designer. In order to encourage early ordering and start the buzz, you can help us customized your instrument, when we pass our first secret internal stretch goal milestones and begin to add more features that matter, as a free added perk for all --- one at a time, and for each milestone thereafter.


                             Purchasing Power. These cool functions never have been seen together in a single headphone instrument ... We're putting purchasing economies to work!  We'll Email a ballot to you where you can check-off and rank your preferences 1-10 when we pass our first stretch goal.   


                                Stretch Goal Features: 

  • "Floating" touch buttons like those in the smart phone.
  • Luxurious lambskin full leather earpieces with memory foam cushions gently conform to your ear ...this one's really hard to resist!!
  • 360' gesture detection sensor to decline a call or silently approve an order or answer a question.
  • Automatic sleep/awake mode when you lay NULYX down or pick it up.
  • Extended talk-time.

  • Powerful Dolby DSP Functionality.
  • Phone call record access from your smartphone
  • Near Field Communication which effortlessly pairs with other NFC devices. ( Reminds you that you are separated from you're phone or have left it behind.)
  • SD memory card chip for when you want to be Smartphone free.  
  • Pedometer- how far you have walked or jogged?
  • FM radio... listen to NPR.

  • NULYX battery level can be viewed on your smartphone.
  • Double on board microphones add more clarity and authority to your voice during your calls
  • An equalizer to adjust to modifiable preset frequencies (  Pop, Club, Flat, Deep, Crystal, etc.).
  • A voice synthesizer to disguise the sound of your voice to, say: Santa Clause !
  • An app on your smartphone where you create your own dynamic  audio effect. NULYX in your own virtual concert hall.

                 NOTE: Stretch features available only on NULYX Supremo and Tesla Models.

 

                                       Inside NULYX

                           Earliest Discoveries. NULYX has emerged from years of research in Neuroscience in Canada and Europe. Its heritage can be traced to Tesla," the first hacker," who first pioneered the patterning of energy as waveforms for transmission.  Today, NULYX patterns signals and sends them via Bluetooth from a Smartphone app to a special conductor chip in a headset to create the NULYX special effect. (See: Our Science.)

                           Neuromodulation with Music. Listening to music is among the most rewarding human experiences. Peak responses with music can range from the measurable equivalent of eating a pleasurable meal up to that of psychoactive drugs.  Music can arouse feelings of euphoria and can be accompanied by "chills" which are now also measurable as an experience.

                           New Research. Recently, music heard through a headphone was traced conclusively to show release of  the neurotransmitter Dopamine.  Intense peak pleasure was measured as chills sensations as follows:

 

Published Research: quantifying Dopamine release while wearing a headphone and listening to music. See Full Research Article ;  and, See Full Research Article.

                           Energizing the Story or Song. Writers and composers have long known how to program peak emotions using the narrative form. We see this in it's simplest two-step form above, comprising: (1) anticipation; and, (2) release or dramatic resolution accompanied by neurotransmitter release. We see this same effect of peak emotional high again when our team finally wins The Series or Superbowl with many smaller highs preceding the finale. NULYX is additive and layered on top of present content to amplify its intensity using a weak pulsed magnetic waveform like adding caffeine with alchohol to stimultate neurotransmitter dopamine release.

                           NULYX Engineers Emotional Experience. Remarkably, emotional immersion can be engineered by neuromodulation and added or stacked as numerous studies show. NULYX tracks the unfolding of music or story and then is added to amplify emotional effect. 

 

                           Peak Experieces in Music. Listen on You Tube to the Finale of the William Tell Overture, the rousing Hallelujah Chorus, The Ride of the Valkyre, or America the Beautiful to feel how this time course of neurostimulation plays out in the composition.

                           Or, in Everyday Life. The success of Facebook and Twitter rest, in part, on neuromodulation.  Neuroscientists at Harvard have just shown their secret.  Brain imaging has revealed that social media derive much of its success by providing a vehicle for self-disclosure which occupies 30- 40% of our daily speech. Here, disclosure stimulates measurable surges in dopamine release. See: Full Research (Self-Disclosure Harvard) Article.

                           A Fundamental Discovery. Prescription medication, coffee, music - just about any stimulus can trigger neurostimulation. In addition to music, both ultrasound and magnetic waveforms can also be programmed with narrative media for neuromodulation. This provides a big opprotunity for content development. The operant mechanism in the pivotal role of neurotransmitter Dopamine as a reward and progenitor signaling molecule in all of the above is now believed to influence the release of tiny amounts of natural morphine by white blood cells for the pleasurable rewarding response. And intriquingly for content developers, morphine is known for being the most euphoric of medications.

                          An interesting correlation with these findings can be made between the repeated administration of magnetic fields in numerous studies and pain relief. In just one tentative study cited immediately below, a weak and pulsed magnetic waveform was administered using a headset for pain relief wherein it was observed to be equivalent in it's effectiveness to that of prescription Morphine.  For how this works, see: "Endogenous Morphine: Up-to Date Review 2011" by Stefano and Kream,  Full Research (Endogenous Morphine) Article. And also See: Full Research (Pain Management) Article using a headset. For more discussion see Our Science.

                                            PART 2 

                          A New Medium for Developers

                                         BLUETOOTH: a Two - Way Radio on a Chip:                              

 

                           BLUETOOTH:  HEADPHONE NEWS FOR DEVELOPERS 

                          Bluetooth Trumps VR.  Bluetooth is about to release a wide variety of specifications for synchronization of economical 3D entertainment applications including theatres, TV, and display devices of all kinds.

                          Bluetooth 3D.  Foremost for 3D TV will be stereo headphones deployed with Bluetooth to increase immersion. Headphones are combined with 3D Bluetooth glasses using the new Bluetooth 3D Synchronization Protocol. Argueably, a far more practical and mass-market solution for total immersion than present Virtual Reality. Special Bluetooth 3D glasses and Bluetooth high quality stereo will be streamed and synchronized with 3D display and stereo headphones to create emotional immersion for an an amazing experience, as depicted below:

 

                          Bluetooth Dual View for Gamers. For game developers, the revolutionary Bluetooth Dual View interactive system allows two players to have two different views on the same display ---  just like in real life combat. Our NULYX developers will immediately get all the Bluetooth details on these and other applications long before hardware release.

                          Bluetooth Integration with NULYX. The NULYX Headphone connects by Bluetooth to the IPhone or Android device automatically. All smartphones now have Bluetooth as does 60% of new TV. The total of Bluetooth enabled devices is at 2+ BILLION a year and rapidly growing - opening vast opportunities for apps arising from this accelerating interoperability.  

                          Bluetooth Enables New Headphone Applications.  For example, who wants to read Email when your headphone can do it for you with Bluetooth; while driving, running, biking, or busy in the kitchen.  For developers, Bluetooth is a recognizable brand and has become a valuable resource in the consumer decision making process. See: Video 1 and Video 2.

Also, check here: developer.bluetooth.org/DEVELOPMENTRESOURCES/ and here stonestreetone.com to get started.  

 

                    Developer Headphone Test Modules: 

                          Our First Audience is Developers : those who want to create applications for big markets. With the NULYX System Development Kit (SDK), the imaginations of Wizards will run wild. Imagine being able to amp music, games and handheld apps to a new level of intensity.

                          And, beginning in June 2013, we plan to host Skype international hackathons -  just like Facebook does -  to bring together our then new community of hacker and developer contributors together in a  12 hour game-like application environment to experiment and build new apps with NULYX.

 

                            Development Possibilities are Endless. Combining our  licensed and registered  SDK with our headphones makes a test module ( perk tiers 3 and 4 ). It's all you need for designing, testing and studying  neuromodulation for entire packages of content. Or, try NULYX with weight - loss workouts where hundreds of apps, sensors and devices support the fitness industry and need more intensity. Apps with NULYX will seem  to make tedious routines to pass by more swiftly. Routines with NULYX combined with music will give you wings! For examples of present workout apps see: wahoofitness.com. 

                    

                             Programming Is Easy. Waveforms can be graphically configured into patterns like objects, then into strings and finally pulse trains using the NULYX SDK and our simple drawing tool that manipulates straight lines for constructing waveforms from your laptop or PC. Waveforms can be copyrighted the same as Music.

                             Programming Waveforms. The NULYX configuration tool for drawing  is one of our favorite aspects of the Project. For example, here's one way to break down a basic waveform into its constituent parts for configuration. Like composing music, patterns of these waveforms can then be synchronized with the content to intensify the broad arc of the story or song for more exhilarating experiences.  

  

                     Market Opportunity for Developers:

                                       -- It's all in the Arithmetic. 

                            Why Develop NULYX apps? Application development is about being in the right place at the right time. History shows that only the earliest adopters in app development can seize the low hanging fruit. If you could turn the clock back, what app theme would you develop? Today, with nearly a million apps it becomes increasingly difficult to distinguish new offerings in a crowded  marketplace. Increasingly, only new features (pixie dust) can give you an edge.

                           Headsets .For application developers, headphones are presently a $2 Billion market worldwide ( $1.2 Billion US). This market is broad and deep, estimated to be 20X larger than for the Smartwatch.  Increasingly, headphones have become a place to get away to - your own private retreat. Also, they are now combined with other devices and technologies like gaming, Skype, computers, tablets and TV.  

                           A Captive Audience. The linkage and interoperability between the smartphone and headphone via Bluetooth holds audience attention. Now, visualize games, music, distant learning, self-help and the entire world of content-- all made more intense with greater audience attention provided with the combination of NULYX and a headphone.. See: Full Research (Learning) Article. See: Full Research (Video Game) Article. 

       

                         Specific Gaming and Education Applications. Intriguingly, development opportunities exist for gaming applications to stimulate Dopamine  and other neurotransmitters to improved visual processing, speed reflexes and  cognitive processing as US Army now studies show. Result:  WIN MORE OFTEN---the Ultimate Secret Weapon. For Learning, Dopamine stimulation enhances memory and speed of recall, replacing study drugs and without the later letdown. Result: BETTER GRADES. 

Additional applications for Developers identified with neurotransmission described below can be found in the NULYX published research archive in the Tier 4 - "Mad Scientist" Perk:  

 

We are working with the best researchers and techs in the industry -

 

SPECIAL THANKS: To Distinguished Professor, Dwight Streit, Ph.D and his staff at the UCLA Engineering Institute of Technology Advancement for their support which helped us answer some key questions. ( Link: See Letter.) Thanks also to staff at the Behavoral Neuroscience Laboratory, Laurentian University in Canada and to its Director, Dr. Michael A Persinger, and especially to its Chief Technology Officer Stanley Koren,and to Alex W. Thomas, Ph.D at Western Ontario University and the Lawson Research Institute staff which was patient and helpful.

Furthermore, special thanks are particularly owed to: Aaron R. Seitz, Ph.D,. UC Riverside. Doctor Seitz’s pioneering work in perception provided the basis and overarching theory for the application by NULYX of a way to make entertainment richer and more immersive. 

Thanks too, to the chief technology officers: Richard Kulavick ( Turtle Beach-gaming headphones ), Tony DiChiro ( Monster Products mfg.of Beats by Dr.Dre ), Ed Woodard (Grado Labs), Dr.Testuro Oishi (Skullcandy), Dan Gauger (Bose Corporation, co-inventor of Noise Cancellation) and special thanks to Walt Husak (Dolby Labs), Sean Cooney ( Warner Bros VP, Advanced Technology), Roberto Padovani (Qualcomm  EVP and former CTO), and Faroog Hameed ( Broadcom - Bluetooth ).  And, there are nameless others involved but, they could get fired if we told who they are.

 

                                 Part 3: Our Science


                           Deeper into Nulyx. It was Dr. Aaron Seitz at the University of California who for us first identified weak magnetic fields as stimulating neurotransmiter release and causing measurable effects below conscious perception. He observed that these fields could potentiate "organized and meaningful improvement of discriminative performance,"( as, in gaming ) and that, "magnetic stimulation could boost signals to surpass learning thresholds," (as, in Internet and Distance Learning).  See: Full Article.


                           Published Headset Research. The first published research using a headset occurred in Canada in 2007. This effect was described in a double-blind, placebo-controlled trial using a pulsed low frequency waveform from a magnetic field. What has become NULYX was first observed as an artefact in Medicine in MRI imaging and was seen again in pain and depression relief. Initially, it was tested using a headset for pain relief in a published  comparative study against prescription oral pain relievers of  the opioid morphine, oxycodone and codeine class. Morphine is generally considered the most euphoric of pain relievers. See Published Research on this Headset Effect: See: Full Article.


                           Neurostimulation. A pleasant neurostimulative, even euphoric effect, was consistently observed again at another Canadian University.  There, pleasant effects and even transcendent experiences had been facilitated using a headpiece in 19 published experiments spanning a number of years. Analysis, subsequent re-analysis and correlation of the data from 407 subjects, confirmed the effect. Most significantly, subjects described their experiences as," personally very meaningful, richer, more emotional and real."  See Published Research on 19 studies: International Journal of Neuroscience 116: 1079-1096,2006: See: Full Article.


Pairing Experimentation with NULYX Headphones:


                          Sharing Feelings. Feelings appear to have been conveyed silently in the laboratory between subjects by converting single words representing a feeling recorded digitally for transmission as a natural weak magnetic waveform.  In addition to music creating sonic energy, the electronics in all headphones create a weak magnetic field which could convey single word information to the mind. (Words used in the experiments were like " marvelous," " happy," " giving," "comfortable,"'and " beautiful.").
                       

 The implications of these tentative findings are potentially significant - a phenomenon that has been reproduced and published twice. It could be fun -  an intriguing experiment with a special friend!  Applications exist for use by gamers in combination with Bluetooth Dual View.
                         

All those who purchase two or more NULYX  headphones will receive instructions on how to set up these experiments. See reward tier 4. See Full Article.


        Team Nulyx Backstory - How We Began:  Click Here

 

 

FAQ: Have a Question? If the above peeked your curiosity, please send all your questions to us HERE: contact@nulyx.com
