                                       Inside NULYX
                           Earliest Discoveries. NULYX has emerged from years of research in Neuroscience in Canada and Europe. Its heritage can be traced to Tesla," the first hacker," who first pioneered the patterning of energy as waveforms for transmission.  Today, NULYX patterns signals and sends them via Bluetooth from a Smartphone app to a special conductor chip in a headset to create the NULYX special effect. (See: Our Science.)
                           Neuromodulation with Music. Listening to music is among the most rewarding human experiences. Peak responses with music can range from the measurable equivalent of eating a pleasurable meal up to that of psychoactive drugs.  Music can arouse feelings of euphoria and can be accompanied by "chills" which are now also measurable as an experience.
                           New Research. Recently, music heard through a headphone was traced conclusively to show release of  the neurotransmitter Dopamine.  Intense peak pleasure was measured as chills sensations as follows:
 
Published Research: quantifying Dopamine release while wearing a headphone and listening to music. See Full Research Article ;  and, See Full Research Article.
                           Energizing the Story or Song. Writers and composers have long known how to program peak emotions using the narrative form. We see this in it's simplest two-step form above, comprising: (1) anticipation; and, (2) release or dramatic resolution accompanied by neurotransmitter release. We see this same effect of peak emotional high again when our team finally wins The Series or Superbowl with many smaller highs preceding the finale. NULYX is additive and layered on top of present content to amplify its intensity using a weak pulsed magnetic waveform like adding caffeine with alchohol to stimultate neurotransmitter dopamine release.
                           NULYX Engineers Emotional Experience. Remarkably, emotional immersion can be engineered by neuromodulation and added or stacked as numerous studies show. NULYX tracks the unfolding of music or story and then is added to amplify emotional effect. 
 
                           Peak Experieces in Music. Listen on You Tube to the Finale of the William Tell Overture, the rousing Hallelujah Chorus, The Ride of the Valkyre, or America the Beautiful to feel how this time course of neurostimulation plays out in the composition.
                           Or, in Everyday Life. The success of Facebook and Twitter rest, in part, on neuromodulation.  Neuroscientists at Harvard have just shown their secret.  Brain imaging has revealed that social media derive much of its success by providing a vehicle for self-disclosure which occupies 30- 40% of our daily speech. Here, disclosure stimulates measurable surges in dopamine release. See: Full Research (Self-Disclosure Harvard) Article.
                           A Fundamental Discovery. Prescription medication, coffee, music - just about any stimulus can trigger neurostimulation. In addition to music, both ultrasound and magnetic waveforms can also be programmed with narrative media for neuromodulation. This provides a big opprotunity for content development. The operant mechanism in the pivotal role of neurotransmitter Dopamine as a reward and progenitor signaling molecule in all of the above is now believed to influence the release of tiny amounts of natural morphine by white blood cells for the pleasurable rewarding response. And intriquingly for content developers, morphine is known for being the most euphoric of medications.
                          An interesting correlation with these findings can be made between the repeated administration of magnetic fields in numerous studies and pain relief. In just one tentative study cited immediately below, a weak and pulsed magnetic waveform was administered using a headset for pain relief wherein it was observed to be equivalent in it's effectiveness to that of prescription Morphine.  For how this works, see: "Endogenous Morphine: Up-to Date Review 2011" by Stefano and Kream,  Full Research (Endogenous Morphine) Article. And also See: Full Research (Pain Management) Article using a headset. For more discussion see Our Science.
                                            PART 2 
                          A New Medium for Developers
                                         BLUETOOTH: a Two - Way Radio on a Chip:                              
 
                           BLUETOOTH:  HEADPHONE NEWS FOR DEVELOPERS 
                          Bluetooth Trumps VR.  Bluetooth is about to release a wide variety of specifications for synchronization of economical 3D entertainment applications including theatres, TV, and display devices of all kinds.
                          Bluetooth 3D.  Foremost for 3D TV will be stereo headphones deployed with Bluetooth to increase immersion. Headphones are combined with 3D Bluetooth glasses using the new Bluetooth 3D Synchronization Protocol. Argueably, a far more practical and mass-market solution for total immersion than present Virtual Reality. Special Bluetooth 3D glasses and Bluetooth high quality stereo will be streamed and synchronized with 3D display and stereo headphones to create emotional immersion for an an amazing experience, as depicted below:
 
                          Bluetooth Dual View for Gamers. For game developers, the revolutionary Bluetooth Dual View interactive system allows two players to have two different views on the same display ---  just like in real life combat. Our NULYX developers will immediately get all the Bluetooth details on these and other applications long before hardware release.
                          Bluetooth Integration with NULYX. The NULYX Headphone connects by Bluetooth to the IPhone or Android device automatically. All smartphones now have Bluetooth as does 60% of new TV. The total of Bluetooth enabled devices is at 2+ BILLION a year and rapidly growing - opening vast opportunities for apps arising from this accelerating interoperability.  
                          Bluetooth Enables New Headphone Applications.  For example, who wants to read Email when your headphone can do it for you with Bluetooth; while driving, running, biking, or busy in the kitchen.  For developers, Bluetooth is a recognizable brand and has become a valuable resource in the consumer decision making process. See: Video 1 and Video 2.
Also, check here: developer.bluetooth.org/DEVELOPMENTRESOURCES/ and here stonestreetone.com to get started.  
 
                    Developer Headphone Test Modules: 
                          Our First Audience is Developers : those who want to create applications for big markets. With the NULYX System Development Kit (SDK), the imaginations of Wizards will run wild. Imagine being able to amp music, games and handheld apps to a new level of intensity.
                          And, beginning in June 2013, we plan to host Skype international hackathons -  just like Facebook does -  to bring together our then new community of hacker and developer contributors together in a  12 hour game-like application environment to experiment and build new apps with NULYX.
 
                            Development Possibilities are Endless. Combining our  licensed and registered  SDK with our headphones makes a test module ( perk tiers 3 and 4 ). It's all you need for designing, testing and studying  neuromodulation for entire packages of content. Or, try NULYX with weight - loss workouts where hundreds of apps, sensors and devices support the fitness industry and need more intensity. Apps with NULYX will seem  to make tedious routines to pass by more swiftly. Routines with NULYX combined with music will give you wings! For examples of present workout apps see: wahoofitness.com. 
                    
                             Programming Is Easy. Waveforms can be graphically configured into patterns like objects, then into strings and finally pulse trains using the NULYX SDK and our simple drawing tool that manipulates straight lines for constructing waveforms from your laptop or PC. Waveforms can be copyrighted the same as Music.
                             Programming Waveforms. The NULYX configuration tool for drawing  is one of our favorite aspects of the Project. For example, here's one way to break down a basic waveform into its constituent parts for configuration. Like composing music, patterns of these waveforms can then be synchronized with the content to intensify the broad arc of the story or song for more exhilarating experiences.  
  
                     Market Opportunity for Developers:
                                       -- It's all in the Arithmetic. 
                            Why Develop NULYX apps? Application development is about being in the right place at the right time. History shows that only the earliest adopters in app development can seize the low hanging fruit. If you could turn the clock back, what app theme would you develop? Today, with nearly a million apps it becomes increasingly difficult to distinguish new offerings in a crowded  marketplace. Increasingly, only new features (pixie dust) can give you an edge.
                           Headsets .For application developers, headphones are presently a $2 Billion market worldwide ( $1.2 Billion US). This market is broad and deep, estimated to be 20X larger than for the Smartwatch.  Increasingly, headphones have become a place to get away to - your own private retreat. Also, they are now combined with other devices and technologies like gaming, Skype, computers, tablets and TV.  
                           A Captive Audience. The linkage and interoperability between the smartphone and headphone via Bluetooth holds audience attention. Now, visualize games, music, distant learning, self-help and the entire world of content-- all made more intense with greater audience attention provided with the combination of NULYX and a headphone.. See: Full Research (Learning) Article. See: Full Research (Video Game) Article. 
       
                         Specific Gaming and Education Applications. Intriguingly, development opportunities exist for gaming applications to stimulate Dopamine  and other neurotransmitters to improved visual processing, speed reflexes and  cognitive processing as US Army now studies show. Result:  WIN MORE OFTEN---the Ultimate Secret Weapon. For Learning, Dopamine stimulation enhances memory and speed of recall, replacing study drugs and without the later letdown. Result: BETTER GRADES. 
Additional applications for Developers identified with neurotransmission described below can be found in the NULYX published research archive in the Tier 4 - "Mad Scientist" Perk:  
 
We are working with the best researchers and techs in the industry -
 
SPECIAL THANKS: To Distinguished Professor, Dwight Streit, Ph.D and his staff at the UCLA Engineering Institute of Technology Advancement for their support which helped us answer some key questions. ( Link: See Letter.) Thanks also to staff at the Behavoral Neuroscience Laboratory, Laurentian University in Canada and to its Director, Dr. Michael A Persinger, and especially to its Chief Technology Officer Stanley Koren,and to Alex W. Thomas, Ph.D at Western Ontario University and the Lawson Research Institute staff which was patient and helpful.
Furthermore, special thanks are particularly owed to: Aaron R. Seitz, Ph.D,. UC Riverside. Doctor Seitz’s pioneering work in perception provided the basis and overarching theory for the application by NULYX of a way to make entertainment richer and more immersive. 
Thanks too, to the chief technology officers: Richard Kulavick ( Turtle Beach-gaming headphones ), Tony DiChiro ( Monster Products mfg.of Beats by Dr.Dre ), Ed Woodard (Grado Labs), Dr.Testuro Oishi (Skullcandy), Dan Gauger (Bose Corporation, co-inventor of Noise Cancellation) and special thanks to Walt Husak (Dolby Labs), Sean Cooney ( Warner Bros VP, Advanced Technology), Roberto Padovani (Qualcomm  EVP and former CTO), and Faroog Hameed ( Broadcom - Bluetooth ).  And, there are nameless others involved but, they could get fired if we told who they are.
 
                                 Part 3: Our Science
                           Deeper into Nulyx. It was Dr. Aaron Seitz at the University of California who for us first identified weak magnetic fields as stimulating neurotransmiter release and causing measurable effects below conscious perception. He observed that these fields could potentiate "organized and meaningful improvement of discriminative performance,"( as, in gaming ) and that, "magnetic stimulation could boost signals to surpass learning thresholds," (as, in Internet and Distance Learning).  See: Full Article.
                           Published Headset Research. The first published research using a headset occurred in Canada in 2007. This effect was described in a double-blind, placebo-controlled trial using a pulsed low frequency waveform from a magnetic field. What has become NULYX was first observed as an artefact in Medicine in MRI imaging and was seen again in pain and depression relief. Initially, it was tested using a headset for pain relief in a published  comparative study against prescription oral pain relievers of  the opioid morphine, oxycodone and codeine class. Morphine is generally considered the most euphoric of pain relievers. See Published Research on this Headset Effect: See: Full Article.
                           Neurostimulation. A pleasant neurostimulative, even euphoric effect, was consistently observed again at another Canadian University.  There, pleasant effects and even transcendent experiences had been facilitated using a headpiece in 19 published experiments spanning a number of years. Analysis, subsequent re-analysis and correlation of the data from 407 subjects, confirmed the effect. Most significantly, subjects described their experiences as," personally very meaningful, richer, more emotional and real."  See Published Research on 19 studies: International Journal of Neuroscience 116: 1079-1096,2006: See: Full Article.

Pairing Experimentation with NULYX Headphones:

                          Sharing Feelings. Feelings appear to have been conveyed silently in the laboratory between subjects by converting single words representing a feeling recorded digitally for transmission as a natural weak magnetic waveform.  In addition to music creating sonic energy, the electronics in all headphones create a weak magnetic field which could convey single word information to the mind. (Words used in the experiments were like " marvelous," " happy," " giving," "comfortable,"'and " beautiful.").                        
 The implications of these tentative findings are potentially significant - a phenomenon that has been reproduced and published twice. It could be fun -  an intriguing experiment with a special friend!  Applications exist for use by gamers in combination with Bluetooth Dual View.                         
All those who purchase two or more NULYX  headphones will receive instructions on how to set up these experiments. See reward tier 4. See Full Article.


        Team Nulyx Backstory - How We Began:  Click Here

 
 
FAQ: Have a Question? If the above peeked your curiosity, please send all your questions to us HERE: contact@nulyx.com 

Note - Text Copyright, NULYX Trademark and U.S. and foreign patents pending property of MediaScience Partners, LLP.

story:
Hello,

My name is Mark Saint, and I am the Owner and Creator of www.SaintsAddiction.com - The companies Idea started 5 years ago, I named it Saint's Addiction, because my last name being Saint, and my addiction to T-Shirts. The name means more, it means We ALL have addictions, but We decided to do something Saintly instead. Turn a Negative into a Positive. Be Positive. Be A Saint.

I started SA's in my mind, before leaving America for 4 years of World Travel, this Idea hit me like lightning, and almost made me NOT Travel. I Launched as soon as I landed a year ago in Las Vegas Sept. 2012. I have been working Local Events consistently, on the weekly, with Great Success and Community Support, ever since. I am Originally from Las Vegas, Proud to say that I am, and that's why I called it, "The Las Vegas Original." I have worked at Sales, Marketing, and Networking for my whole LIFE, built a database of 5,000 Local LIFE Time Customers (LTC's), all before I stepped a foot out of Vegas.

I have always wanted to own my own business, and this business had to reach People, a lot of People, People World Wide. The business had to make a difference in Peoples LIVES, NOT just profits, but something We ALL could share and grow Together. So, I took a chance at LIFE, packed everything I owned in a storage unit, and Traveled the World. I sold my car, sold my condo, and proceeded into the World with one Idea: Tattoo T-Shirts. The idea is simple, but struck me like lightning: Tattoo's are REALLY Popular, they are also ART, and any tattoo design could be printed on a T-Shirt. People have a HUGE Passion for their tattoo's, and everywhere I LIVED in the World, my Local Friends owned Tattoo Shops, but didn't sell apparel. Could I be so lucky to find a business niche, as to start an International Company, that NOT only made shirts, but distributed them World Wide. That my Friends and I could express Our Creativity, Our Originality, Share Our Positivity, and We would Change this World Together. That We would let the World decide what design would come to fruition, print those chosen shirts as needed, and NOT be left with over-stock. With this Network, we would NEVER have to discount a garment, but simply give it extra LOVE, and send that garment to another profitable location. We would be United, Ideas would be Shared, and We ALL would give back to ALL Our Local Communities. 

Be the Change you want to see in the World. - Mahatma Gandhi 

On My Journey, the world provided the fact that all my Friends abroad owned Tattoo Shops, but didn't sell their designs, or any apparel. They say to be a Millionaire, you must take a Millionaire to lunch, so I did. Here's what she told me: Buy Wholesale, mark up your apparel 5 times, and sell through creative Marketing. Sure, this is easy information, and definitely NOT worth the lunch money, but I Learned. I took that knowledge with me as I Traveled, visiting factories in China, Turkey, and Thailand, with this idea in my head, and trying to find a way to bring it to reality.

What I found was that I have a lot of Friends, Local and around the World, who were hungry to sell apparel, make their own apparel, and needed help to distribute said apparel. We ALL have businesses, full of Talent and Ambition, but without working capital. There was plenty of designs, many tattoo shops that wanted to join, but no money to, "Make it Happen' Captain'!!!" So, I decided to Unite Us ALL, Create a Network were designs, apparel, and ideas flowed Universally, and We would ALL Grow simultaneously. We are starting a company like the World has NEVER seen. A business based on Co-Sharing; The concept is simple, but Strong: An Idea that if We ALL work Together, sharing ALL the Knowledge, Ideas, and Solutions Together - We will Grow Together. Within Our TEAM - We will Grow Faster and Stronger Together. By doing so, We NOT only maximize Our Growth and Profits, but We will Create a platform with the most original designs, fastest distribution, and make a difference in Our Local Communities.

With new technology in Logistics and Analytics, We can Grow a business that covers the World, Connects the World, and Unites Us as a Family. The way technology intended. Now our Cultures, ART, and Ideas get shared rapidly, without fear of competition, but in the Spirit, that if one of Us makes it, We ALL make it.

As ONE or NOT at ALL

We just need one design, one phrase, or one trademark to become a Global Success, and we ALL benefit from the groups efforts. We feel confident that Our Global Network, will cover a wider range of possible customers, increasing our chances for higher sales revenue, and bringing more Connectivity to Our small planet. Our ultimate GOAL is to reach People, from ALL walks of LIFE, through shirts, because everyone wears shirts. That is just the beginning, the shirts get Our foot in the door, once the door is open, We can Share Our Ideas, We can then spread the Philosophy of Co-Sharing, People can join Our Network, and the World will have a Global Group doing something Positive for the betterment of Our Human Species.

Knowledge is Power - Words have Power - We want that Power to go to the People. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need working capital, the moneys contributed will go directly to growing this business. Step one is getting everything legal, business licenses, tax ID numbers, and DBA's. We need contracts made to sign new Artists, before We launch their designs or brands. We need a multi-lingual website, that will need social media software, and search engine optimization. We need to buy more apparel to fulfill orders, and to manufacture more shirts. We want to create a successful website, before a single brick is put into place, establishing ourselves in the local Community.

All of the above has been done through my own personal funds, every cent goes to Events. ALL the Networking, the social media, and gathering the troops has been done. The social media is primed and ready for take off, we have created a 1,000 People Like Page, and looking to expand ten fold to that. We are regulars at weekly Events in Las Vegas, every First Friday is filled with Friends and possible customers. 

 

We need:

$500 dollars to get ALL of Our Business Licenses complete.

$1,000 dollars to finish and Launch Our New Website by November 5th.

$750 dollars to do the Las Vegas Bike Festival again, October 3rd-6th.

$2,500 dollars to re-supply Our shrinking inventory, approximately 500 pieces.

$6,000 dollars to Travel back to Finland, Turkey, and Thailand ($2,000 each) and secure supply lines and sign contracts with Our World Wide Partners.

 

Total - $10,000 in Start-Up Cost

 

$50,000 to go International - Honk Kong and Tokyo, Japan

$100,000 to build "The Coolest T-Shirt Shop in Las Vegas"

$250,000 to Launch Saints Brand Internationally.

 

The business plan has been re-written, the financials have been tightened, and now we have come to a point were additional funds are needed to move forward and grow to Our FULL capacity. An attorney needs to make contracts, our CPA needs to balance the books, and we need to replenish our supplies for back-orders.

Even if We don't reach Our entire GOAL, as you can see above, every little bit will Help. We already make the most of what We have. We will still have to get legal, We still will vend at more Events, and the website is ready to Launch on November 5th.

If you Help Us reach this GOAL on Time, NOT only will You receive a hand shake and a HUG, an outpouring of acknowledgement, but a FREE T-Shirt.

You will be Helping Your Local Community, and Communities around the World.

You will also be considered as a Percentage Holder in the right circumstances.

 

 

The Impact

 

The impact your contribution will be TREMENDOUS, and it will be GLOBAL!!!

 

We like to think of ourselves as a Community School / Marketing Company: Educating the Youth in Our Local Community by hands on training, side by side tutor time, and recruiting Local Talent. Launching Brands, making a difference in the Community, and Connecting People and Cultures Internationally.

 

Imagine a TEAM of established Artists/Entrepreneurs, waiting to show the World their Designs/Ideas, and that there is a company ready to make that a REALITY. That company is Saints Addiction, that Idea is REAL, and We are ready!!! That it is possible for the first time in history where Artists help their Local Community through ART, and in return for their ART, We will distribute their ART to different Countries. This is a system based on Trust, fairness, exposure, and TEAM work. By Helping someone get their ART out in the World, someone too will be Helping You do the same. We are ALL admirers of ART, ART is a great Connector of People, and with a big enough Network of Artists, we are Helping the Community in the process. 

I made the first trip, Friends are starting to follow, Our Network is Global, and We are looking to spread like wild fire. The Passion is off the charts, my Friends are already selling my shirts for me in different countries. I have more Artist friends looking to get their brands out, and into the World. As You read this, there are different parts of the World requesting more Designs, thirsty for New Ideas, and wanting more Apparel.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you also would like to be part of our Co-Sharing network, know an Artist that is in need of Apparel or exposure, Contact Us. This business can only get bigger, the World is a BIG place, but with more People Connecting, We can make it smaller.

Share if you care: www.facebook.com/ShirtsbySaints is our facebook page.

Like or Tag Us Up, Re-Post Our pics, and Instagram or Twitter @SaintsAddiction

We might not have ALL the answers, but We are LIVING Our Passions, the Growth is REAL, and the Future is Bright. Help Us to Grow to Our FULL capabilities. Thank You

story:
Hi! I’m Amelia, owner and head designer of my self-titled label, Amelia Walsh. Right now I am a one-man show in creating my collections, and I do so straight out of my home in Phoenix, Arizona. All products are made as sustainable and environmentally friendly as possible using natural fibers, eco-friendly materials or deadstock fabrics whenever they are available. 

My place has always been in the fashion industry. From creating prom gowns for friends in high school to my third year in Scottsdale Fashion Week, I’ve strived to create unique, feminine looks that every woman wants to wear.

In order to expand my business and keep up with the growing demand I need to start working with a factory to develop inventory and sell across the nation. The funds from this project will allow me to get the ball rolling in 3 parts:

1) Getting manufacturer samples in process. I plan to be working with Evan’s Group International based in California.

2) Reserving a booth at WWD’s Magic Tradeshow. This is the largest platform in the US to meet buyers and other industry leaders throughout the country

3) Sign with a PR agent to generate press, expand audience and reach, and product placement.   

If the entire goal is not reached, we will mostly focus on working with a manufacturer, then slowly working out way to tradeshows and generating my own publicity. 

The perks you will recieve from this project will be sold here and here only! They will be exclusive to this project and will be serialized as such! 

Although my current forte is in women’s apparel I do eventually want to branch out into menswear. So don’t worry guys, I’ve included a few men’s options for you to choose from as well. 

 

First off, thank you so much for your support! You will be featured on my websites sponsor page as well as receive a personalized thank you card!

In addition to website sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card, you will also receive a signed and serialized limited edition fashion illustration print of the collection that this project will launch.

GIRL AND GUY OPTIONS- choose between guys or girls graphic tee. Guys tee features a graphic of a blueprint of a sewing machine motor while the girls tee depicts the title that every woman has earned, "Fashion Investor". You will also receive sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card. 

The perfect winter accessory, a mini hooded cape! Along with an invitation to the launch party and fashion show of the collection this project launches with, as well as sponsorship recognition and personalized thank you card. 

GIRL AND GUY OPTIONS- Guys choose from a black, gray, or brown vest. Vests will have a plaid backside and matching plaid front flap pockets. For the black options, the plaids will be in the black white and red tones. For grey, the plaids will be blues and grey’s and for brown they will be in green and brown tones. 

Ladies, will receive the ultimate fashion necessity, the little black dress. Made from cotton jersey, it's perfect to dress up or down for any occasion that comes along. This classic black A-line dress is the most comfortable chic can be.

Also receive an invitation to the launch party and fashion show. Reward also includes sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card.

GUY AND GIRL OPTIONS-Receive your choice from the $175 package as well as a guys or girls graphic tee. Along with website sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card.

Receive the following: Classic circle skirt in white or natural and hooded caplet! You’ll also get your choice of a guys or girls graphic tee and the signed and serialized fashion print. This package also includes a VIP invite to the launch party/fashion show as well as a  personalized thank you card and sponsorship recognition. 

Get the little strapless mini dress with removable wrap in the COLOR OF YOUR CHOICE! Also receive the hooded caplet, a VIP launch party invite,  personalized thank you card and sponsorship recognition. 

Receive a hand painted halter gown, in the COLOR OF YOUR CHOICE, made to fit you! Along with that, you will have a future piece named after you, a signed and serial number limited edition original fashion illustration print, and your choice of the guys or girls graphic tee. You’ll also get a VIP invitation to the launch party and fashion show as well as sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card.

One of a kind gown made especially for you! This includes bridal wear!! You’ll have a personal consultation with Amelia, for those of you who live in Arizona she’ll even take you to lunch! You’ll also receive a signed original illustration of your piece, VIP invitation to launch party and fashion show, sponsorship recognition, and personalized thank you card.

The Impact and Other Ways You Can Help

Through participating in fashion weeks, developing my own publicity/advertising and creating some incredible relationships over the years, I have grown my business to it's full capacity at this level. If I want to grow my business any further, I need to expand, that is why I need your help. 

With your contribution to this project, I can grow my business, create jobs and give back to the community I grew up in. I can make the investment my business needs in order to start making a greater impact on the fashion industry. 

I understand not everyone can help contribute to this project, but for those of you who cannot, please spread the word on this campaign, in hopes that it can still succeed. 

I would love to hear from you.  Questions, suggestions, issues, answers, or simply to say hello!

mia@ameliawalsh.com

ameliawalsh.com

facebook.com/AmeliaWalshFashion

A Special Thanks to:

- Ryan Walsh, for all your help, unconditional support and belief in my career! 

- Carly Vollmert, for working with my absurd requests and being the best model EVER!!!

- Doug MacLeod, for creating such a great video for me even within the crazy time frame!

- AND YOU! The Indiegogo contributors who are helping make this even possible!!! I am forever grateful!

2) Reserving a booth at WWD’s Magic Tradeshow. This is the largest platform in the US to meet buyers and other industry leaders throughout the country
3) Sign with a PR agent to generate press, expand audience and reach, and product placement.   
If the entire goal is not reached, we will mostly focus on working with a manufacturer, then slowly working out way to tradeshows and generating my own publicity. 

The perks you will recieve from this project will be sold here and here only! They will be exclusive to this project and will be serialized as such! 
Although my current forte is in women’s apparel I do eventually want to branch out into menswear. So don’t worry guys, I’ve included a few men’s options for you to choose from as well. 

 


First off, thank you so much for your support! You will be featured on my websites sponsor page as well as receive a personalized thank you card!

In addition to website sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card, you will also receive a signed and serialized limited edition fashion illustration print of the collection that this project will launch.

GIRL AND GUY OPTIONS- choose between guys or girls graphic tee. Guys tee features a graphic of a blueprint of a sewing machine motor while the girls tee depicts the title that every woman has earned, "Fashion Investor". You will also receive sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card. 
The perfect winter accessory, a mini hooded cape! Along with an invitation to the launch party and fashion show of the collection this project launches with, as well as sponsorship recognition and personalized thank you card. 
GIRL AND GUY OPTIONS- Guys choose from a black, gray, or brown vest. Vests will have a plaid backside and matching plaid front flap pockets. For the black options, the plaids will be in the black white and red tones. For grey, the plaids will be blues and grey’s and for brown they will be in green and brown tones. 
Ladies, will receive the ultimate fashion necessity, the little black dress. Made from cotton jersey, it's perfect to dress up or down for any occasion that comes along. This classic black A-line dress is the most comfortable chic can be.
Also receive an invitation to the launch party and fashion show. Reward also includes sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card.

GUY AND GIRL OPTIONS-Receive your choice from the $175 package as well as a guys or girls graphic tee. Along with website sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card.

Receive the following: Classic circle skirt in white or natural and hooded caplet! You’ll also get your choice of a guys or girls graphic tee and the signed and serialized fashion print. This package also includes a VIP invite to the launch party/fashion show as well as a  personalized thank you card and sponsorship recognition. 

Get the little strapless mini dress with removable wrap in the COLOR OF YOUR CHOICE! Also receive the hooded caplet, a VIP launch party invite,  personalized thank you card and sponsorship recognition. 

Receive a hand painted halter gown, in the COLOR OF YOUR CHOICE, made to fit you! Along with that, you will have a future piece named after you, a signed and serial number limited edition original fashion illustration print, and your choice of the guys or girls graphic tee. You’ll also get a VIP invitation to the launch party and fashion show as well as sponsorship recognition and a personalized thank you card.

One of a kind gown made especially for you! This includes bridal wear!! You’ll have a personal consultation with Amelia, for those of you who live in Arizona she’ll even take you to lunch! You’ll also receive a signed original illustration of your piece, VIP invitation to launch party and fashion show, sponsorship recognition, and personalized thank you card.

The Impact and Other Ways You Can Help
Through participating in fashion weeks, developing my own publicity/advertising and creating some incredible relationships over the years, I have grown my business to it's full capacity at this level. If I want to grow my business any further, I need to expand, that is why I need your help. 
With your contribution to this project, I can grow my business, create jobs and give back to the community I grew up in. I can make the investment my business needs in order to start making a greater impact on the fashion industry. 


I understand not everyone can help contribute to this project, but for those of you who cannot, please spread the word on this campaign, in hopes that it can still succeed. 

I would love to hear from you.  Questions, suggestions, issues, answers, or simply to say hello!
mia@ameliawalsh.com
ameliawalsh.com
facebook.com/AmeliaWalshFashion

A Special Thanks to:
- Ryan Walsh, for all your help, unconditional support and belief in my career! 
- Carly Vollmert, for working with my absurd requests and being the best model EVER!!!
- Doug MacLeod, for creating such a great video for me even within the crazy time frame!
- AND YOU! The Indiegogo contributors who are helping make this even possible!!! I am forever grateful!

story:
This is the ONLY PAIR OF CUFFLINKS YOU NEED!

What are CuffloCs?
CuffloCs are cufflinks that are glass lockets (Cufflinks + Locket = CuffloCs) that can be unscrewed and changed for any occasion.  They are approximately the size of a nickel and constructed out of stainless steel.  The screw/on off design keeps your items securely inside the double sided glass and can easily be taken apart to change the design.  They are the perfect gift to give or receive and can be customized to make the perfect accessory. 

 

The Story Behind the Idea

I recently got married and looked for months for the perfect groomsman gifts.  I was still looking up to the very last moment trying to find the most unique and useful items.  Besides something unique, I wanted something personalized... well I couldn't find or have both.  All personalized items were unoriginal and were mainly some type of drinkware.  I eventually settled on personalized tuxedo flasks, hence why I was still buying items on the day of our rehearsal.  Everyone loved the flasks as well as the other misc items I got, but I still wanted better and more.  I've always been a fan of cufflinks and a more fitting occasion than a wedding to show them off.  However I couldn't justify spending $50 or even $100 on a pair of personalized cufflinks that the guys would wear for one night.  So maybe I won't put the date and just get initials I thought, but initials were too plain for my taste and again I looked for more. The bottom line there wasn't anything else so I thought why not make something?  And that's how CuffloCs were born.  CuffloCs are not just for wedding gifts.  Being able to change the charms or even put your own picture in them makes them the only pair of cufflinks you need.  You can create your own unique piece to match any outfit (coming from someone who owns too many sneakers cause they have to match) and any occasion (think anniversary, birthday, retirement, holidays/father's day, vacations, etc).  It's time men wear a unique piece a jewelry and one our counterparts can't/don't wear.  Still not sold on CuffloCs? Watch how easy it is to make an original accessory...
History of Cufflinks
Cufflinks first appeared in the 1600s, but they did not become common until the end of the 18th century.  During the 19th century the Prince of Wales, later Edward VII popularized cufflinks and they became a fashion accessory and one of the few acceptable items of jewelry for men.  Today, cufflinks are minor works of art, offering men the possibility to wear their own art on their sleeve. This enables the expression of personality in two different ways:  1 - the mere fact that a man uses such an accessory says a great deal about his attention to detail &  2 - the design and materials of the cufflinks represent personal style and are worn to appear simultaneously fashionable yet remaining formal.  (wikipedia)

FUNDING

Thank you for your help and generosity!!!

Your contributions are to help me establish my product and place a large quantity order.  Essentially you are funding my start up costs while getting a very original and unique item.  Please help spread the word about CuffloCs (share this page!!!).

    PERKS

    Thank You PERK ($5)
    -Receive a personalized ecard from me as a thanks, every dollar helps!
    CuffloCs - Single Pair PERK
    -Receive a pair of CuffloCs (the only changeable cufflink locket) as well as 2 alloy charms from the list below (one for each locket).  Free shipping  to the continental US is also included.  All other orders please add $5 for shipping.
    CuffloCs - 5 Pack Discount (5%) PERK
    Receive 5 pairs of CuffloCs and save 5% ($10).  Also included are 10 alloy charms (see list of available charms) and free shipping within the continental US.  All other orders please add $5 for shipping.
    CuffloCs - 10 Pack Discount (10%) PERK
    Receive 10 pairs of CuffloCs and save 10% ($40).  That's like getting a CuffloC for free.  Also included are 10 alloy charms (see the list of available charms) and free shipping within the continental US.  All other orders please add $10 for shipping.
    CuffloCs - Business Discount PERK
    Have a jewelry business?  Looking to appeal to men?  Add the CuffloCs to your collection at a significantly discounted price (-35%) for placing a large quantity order of 100.  You will receive 100 pairs of CuffloCs as well as your choice of 5 different charms in quantities of 50 (250 charms total).  Free shipping within the continental US.  All other orders please contact me, cost would be approx. $50 for international shipping.  Please note this perk is limited due to production limitations.
    Custom CuffloCs Charm Set PERK
    Have a really cool idea for a charm that doesn't exist?  Buy this perk and get 10 pairs of CuffloCs and a set of a unique alloy charm that you helped create (quantity 50).  Just send me an image or idea and I will work with you to create the perfect charm just for you.  Then give them to your friends or family to enjoy.  Free shipping is included in the continental US.  All other orders please add $20 for shipping.  This perk is limited to ONLY 5!

    Charms List

    • Buffalo (cause thats where I'm from!)
    • Anchor (proud navy grandpa)
    • Eagle or American Flag (uhhh USA!)
    • Clover (it was that or green beer?)
    • Pink Breast Cancer Ribbon ( I <3 boobies )
    • "Groomsman" (wanted this for my boys)
    • Football (is there a better game...)
    • Basketball (March Madness yet?)
    • Soccer (it is the world's game)
    • NOTE: only 3 sports for now, but you can find more online
    • Numbers Jersey Style (0-9) 
    • Order any 2 numbers to get a personalized jersey number Ex 21 or 23 (also what I wanted for my groomsman)

     <------- Jersey Letter Numbers

    DON'T SEE A CHARM YOU WANT?

    Don't Worry!  CuffloCs are made to make your own.  Cut out and place a tiny picture inside the locket.  Find a birthstone or even put beach glass or sand in it from your favorite beach destination.  This item is as unique as you.  Again thank you for your support and please help share this page and spread the word about CuffloCs.

    THANK YOU FOR VISITING THIS PAGE & PLEASE SHARE.............

story:
"Things fall from our fingertips all the time! Let’s move from being a generation with the world at our fingertips and start being one with the world in front of us - on the tip of our minds."

Wearable tech glass that you see the world the best way- your way. We know what you’re thinking. Wearable tech glasses were revealed to the market a couple years ago by a big name company and, well, let’s just say it the product didn’t soar. So, why even bother with this product? The answer is simple. We can do it better and make it way more affordable. We believe MAD Gaze can ease and amplify everyday life. This generation needs a product that uses the world’s most advanced technology to not only make lives more convenient, but also enhanced. Our young, energetic group worked passionately to create an easy-to-use, stimulating product that transforms traditional 2D graphics into an exciting 3D experience.

What Exactly Is MAD Gaze?

MAD Gaze is a line of smart glass that runs on Android mobile operating system. It has ALL the functions- and MORE- of a smart phone. This state-of-the-art, exclusive wearable tech makes you feel in control of all your surroundings.

Using Augmented Reality technology (AR+), the information about the surrounding real world of the user becomes interactive and digital. It is operated by multi-touch and voice control with high recognition by motion and voice sensors embedded. Leaving your hands free to handle the millions of other things you have to do. MAD Gaze gives you a reason to keep your head up.

What Does MAD Gaze Do?

Our product is truly AMAZING! The following functions are what truly believe make it pop. In reality, though, the potential with MAD Gaze is infinite.

  • Instant Translation - Ever walk around a foreign country and have no idea what is going on? MAD Gaze is going to fix that for you. There is an auto-translate application that translate everything the glass see into the language of your choice. You’ll never want to travel without your MAD Gaze. 
  • Social - MAD Gaze allows users to make phone calls, text, send multimedia to contacts, access personal data assistant (PDA) and play any media. Seeing as this is the main reason people are on their smart phones all the time, by replacing that phone with MAD Gaze, a lot more time will be spent looking up. 
  • Entertainment & Games - Imagine playing your favorite game not having to look down at the screen, or using AR+ to play games where your surrounding real world interacts with you. Suddenly, the game becomes more interactive than idle. The world is enriched. MAD Gaze takes gaming to a whole new, more exciting and entertaining level. As a player, you truly feel in game. 
  • GPS Navigation - The GPS on MAD Gaze will ensure you never get lost. With the map and directions right in front of you, you will no longer miss a turn. A completely hands-free map creates a safer alternative than a smartphone in situations where having your hand free is quite important. Just envision having a little map in the corner of your eye directing you as you bike, drive, walk, run, kayak, anything! 

What Does MAD Gaze Look Like?

MAD Gaze will come with glasses for every purchaser to use. We want as many people as possible to be able to use MAD Gaze , regardless of their style. For that reason, we have made it so you can disconnect the dock of MAD Gaze and reconnect it to most other glasses. The product will be available in silver, titanium and rose gold.

What Is Augmented Reality?

AR+ is a live direct or indirect view of physical, real-world environments who elements are augmented by a computer-generated sensory input such as sound, video, graphics, or GPS data. Basically, it makes your surrounding world digital and interactive. When you are using MAD Gaze and look at a specific object, the device uses AR+ to display texts, images, audios, videos and 3D animations on the screen.

Is It Easy To Use? YES! We've Developed AR+ Cloud For YOU.

AR+ may sound somewhat complicated, but MAD Gaze makes in easy to incorporate into your everyday life. In fact, making your own AR+ application is as easy as managing Facebook.

We have created an AR+ application generating platform, AR+ Cloud on >> arcloud.madgaze.com/en/ which requires NO technical knowledge. You can make an AR+ app for anything you can think up. MAD Gaze can truly enhance all aspects of your life that you can imagine.

Where To Get The Apps For MAD Gaze?

No worries. We have thought about it and planned it and created MAD Store, an online platform specifically for MAD Gaze users to download apps from there.

Everything You Need At One Spot

There will be variety of apps on MAD Store.You can simply scan the QR codes to download app to your MAD Gaze . Of course, developers can share their good work on MAD Store at >>store.madgaze.com

Technical Details Of MAD Gaze 

Hardware Details

Specifications 

What Makes MAD Gaze Better Than Its Competitors?

Well, let’s just talk about price for a second. The last smart glasses on the market was highly expensive and made it so only a very few could have access to this technology. Again, we want this product to make your life easier- not break the bank.

And what are you losing from this price drop? Absolutely nothing! In fact, you’re gaining more! Not only is MAD Gaze selling at a really competitive price, it also has better hardware specification and performance. This includes both higher resolution and longer battery life!

Our MAD Schedule

MAD Rewards To Indiegogo Backers

Who We Are

Dragon Creative is a global leader in quality application development centred in Hong Kong. We have provided superior services for many famous enterprises. For MAD Gaze we are combing our strongest innovative teams to work on this exciting project. In 2015, we were proud to win the Hong Kong ICT Awards 2015 Best Innovation Grand Award and Entrepreneurial Innovation Gold Award for the development of MAD Gaze and our solution.

 Founder & CEO - Jordan Cheng

Dragon Creative Enterprise Solution Limited is founded in May 2013, by Mr. Cheng Man Fai, Jordan, a.k.a. “Father of Smart Glass in Hong Kong” and “IT Rising Star”.

Jordan has foreseen the great needs and wants from the market and has been leading our expert team in developing MAD Gaze and AR+ Cloud, aim to become a world’s top 10 brand and ecosystem of smart glass.

Want To Keep Tabs On MAD Gaze ?

Check out madgaze.com, our official website for updates on the development and release of MAD Gaze.

story:
Updated 4th Oct 2013 - We are now running a referral contest. A special prize for referring most amount of funders and helping to raise most amount of contributions! The prizes will include the wallet starter packages and a trophy for the person referring the most amount of funders, with an inscription and your name!

All you have to do is refer using the share tools above (remember to be logged in so anybody who comes through your link is correctly captured by indiegogo) 


Close to 8.1 million underprivileged children in India are out of school and into child labor in order to earn a single meal in a day. Their family income is less than $2 a day. There is no food security and mortality rate is very high. 

In an under construction building, where we were planning to take an office, we asked a 5 year old who was helping his mother carry bricks, if he wanted to go to school – his answer was simple and hits the nail on its head – I would love to go to school and play with other children and toys, but who will give me food?

When basics in life are not secure, priorities for these children are not the same as you and me. 

This campaign is about raising funds to secure food for 550 under privileged children.


It is our belief, if we secure food for these underprivileged children, we can get them to school. We are helping underprivileged children by providing them with a healthy, balanced meal that they would otherwise have to work for. The meal is an incentive for them to continue their education and go to school. 

If these children get educated, their quality of life can be different. They can start dreaming of a better life again and work towards it. Instead of being on the streets, begging, doing drugs, stealing, and becoming marginalized by society - they can be active contributors to society.

Today, their only dream is getting one meal a day. At times when their parents do not get work as they are daily wage laborers, they have to make do with just water.


It takes roughly $15 (or 4c per day) to feed a child for a year. A coffee a day at $1.85 costs $675 annually!! 


With this campaign we aim to raise $100,000 and use the profits (expected at $8,000) we generate towards securing food and nutrition for 550 underprivileged children. This means we will be able to get these children to go to school and off the streets as meals become an incentive for them to be regular at school.


We are professionals, who left their corporate jobs to start Yaasna Fusion Jewelry & Accessories that designs and retails sterling silver gemstone jewelry and leather accessories. Please visit www.yaasna.com to see our products. 

With our 16 hrs a day jobs, there was hardly any time for any other activity. Giving back to the community and working towards helping underprivileged children was always at the back of our minds, but we never got an opportunity and the time. Sounds like an excuse, but that is the reality for most of us.

The incident at the construction site in Nov 2012 changed all that. We quit our jobs and started building what we feel will help us contribute better to this cause. We have pledged a part of our profits every year towards this goal. This year we aim to ensure food for 1,500 under privileged children. Next year our target is to ensure food for 3,000 under privileged children.


We need your help in ensuring we achieve our goal of raising $100,000 with this campaign to make sure we are able to sponsor 550 children. It does not cost much – just the cost of a few cups of coffee!

As our heartfelt gratitude for your help in achieving this goal we are giving the following perks –



Choose from the following five options - choose one or choose all, these are a $ 79 retail and make great gifts. We will even monogram them with an alphabet of your choice.

  • Extremely soft cow leather wallet with a total of 10 pockets and your choice of monogram alphabet. Brown exterior and camel color inside pockets.
  • 113mm x 96mm when folded - easily fits in front or back trouser pocket
  • 8 pockets for credit cards 
  • 2 pockets for notes
  • Wallet net weight 58 grams
  • Premium brown color chairman lining inside
  • Packed in felt drawstring bag & then gift boxed
  • Gift wrapping available on request (Add $1 for gift wrapping)
  • Retails at $ 79, $ 29 only for this campaign
  • Please specify one alphabet to be monogrammed on your leather wallet.

  • Extremely soft cow leather wallet with a total of 10 pockets and your choice of monogram alphabet. Black exterior and Jade color pockets inside
  • 119mm x 96mm when folded - easily fits in front or back pocket
  • 8 pockets for credit cards 
  • 2 pockets for notes
  • Wallet net weight 58 grams
  • Premium black color chairman lining inside
  • Packed in felt drawstring bag & then gift boxed
  • Gift wrapping available on request (Add $1 for gift wrapping)
  • Retails at $ 79, $ 29 only for this campaign
  • Please specify one alphabet to be monogrammed on your leather wallet.

  • Extremely soft cow leather wallet with a total of 13 pockets and your choice of monogram alphabet. Black color exterior and bone color pockets inside.
  • 114mm x 96mm when folded - easily fits in front or back pocket
  • 7 pockets for credit cards 
  • 2 pockets for notes
  • 2 pockets for SIM Cards or SD Cards
  • 1 pocket for identification card
  • 1 small pocket in front for general use
  • Wallet net weight 58 grams
  • Premium black color chairman lining inside
  • Packed in felt drawstring bag & then gift boxed
  • Gift wrapping available on request (Add $1 for gift wrapping)
  • Retails at $ 79, $ 29 only for this campaign
  • Please specify one alphabet to be monogrammed on your leather wallet. 

  • Extremely soft cow leather wallet with a total of 7 pockets and your choice of monogram alphabet. Tan color exterior and Red color pockets inside.
  • 116mm x 96mm when folded - easily fits in front or back pocket
  • 4 pockets for credit cards 
  • 2 pockets for notes
  • 1 pocket for identification card
  • Wallet net weight 57 grams
  • Premium brown color chairman lining inside
  • Packed in felt drawstring bag & then gift boxed
  • Gift wrapping available on request (Add $1 for gift wrapping)
  • Retails at $ 79, $ 29 only for this campaign
  • Please specify one alphabet to be monogrammed on your leather wallet. 

  • Extremely soft cow leather wallet with a total of 8 pockets and your choice of monogram alphabet. Black color exterior and jade color pockets inside.
  • 116mm x 96mm when folded - easily fits in front or back pocket
  • 6 pockets for credit cards 
  • 2 pockets for notes
  • Wallet net weight 57 grams
  • Premium black color chairman lining inside
  • Packed in felt drawstring bag & then gift boxed
  • Gift wrapping available on request (Add $1 for gift wrapping)
  • Retails at $ 79, $ 29 only for this campaign
  • Please specify one alphabet to be monogrammed on your leather wallet. 

Order your perk from the right side bar. You can choose any color from the five options above. Please don't forget to let us know about your choice of monogram alphabet.

We have answered some commonly asked questions below. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to email us at indiegogo@yaasna.com

1. Can I contribute a different amount?

Yes, please feel free to support us with any amount that you would like to contribute. Every little or large will make a big difference to the success and help in achieving our goal of sponsoring food for 550 underprivileged children.

2. Are there any shipping charges?

Shipping is free internationally. For US, we will ship either using Amazon's FBA or from our own office in the US, which should open soon.

3. What is the warranty of these wallets?

We have a five stage quality control process that adheres to AQL 2.5 standards. Defective products are rejected at the quality control table. All products are checked and rechecked at the final packaging stage. These wallets are hand stitched, made of premium cow leather and built to last.

4. Can I gift them?

These wallets are premium leather wallets manufactured at the same factory where products are manufactured for some of the world leading high street retailers. You would normally pay $ 129 in a high street store for these wallets. Post the campaign on indigogo, we will start retailing these wallets on our website www.yaasna.com for $ 79.

5. Why are you selling them at such a low price?

This campaign is for a social cause. Our target is to raise $100,000 which will net us a 8% profit. This will ensure we are able to sponsor 550 under privileged children. Our goal here is not to use this as a profit generator for us.

6. When will the perks ship?

Our manufacturer has a capacity of 30,000 wallets a week. We will monitor the trend of perks being ordered and forward order with our manufacturer.

Perks will start shipping from 1st November. We expect the last perk to ship out by 20th November.

Our target is to deliver all perks by 1st December, so these perks can also be used as gifts for Christmas.

7. How are the wallets packed?

Each individual wallet is packed in a drawstring bag and then gift boxed.

8. Can we see a larger image of the wallets?

Yes, please go to the images tab at the top above the video

9. Can you gift wrap?

Yes we can gift wrap. Please add $ 1 per wallet as gift wrapping charge. Also let us know at the time of buying the perk, that you would like it to be gift wrapped.

10. Can we help in any other way?

Please use the share tools above (under the video) and help get the word out to your friends, family and as many people as you can. Our chances of success depend on your contributions.

You can also write to us at indigogo@yaasna.com if you have any suggestions.


"The jewellery that Yaasna sells is an amalgamation of hallmark sterling silver and real handpicked gemstones." Yourstory.in


"Yaasna.com, a leading online retail shop for silver jewellery, recently unveiled its Egyptian range in precious stones such as Lapis lazuli, Carnelian, Peridot and turquoise. Aparna Bhargava, co-founder and chief designer, Yaasna.com, says, “The ancient Egyptian culture has always fascinated Indians, so now shoppers can lay their hands on some striking straight-lined bold pieces.” The Asian Age

Thank you for your contributions! We will post photos and videos of our sponsorships once the campaign reaches its goal and also send you a notification by email!
story_txt:
Updated 4th Oct 2013 - We are now running a referral contest. A special prize for referring most amount of funders and helping to raise most amount of contributions! The prizes will include the wallet starter packages and a trophy for the person referring the most amount of funders, with an inscription and your name!
All you have to do is refer using the share tools above (remember to be logged in so anybody who comes through your link is correctly captured by indiegogo) 






Close to 8.1 million underprivileged children in India are out of school and into child labor in order to earn a single meal in a day. Their family income is less than $2 a day. There is no food security and mortality rate is very high. 
In an under construction building, where we were planning to take an office, we asked a 5 year old who was helping his mother carry bricks, if he wanted to go to school – his answer was simple and hits the nail on its head – I would love to go to school and play with other children and toys, but who will give me food?
When basics in life are not secure, priorities for these children are not the same as you and me. 
This campaign is about raising funds to secure food for 550 under privileged children.

It takes roughly $15 (or 4c per day) to feed a child for a year. A coffee a day at $1.85 costs $675 annually!! 






With this campaign we aim to raise $100,000 and use the profits (expected at $8,000) we generate towards securing food and nutrition for 550 underprivileged children. story:
Meet the Girl Beneath the Wrap and Under the Scarf

Before making the schlep from Westchester to Syracuse for my freshman year of college, I had only heard rumors of how brutal the winters would be. Once the temperatures dropped, the snow piled up, and the vodka hot chocolate just wouldn't keep me warm anymore, I knew I had to resort to another method of raising my body heat. Time had come to get creative...

Though looking good while staying warm was the inspiration, being comfortable in whatever I wore was always a top priority. Rather than throwing on an old hoodie, I wanted to look put together and fashionable...and I wanted to feel that way in whatever I was wearing. I decided to design wraps that fit women of all shapes and sizes, and just like the 'go-to' LBD (little black dress), these wraps were meant to be a staple in every woman's closet. Versatility played an important role in the creation of my line...

...and my 20 years of experience as a fashionista didn't hurt either.

#TBT ("Throwback Thursday")

To my surprise, I soon found myself surrounded by girls in Just Jamie Scarves all around campus.

After graduating, I did the responsible thing and took a typical 9 to 5 job behind a desk. But something was missing. I needed to give the gift of warmth that I had spread so graciously throughout my college years. 

So, I took a leap of faith and quit - and Just Jamie Scarves was born.

#TurnDownForWhat

While selling scarves and wraps was my biggest priority initially, over time I found myself increasingly looking to give back. Whether I was donating a percentage of profit to charity or physically handing out scarves to those in need, giving the gift of warmth was always the most rewarding for me.

The fall and winter months are approaching, and I am committed to the spirit of giving and helping my community stay warm. I have seen the biggest smiles, received the warmest hugs and opened the nicest thank you letters from the most appreciative people whose lives my scarves have touched.

#GOODKARMA

SO HERE I AM TODAY!!!

People have caught on to the 'go-to' mentality behind wearing my scarves and wraps, as they are flying off the shelves. Customers LOVE Just Jamie merchandise, which could not make me happier! My company is expanding quickly - so fast that keeping up with my growing business leaves me little time for beauty sleep!

THIS IS WHERE YOU COME IN!!!!

I am always moving from project to project, whether it's organizing a photo shoot, working on web design or meeting with buyers in the showroom. The warehouse staff (me, myself and I) are constantly shipping orders to fulfill fashionista demand. I'm currently raising funds to invest in operational infrastructure, so that instead of spending time doing the packing and heavy lifting, I could be focusing on doing what I do best...FOR YOU!!!

Moving forward, my mission is to continue elevating product innovation, but I would also like to spend more time educating my customers. I have a burning desire to create entertaining and educational YouTube videos teaching my customers how to look and feel good in every Just Jamie product. Each scarf and wrap can be worn in a different, stylish way, and I just so happen to enjoy putting on a fashion show...


I've come to terms with the fact that I can't be every woman for my company. I've been working as the sales rep and the designer all the way down to the packer and the shipper from day one. Just Jamie Scarves can only expand and succeed if I hire a strong team and build the operational infrastructure necessary to support growth! I have the passion, vision and knowledge to elevate my company to the next level, but I need YOUR HELP to execute it! The future of Just Jamie Scarves starts with YOU! With your contributions, you are helping me make my vision a reality!


There are several donation levels available so that all fashion lovers and supporters can participate.

$25 - Thank You.

Our sincerest thanks for investing in our future! This perk gets you a shout out via Twitter (follow us @_JustJamie_) as you are now one of Just Jamie's Official Backers.


$65 - Double the Warmth (a $72 value)

Your colorful surprises await, as this perk offers you TWO fashion-forward, show-stopping scarves. 1 FRINGE ETERNITY + 1 OMBRE ETERNITY = 2 SCARVES


$150 - Get Wrapped Up!     (1 WRAP + 2 SCARVES)  

Whether worn with ripped jeans and Converse sneakers, thrown behind your desk at work, or draped over a gown and sealed with a broach for a black tie affair, this functional fashion piece will get you through any day no matter what it has in store! This wrap will CHANGE YOUR LIFE (as it has mine), and reaching for it on a daily basis will become the norm.  

Pair up your wrap with one of the two scarves also included with this perk! You will receive three of the scarves below but, leave the color up to us scarf experts...we know what we're doing!


$250 - Ain't no selfie like a...SCARF SELFIE!!! 

Now there will officially be a (INSERT YOUR NAME HERE) scarf! Just Jamie will send you your official scarf, and your picture will be posted on all our social media sites modeling it. You will be added to our 'Scarf Selfie Hall of Fame", SO... it's time to reapply your lip gloss, hope you're ready for your close up ;)



$500 - I Now Pronounce You... A Philanthropist!

Giving the gift of warmth to those less fortunate is very important to Just Jamie! You can now call yourself a philanthropist because with this perk, I will personally deliver two dozen scarves,  FROM YOU, to Dress for Success or any charity of your choice, making someone both warm and happy for the holidays! This gift will also include a handwritten card, and I will be sure to follow up afterwards with pictures and video! There's no gift like the gift of giving! 


$1,000 - Host a VIP Just Jamie Scarves Party Before the Holidays!!


Invite family and friends into your home while you host your very own scarf party before the holidays this November or December! Get gift giving out of your way as Just Jamie brings over an assortment of merchandise available for sale at very special prices! Stay entertained as she demonstrates and educates scarf tying tips, tricks and techniques. The host will receive and be styled up in any twelves scarves of her choice! (Limited to the Tri-State area)

$1,500 - Tour of Just Jamie Showroom and "Scarf of the Month Club"

Come on down to our showroom in NYC and see what goes on behind the scenes of Just Jamie. As trusted top-tier backers, you will receive a sneak peak of our Spring line before it hits stores! Also, you will be sent a best-selling scarf of my choice for twelve months. Enjoy everything from chunky knits in the winter to large pareos and beach cover ups over the summer months.

Lastly, Just Jamie is always looking for new partners and investors. if you are interested in investing in my business long-term, please contact me directly at justjamiescarves@gmail.com.

Sharing our campaign is just as important to us as purchasing one of our perks! With your help of spreading this campaign, we hope to make our dream of spreading warmth and style a reality!

Also, you will be sent a best-selling scarf of my choice for twelve months. Enjoy everything from chunky knits in the winter to large pareos and beach cover ups over the summer months.


Lastly, Just Jamie is always looking for new partners and investors. if you are interested in investing in my business long-term, please contact me directly at justjamiescarves@gmail.com.



Sharing our campaign is just as important to us as purchasing one of our perks! With your help of spreading this campaign, we hope to make our dream of spreading warmth and style a reality!

story:
Our toys have one goal, to teach and stimulate developing minds. Our aim was to create modern toys based off timeless approaches. 

Nesting: These toys will help your child learn how things fit together all while teaching them about size, weight, texture, shape, and colors.

Stackable: Along with nesting, these  are also stackable toys that will help develop skills like problem solving, and cause and effect relationships.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Another classic toy that we thought we could bring a modern touch to while keeping the learning benefits intact.

Sorting: These toys will teach shapes, cause and effect relationships and object permanence. Your child will learn how to fit the shape into the corresponding hole. They will also learn that once the shape is placed in to the box, it isn't lost forever. These simple tasks will have a lifetime effect.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rattle: Babies first toy that teaches cause and effect relationships. While your baby is starting to use their hands and arms, a rattle will teach them that they can make noise as they play.

As parents ourselves, we understand how important the little things are. We take pride in our craft and we take pride in what goes into our toys. Our goal is to remove the question marks and give other parents a better option. 

These toys are made from 100% molded ABS plastic which is 100% recyclable, BPA free, Organotin free and free of all phthalates. We have designed all of our toys and will design future toys with no glue, no fasteners and no harmful dyes. Our packaging is also 100% recyclable. Our products are made to fit in the simplest form possible to reduce our carbon footprint as well as reduce cost.

Giving toys isn't the only goal for BoxedTurtle, we wanted to control our impact we have on the the planet as well. While we created plastic toys, it was important to us that the plastic was durable, but recyclable as well. We designed our toys so they could ship in the simplest form possible to reduce the space needed for transportation. This also helps reduce the cost, which helps us achieve our main goal, giving.

Our packaging was also a subject of concern, and we made sure all of our boxes would be printed on 100% recyclable material.

Our future goals include a Return-A-Toy Program, where you can send back your used toys for refurbishment and we can prepare them for new homes that need toys. 

•Children born into need have a high school dropout rate of 30%. Compared to 7% for children born to middle and upper class families. 

•Often times these same children will start Kindergarten 12-18 months behind the national average. By the time these students reached 5th grade, they are 2 years behind the average. By 12th grade they are 4 years behind. 

•Studies show that good learning toys for infants and toddlers can have a positive impact on reading and math scores later in life. It also helps with school preparedness. 

Our Conclusion was pretty obvious; to help infants and toddlers get new toys that focused on learning and their development, was for us to create a toys that would give it to them. 

Education is the only way out of poverty, but education starts with early development, and to achieve that, kids need to play. 

After spending countless hours (and nights) on this passion, we feel we have have finally reached a point where we can begin tooling. The photos you have seen are 3D printed and painted prototypes. The packaging you see are samples from our packaging partner with a spray mounted print of the box graphics.  

The project and toys have been reviewed by a pediatrician and played with by a ton of kids. We believe it's ready for production. This is where you come in. We have done an extensive job on making sure the toys are within budget to allow us to give a toy to a child in need for every toy we sell. But we need your help to pay for tooling, safety testing, and the first run of production. The tooling, testing and giveaways will come out of the profits from the first run. We are truly eager to begin this journey, but we can't do it without you.

The toys are all molded plastic, to mold the toys we need tooling. Tooling is the most expensive part to this process. We had the dream, but with your help and giving heart, we can make all of this a reality.

We have created a toy where the price points are competitive to the market, and yet when you buy one of our toys, you will be helping a child in need. If you can’t buy a toy or if you don’t know of a child to buy for, we could still use your help. Please share this page, our video or our story. Everything helps. 

After watching the important role educational toys played in the early development of his children, BoxedTurtle founder Aaron Ryczek felt compelled to make a difference. He has a strong belief that all children should be given a fair chance in life and no child should suffer due to poverty. 

As a kid at heart, Aaron has always had a love for toys but coupled with his background in industrial design and product development, creating toys for a cause became his life’s goal. So buy a toy give a toy was born. 

The rest of the team is made up by people that have grown with Aaron; a director of marketing, an engineer specializing in plastic molding and a project manager with a background in manufacturing and production. 

With over ten year of working together in the product development field, this team has put their talents together to create a product that they feel good about creating. They all have a deep passion to give back and eager to get this passion off the ground. 

As always, with rewards comes risk. At BoxedTurtle we have done everything in our power to minimize the risk; we have set in place manufacturing and packaging partnerships, and established the shipping and liability insurance relationships needed to release these toys to children. We have spoken with several organizations to begin the process and set up the logistics of the toy deliveries. 

With many years experience in product development, we understand the importance of being thorough and precise when it comes to manufacturing a product. We feel that we are well within our capabilities to not only complete the project, but expand into the next phase of this budding company. We have over 30 years combined experience in product development, design, engineering and manufacturing. Our team is more than qualified to establish a schedule and do what it takes to make sure the schedule stays on track. Even in the event the project goes off the rails, we have the team to get things back on track in a timely manner.

We have an extensive knowledge in manufacturing and running production. We know when a project needs attentions and we are very familiar with working late nights, early morning, weekends and even holidays if needed to make sure the project goes as planned and arrives to you on a timely manner. 

This journey has been exciting and it's been an amazing experience up to this point. We want to share this passion with you and others. So we thank you for your time in watching the video and reading to this point. We understand your time is important to you, and we appreciate this time we spent together, but the time has come for you to make a decision. Please help us and help infants and toddlers get quality toys to help them get their education off to a good start and buy a toy. If you can't buy a toy, please share this page,

Remember, education is the only way out of poverty, and education starts with early development. So please join us, and together we can help infants and toddlers fight back the difficulties of poverty.
